(adhîshn), n. beina, behna, inchârna.

(adikt), v.t. â, rui, a ngawl zâwnga thil chîng dawklak. n. zûk leh hmuam leh kâni lama a ngawl vei tawh or chîng dawklak tawh. addicted, adj. addiction, n.
(adikueit, adekuit, adekuat), adj. tâwk, tâwkfâng, tam tâwk. adequately, adv. adequateness, adequacy, nn.
(adipawz), adj. thau.
(adiu), interj. chibai, dam takin, Pathian kutah ka hlân a che. n. inthlah dâwna inchibai (na).
(adiulêsh), n. mi biak tlawnna or fak derna. adulatory, adj.
(adius), v.t. sawi chhâwng, tehkhin nâna hmang. adducible, adj.
(adl), adj. buai, mumal lo, \awih, hul, ruak hiau (Addleheaded - Rilru kim lo).
(admezhar), v.t. sem, teh, teh chhuak.
(admikschar), n. a bâwlhlo, a behbâwm, thil inchawhpawlh or chawhpawlh.
(admirabl), adj. ngaihsân tlâk, chawisân phu. admirableness, n. admirably. adv.
(admâir), v.t. ngaisâng, chawisâng, zah, duh or lâwm êm êm.
(adres), v.t. chu mi lama tîr, chu mi lama thawn, bia or lehkha thawn, chu mi hawi zâwnga rilru leh tha pe. n. lehkha thawna mi hming leh awmna ziak hi, hmun hming.
(adriâwit), adj. themthiam, kut \uan rang. adroitly, adv. adroitness, n.
(adrînal), adj. kal (kawchhûnga mi) kianga awm.
(advais), n. zilhna, finchhuahna. (Follow my advice - Ka zilhna pawm rawh). advise, v.t. adviser, n.
(advans), v.t., v.i., n., hmasâwn, hma lam pan, kaisântîr, rawt chhuak, hmasâwntîr, a man dahkham, a man or hlawh pe lâwk, pawisa pûk, mi vehthlêm, mi kawmngeih tumna.
(advantij), n. mi chaldelhna, hlêp, hlâwkna. v.t. hlêp, hlâwkna. v.t. hlêp, hlâwkpui, remchâng ûm. advantageous, adj. advantageously, adv. advantageousness, n.
(advars), adj. a kalh zâwnga awm, remti lo, pawi. adversely, adv. adverseness.
(advarsari), n. khingpui, hmêlma.
(advartaiz), v.t. mipui hmaa puangzâr or târ lang, tlângaupui, sawi mawi.
(advartaizar), n. tlângau, puangzârtu.
(advartizment, -tisment), n. tlângauna, sawimawina.
(advawkasi), n. dîlsakna, ngensakna, lama \anna.
(advawkeit), n. dîlsaktu, ngensaktu, rorêlna hmaa thubuai sawisaktu, dân hre mi, ukil.

(advenchar, -chiar), n. thil hlauhawm chona, thil danglam tak tawhna. (adventure stories - buaina leh harsatna chanchin chuanna thawnthu. Ramchhuah leh rammut te hi adventure a ni). adventurous, adventuresome. adjs.

(adventishas), adj. pâwn lam a\anga lo lût, dân lo anga lo thleng, a palha lo thleng. (Dâktawr hian N.A.D. tia an ziak chuan Nothing adventitious detected", "A chuap, a kawchhûng, etc. -ah thil pawi danglam engmah hmuh tur a awm lo" an tihna a ni). adventitiously, adv."
(adz), n. hachhek.
(adâjiaw, adâwzaw), adv. muang taka hla sak.
(adâwbi), n. leirawhchan ni lo, ni em khawro lei nena in sak, chutiang in chu.
(adâwr), v.t. Pathian biaka bia, ngaihlu or ngaisâng lutuk.
(adâwrn), v.t. chei, cheimawi.
(adû), n. buaina, buaipuina, philina.
(aerial), adj. boruak thil, boruak or vâna awm. n. radio ngula radio zungzâm lo dawng tûra thirhrui an thlun hi.
(afabl), adj. nêlawm, kawm nuam. affability, affableness, nn. affably, adv.
(afarm), v.t. dik ni ngeia sawi or chhâl, nemnghet. affirmable, adj. affirmation, n.

(afawrd), v.t. a sênso tuar thei, tlin, tuar ngam, tuar zuam, thawh chhuahsak, a rah seng sak. (His education afforded him success - A zirna chuan hlawhtlinna a rawn thlen. I can't afford to lose - Hloh ka zuam lo, or hek ka zuam lo).
(afawrest), v.t. thing phun avânga ngawa siam. afforestation, n.
(afawrizm), n. thufing tawi. aphoristic, adj.
(afeir), n. hna, thiltih, inngaihzâwn or inrîmna.
(afeizia), n. natna vâng emaw, rilru buai vâng emawa \awng theih loh.
(afekt), v.t. chunga thawk, khawih danglam, thinlung kuai.
(afidevit), n. chhechham nên meuhva ziaka tiam, chhechhama ziak.
(afiks), v.t. vuah, belhchhah. n. thu or \awngka bul or tâwpa thu vuah belh.
(afiliet), v.t. fapa atâna chhawm or la lût, association or society ilova member atâna lût, pâwl zawm. affiliation, n.
(afinity), n. inanna, inlaîchinna.
(afiushn), n. chunga vûr or leih.
(aflikt), v.t. natna, buaina or chhaih chi ai.
(afluent), adj. tam, hausa. n. dîl or luipui fintu luitê.
(aflâwt), adv., adj. tuia lâng, veivâk kual.
(aflêim), adv., adj. alh, êng.
(afranchhaiz, -chhiz), v.t. bawi, leibat, tha bat, etc. a\anga inphuarna phelh, phuarna phelh.
(afrant), v.t. hmaichhana hmu, zahpah lo taka \awng khum.
(afrei), n. insualna, indona, inbeihna, buaina siamna.
(afreid), adj. hlau, ngam lo. (Hei hi verb a ni lo. Mi tam takin fear (verb) aiah an hmang \hin. e.g. Don't afraid).
(afrâit), v.t. tihlau, tithlabâr. n. hlauh thutna.
(afrît), n. Arabian thawnthua ramhuai.
(afut), adv. ding chhuak mêk, phusa mêk, ti mêk.
(afâians), n. ring tâwk tia tiamna, innei tûra inhual lâwkna.
(afâir), adv., adj. alh, kâng.
(afâwr), prep., adv. a hmaah, ahmain. aforementioned, adj.
(afîld), adv. tualah, mual zâwlah, khêlmual or leilet zâwlah.
(agapî), n. Kristian hmasatena Lalpa Zanriah hminga hmangaihna ruai an siam. agape, (agêip), adv. and adj. inhawng, kau, kua, mak tia âng ho.
(agast), mak ti leh hlau, thin\hâwng.
(agat), n. lunghlu chi khat.
(agaw), adv. hun kal liam tawhah or a\angin.
(agawni), n. taksa or rilru lama na lutuk.
(agawrafawbia), n. hmun zau or ualauva awm \ihna or hlauhna (sazu no, pangang, khâm ko, etc. râpna ang hian).
(agenst, ageinst), prep. kalh, dodâl, nêk, vênthâwn nân, aiah.
(aggl), n. kil (From another angle - Kil lehlam a\angin or A lehlam ngaihtuahin). angle, n. thil kawm, nghakuai leh a ngul. v.i. nghakuai chiah.
(agieit), v.t. tichê, tinghîng, chawk buai. agitation, n. agitator, n.
(aglaw), adj. and adv. ling huam, lum tak.
(aglawmareit), v.t. and v.i. inhlâwm, inhâwr khâwm, fuan khâwm. agglomeration n.
(agli), adj. hmêlchhia, tuitang lo.
(aglûtineit), v.t. châr, behtîr, tiban (glue or gawm hnathawh angin). agglutination, n. agglutinative, adj.
(agnawstik), n. mihringin Pathian a awm leh awm loh kan chhui pha lo vang tia ringtute hi (Pathian a awm lo ti hulhualtu atheist nêna ngaih pawlh chi a ni lo).
(agneit), adj. pate lama inlaichîn or inchhûng khat, \angrual.
(agrandaiz), v.t. kaisântir, dah ropui, tichak. aggrandisement, n.
(agraund), adv. tâng (lawngte pawh hi lungpui or thliarkâr ilovah tâng ta se, a aground kan ti ang).
(agraveit), v.t. a chhuan chhe zâwnga tizualkai. |awng lêrah chuan tibuai, mi chawk or cho thinur. aggravation, n.
(agres), v.i. and v.t. do or sual hmasa.
(agrigeit, -regeit), v.i. and v.t. kal khâwm, tling khâwm, tling, chang, ni. adj. and n. a hlâwm chuan, a vaiin. aggregately, adv. aggregation, n.
(agrikalchar), n. thlawhhma lâk thiamna. agricultural, adj.
(agriv), v.t. mi nêk chêp, mi rilru tina.
(agrêrian), adj. ram hmunhma lam khawih chi, in hmun lo ram lampang, thlawhhma lam.
(agrî), v.i. remti, rem, mil.
(ahal), adv. puan lawng châwl lai ang, a puanzâr zial tingtawma a karfung pawh a panga rawlh \hat.
(ahawi), interj. lawng kar mite inchibaina.
(ahed), adv. hma lamah.
(ahuail), adv. eng emaw chhûng chu, hun rei lo tê.
(ai aw iu), n. 'I owe you' kaihtawi, 'i ta ka ba e' tihna.

(ai), n. mit, hriau beng, alu mit, etc. v.t. bih, en, melh. mind's eye, mitthla, suangtuahna. make eyes at, ngaihmelh. see eye to eye, rilru inzâwn. with an eye to, chu mi tum or chu mi thlîr rân chung chuan.
(ai), pron. ka, kei.
(aiambas), n. thu mal ri hnih neia a ri hnuhnung zâwk ri sei (rihnîm, thazâm, etc.). iambic, adj.
(aiawdais), v.t. aidin hnawih.
(aiawdin, -dain), n. aidin damdawi.
(aiawn), n. atom leh thil tênau dang electric pai. ionise (aiawnais), v.t.
(aiawta), n. thil them, thil te tak tê, chhe tê.
(aibrau), n. mitko, mitko hmul.
(aibîrian), adj. Spain leh Portugal thil.
(aidar), n. hmâr lam tuipui varak.
(aidawlais), v.t. pathian biak taka bia.
(aidawlatar), n. milem bia ngaisangtu.
(aidhar, îdhar), adj., pron. a eng zâwk zâwk emaw.
(aidia), n. mitthla, suangtuahna, hriatna, ngaihtuahna.
(aidl), adj. awm âwl, tlawngâwl, thatchhia, âwlthâwng, \ûl lo, hman loh, chhawr loh, tlâktlai lo. v.t., v.i. engmah lova hun khawhral, âwlthâwng.
(aidz), n. hmasâng Rome hun chhiarnaa March, May, July leh October thlaa ni 15 ni leh thla danga ni 13 ni.
(aikhawnawkhlast), n. milem chhu chhetu, milem be haw mi, thil hlui duh lo mi, puithuna haw mi.
(ail), n. Biak Ina \hutthlêng tlar inkâra mipui kalna hmun ruak hi, Biak Ina a intepêng.
(ail), n. thliarkâr.
(ailand), n. thliarkâr, thil awm fâl, lamliana police dinna tûr leh mihring motor chuan kaina tûr hmun ruat hran.
(ain), n. hmân lai \awnga eyes.
(air), n. thinurna. irate (aireit), ireful, adjs. thinur.
(airan), n. thîr, thîr hriamhrei, thahrui, tharum, âwmkhauhna, istiri.
(airasibl, irasibl), adj. thinur hma, thin awrh.
(airawni), adj. thîr thil, thîra siam, thîr ang. irony, n. elsênna, thil runthlâk, \awng mei nei. ironic, ironical, adjs.
(airenian), adj., n. Iran thil, Persian.
(airis), n. mitmu dum lai, chhimbâl.
(airish), adj., n. Ireland thil/\awng/mi.
(ais), n. vûr. v.t. vûra khuh, vûra chantîr, chithluma khuh. break the ice, titlangnêl. cut no ice, sâwt lo.
(aisaw), tlukpui.
(aisawbar), n. ram lema boruak inang rîn zawmna.
(aisawleit), v.t. la hrang, dah hrang, thliar.
(aisawmawrfizm), n. thil hrang daih inanna.
(aisawselîz), adj. sîr inchen nei.
(aisawtawp), n. atom chi khat.
(aisawtharm), n. ram lum dân inang rîn zawmna.
(aisbarg), n. tuipui chunga vûr khâwn lian tak lâng.
(aisikl), n. vûr them uai, tui far tûr vûra khal.
(aislandik), adj., n. Iceland thil, Iceland mite \awng.
(aislandpar), n. chinai lung hmuh tlang theih.
(aitem), n. thil, chanchin them, chanchin bua thu them chhuah.
(aitinerant, itinerant), adj., n. zinvâk, zin vêl, zin mi.
(aivawri), n. saingho.
(aivi), n. bang leh ban ilova an zâmtîr \hin hruizâm mawi chi.
(ajaj), v.t. thu rem (He was adjudged the best - Ani chu a berah an thlang a).
(ajankt), adj. zawm, belh. n. zawm emaw, belha awm.
(ajast), v.t. siam rem, miltîr, tuah rem. adjustable, adj. adjustment, n.
(ajawin), v.t. and v.i. kianga awm, dawta awm, si, hne, zawm.
(ajektiv), n. thil nihna sawifiahtu thumal. adjectival, adj. adjectively, adjectivally, advs.
(ajenda), n. tih tûr, rêl tûr, ngaihtuah tûr.
(ajil, ajail), adj. zam \ha, \uan rang, inthazo. agility, n.
(ajutant), n. sipai commanding officer or commandant (Manding Sâp) puitu officer, dân narânin Major aia sâng lo, Sikin Sâp.
(ajâdikeit), v.t. rorêlna dân anga a nihna puang. v.i. inelna ilova a endiktua \ang.
(ajârn), v.t. and v.i. titâwp, ni dang atâna inkhâwmna titâwp, hun sawn.
(ajêsent), adj. hnai, in\henawm, inzawm. adjacency, n. adjacently, adv.
(ajûr), v.t. chhechham nên meuhva thu pe, tih tak meuhva kar or phût or puh.
(ak-ak), n. thlawhna kahna silai.
(akademik, -al), adjs. zirna sâng pâwla mi, zirna sâng thil.
(akademishan), n. zirna sâng hmuna tel ve.
(akalaws), acaulous (akalas), adjs. kuang nei lo ang.
(akampani), v.t. zui, kalpui, puibâwm, thlâwp, rem, zawm.
(akars), v.t. ânchhe lawh.
(akarsid), adj. ânchhedawng.
(akastam), v.t. nêl, ti \hang.
(akatalepsi), n. hriatna leh thiamna hian thil bul leh thudik a pawh phâk tak tak lovang tih rinna.

(akaunt), v.t. chhiar, hisâp, chhût. v.i. chanchin sawi, chhan sawi, mawhphurtu anga sawi fiah, tangka vawng, chhiar. n. thil chhiar leh chhûtna, bat chin chhûtna. pawisa vawnna, pawisa vawn dân, hlutna, thil chanchin sawina.
(akawk), adv. thle ngaih, induh taka thle bâr.
(akawlait), n. Biak In enkawltu, kohhran hna zirtîr, mi tharlâm.
(akawleid, -lad), n. inkuahna, inpawmna, inpawmna leh infawhna ilova pasal\ha nemnghehna.
(akawm-, kamplish), v.t. tizo, hlen.
(akawmawdeit), v.t. pawm, pawmzam, siamrem, ngaihhnathiam, huang, chênna tûr siamsak, thleng.
(akawmplis, -kam-), n. thil sual tihpuitu.
(akawrd), v.i. rempui, zûl, thurualpui, mil. n. inremna, lungrualna.
(akawrdian), n. phaiphulêng kaih fân chi.
(akawst), v.t. hnaih chilha bia.
(akawtilidon), n. thing leh hnim pâr thei lo chi, cryptogam an tih chi hi.
(akiliz), n. hmasâng Grik thawnthua an mi chak hmingthang.
(akiuiti), n. hriamna (rilru chak lamah pawh).
(akiumen), n. rilru hriamna, rilru chak leh thûkna, thil awmze hriat tlang thiamna.
(akiumiuleit), v.t. khâwl khâwm, tiang. v.i. tling, inchhêk khâwm.
(akiurasi), n. dik chiahna, hlah lohna.
(akiurat, -rit), adj. dik chiah, hlah lo, ngil, fuh.
(akiut), adj. hriam, zum lutuk tak, fing, fiak, natna lamah chuan, a ngaihtuahawm hun lai tak. acutely, adv. acuteness, n.
(akiuz), v.t. puh, hêk.
(aklaimataiz), v.t. ram dang sik leh sa nêl \hantîr. acclimatisation (-zeshm), n.
(aklameshn), n. fakna lâwma au ri.
(akleim), v.t. chawimawi, lâwm, fak. n. lâwmpuina, fakna.
(akliviti), n. âwih chho, chho.
(akmi), n. a sân ber lai, tawng sân ber lai.
(aknawlij), v.t. dika ngai, pawm, nemnghet. Ka dawng e", tia nemnghehna lehkha. acknowledgement, n."
(akni), n. hmai ilova arngeng.
(akrawbat), n. hruizên zawh thiam, circus bei thiam. acrobatic, adj.
(akrawpawlis), n. kulh.
(akraws), prep. piahah, tlangin, a tan zâwngin, hmun khat a\anga hmun lehlamah.
(akredit), v.t. hmehbel, nihna bel, puh.
(akresent), adj. \hang tial tial.
(akrid), adj. kâa bak deuh hlak, kha deuh fak. acridity, acridness, nn. thil thûr, acid -ina lei leh kam vêl a seh ang hi.
(akrimawni), n. a tai zâwng, \awngka bak hlak, a khei zâwng, a run leh pawiti zâwnga \awng.
(akritiud), n. khâkna, \awng bakna.
(akru), v.i. tling khâwm, inchhêk khâwm.
(aksawrias), adj. nupui ngaina mi tak.
(akselareit), v.t. tichak, tirang, chak rang.
(akseliarandaw, atchelerandaw), adj., adv., rang tial tialin (hla sakah).
(aksenchiueit), v.t. uar bîk. accentuation, n.
(aksent), n. aw phawi, uarna lam, uarna. v.t. uar.
(aksept), v.t. pawm, la, dawng.
(akses), n. panna, lawina, kal pawhna, luh theihna.
(aksesawri), adj. a behbâwm, puibâwmtua awm.
(akseshn), n. hmun sâng luahna, ro luahna.
(akshn), n. thiltih, hnathawh, chêt dâna thilti, indona hmuna inbeihna, rorêlna hmaa mi khinna.

(aksiawm), n. hnial rual lohva a dika pawm theih mai chi (A phel chu a pum aiin a tê. Thil pahnihin a dang pakhat tluk ve ve chiah sela, an pahnih pawh chu an intluk ve ve ang). axiomatic, axiomatical, adjs.
(aksid), v.i. hnaih, thleng, zawm, fin, remtihsak.
(aksident), n. tihpalh, thil lo thleng, chêtsual palhna, hmai rual lo.
(aksil), n. thing kâk, hnah kuang chawrna kâk.
(aksis), n. thil vir lairil tak.
(aksl), n. thil virna fung.
(akt), v.i. chê, thil ti, thawk, lemchang, chang. v.t. lema chang. n. thiltih, sawrkâr thupêk, dân siam, lemchannaa bung hrang hrang. (Act of God - Mihringte dan rual lohva thil lo thleng).
(aktiual), (akchual tiin a ri lek lek zâwk a ni), adj. a tak tak, tûn lai huna awm ngei, a lem ni lo, thil kal tawh ni lo.
(aktiuari), n. ziaktu, insurance company thil hisâptu. actuarial, (aktiuêrial), adj.
(aktiueit), v.t. tichê, tikal, tiphûr, tur (tho).
(aktiv), adj. phusa, \uan \ha, \hahnemngai taka bei, nung tak, thatho. actively, adv. activity, n. (activiness hi chu an hmang khât deuh).
(akuair), v.t. nei, hlêp, (aquire knowledge - Hriatna nei, zir puitling).
(akuamarîn), adj. tuipui tui anga hring dumpâwl nghulh.
(akuatik), adj. tui lam thil, tuia chêng chi.
(akueas), adj. tui ang, tuirîl, tui len khâwm.
(akuedakt), n. tui kawng (siam chawp).
(akueint), v.t. hmêlhriat, nêl, hriat chian tuma chhût, hrilhhria.
(akueriam), n. ennawm atâna sangha chi hrang hrang an khawina tuikhuah or tuizêm (darthlalanga siam te an ni).
(akuies), v.i. pawm, remti, amen-pui, amen-sak. acquiescence, n. acquiescent, adj.
(akuilain, -lin), adj. muvanlai thil, muvanlai ang, muvanlai hmui anga kawm.
(akuit), v.t. chhuah, thiam chantîr, leiba rulh tlâk, mittlung taka khawsa.
(akushma), n. khuma nau neih.
(akutar), v.t. râlthuama thuam, thuam, fam.
(akûs-, akaustik), adj. benga hriatna lampang leh ri lam khawih chi.
(al-, awltarneit), v.t. inthlâk chhâwng.
(alai), v.t. zawm khâwm, \anrualpui. n. \angrual, lam\ang.
(alaik), adj. inang. adv. a angin.
(alain), v.t. tlar. (Aligned nations - Sawrkâr \ang zaho).
(alains), n. \anrualna, inzawm khâwmna.
(alait), v.i. chhuk thla, \um. alight, adj. kâng, alh.
(alaiv), adj. nung, thi lo, a thatho zâwnga nung.
(alak), interj. Chheheu! A va pawi êm! Khai âw!
(alakriti), n. \uan \hat.
(alam), n. chi chi khat.
(alamnas), n. sikul naupang, zirlai.
(alarji), n. thil huatna, thil ngeih lohna. (Vawmbal huatte hi allergy a ni a; ke pali sa ei theih loh te pawh hi a ni). |awng lêrah chuan thil ngei or ngaih theih lohna tih nânte hian an hmang.
(alau), v.t. phal, pawm, remti.
(alaud), adv. ring takin.
(alawft), adv. chungah, hmun sângah, boruakah.
(alawi), v.t. thîr dâr chi hrang hrang chawhpawlh, chutiang a\anga thîr lo chhuaka chu.
(alawkeit), v.t. sem, hna sem or tuk, chanpual atâna sem. allocation, n.
(alawng), adv. dungzuiin, hma lamah, tel ve.
(alawpîsia), n. lukawlh.
(alawt), v.t. chanpual atâna dah (See allocate). allotment, n.

(alibai), n. police or rorêlna hmaa thil tisuala an puhte'na chu thil tihsual laia hmun dang daiha awma an insawia chhuanlam an siam hi. An hmang khawlo telh telh a, tunah hi chuan chhuanlam engpawh mai atân hian an hmang ta.

(aliment), n. chakna, chaw. alimentary, adj.

(alkawv), n. banga ker kuak, thil hûn nâna bang ker kuak, chawlhmun daihlim.

(alkimi), n. bâwlhlo chawhpawlh dân an zir \anna (An tum ber phei chu bâwlhlo chi hrang hrang a inmil tâwka chawhpawlh a, rangkachak chhuah a ni. Thil âtthlâk ni mah se, tûnlaia kan ni tin hmanruaa an siam chhuah theihna chemistry science hring chhuaktu hi a ni), nunna tui hmuh chhuah tumna. alchemist (-mist), n. chutianga bâwlhlo chawk vêl thiam chu.
(alla), n. Muslim pathian.
(alma mêtar), n. mahni sikul kaina. (St. Paul's High School-a lût tawhte tân chuan ram danga hnathawk tawhte pawh ni se, St. Paul's High Shool hi an Alma Mater a ni kumkhua tawh ang).

(ansed), adj. sawi loh.
(anselfish), adj. mahni hmasial lo.

(ant), n. nu (nute laizâwn) leh ni (pate farnu) leh pu (nute nu\a) te nupui leh pa (pa-mi) te nupui.
(antagawnist), n. kalhtu, dodâltu, hnialtu, hmêlma, khingpui (Protoganist hi antagonist letling hlauh a ni thung - \an or puitu).
(antai), v.t phelh.
(antaidi), adj. \awp, hnawk.
(antairing), adj. taima, tha thlah lo, hah lo.
(antarktik), adj. Arctic (hmâr tâwp) eptu, chhim tâwp lam.
(antaward, -tawuard), adj. thunun har, mawi lo, rem lo, vânduai.
(antawld), adj. chhiar sên loh, sawi loh.
(antena), n. rannung thil dapna ki or nawn hi, radio zung manna thîrhrui zam hi. (O slug, protrude thine antenna - Hnapkhawn aw, ki rawn chhuah).
(anthawlawji), n. pangpâr or hla thu lâwr khâwm, thu ziak ngaihnawm zual lâwr khâwm.
(anthingkabl), adj. suangtuah tlâk loh, âwiawm lo(h), rilru khei.
(anthrawpawfaji), n. mihring sa ei.
(anthrawpawlawji), n. mihring hnam chhuina science (zoology hi chu ramsa lampang chanchin chhuina science a ni thung). anthropological, adj.
(anthrawpawmawrfizm), n. mihring pian hmang anga Pathian lantîr, mihring mize pu anga thil dang ngai. anthropomorphic, adj.
(anti), kalh, do.
(antibaiawtic), adj., n. hrik chi \henkhat enlenna nên chauhva hmuh tham, hrik chi dang tisilawng or \han ti\hu thei chi (Penicillin ang te hi natna hrik do tûra an khawi a ni a, antibiotic a ni).
(antibawdi), n. natna hrik emaw, taksa mûrin emawa mahni invên nâna tuihnâng a chhuah hi.

(antideit), v.t. a ni dik tak aia hmaa tarik ziak or chhâl. [Application-te hi an ni tur ral hnuah theh lût ta ila, lo pawmzam thei si sela, a mawi hnaiah kan thehluh ni aia hmaa a tarik kan ziah (antedate) a ngai ang].
(antidiluvian or -diliuvian), adv. Nova dam laia tuilêt hun aia hma, Chhura rual.
(antidâwt), n. tûr hnathawh dodâltu damdawi, thil sual kalhtu. antidotal, adj.
(antik), adj. hlui, upa. n. hmasâng thil, hmanlai mi thawmhnaw khawn khâwm. antiquiness, antiquity, nn.
(antik), adj., n. lim or milem mak taka cheibâwl, a nuizatthlâk zâwnga zuang vêl, a mak leh ho zâwnga nunchan zir.
(antiklaimaks), n. thu leh hla sosâng tial tiala a vâwrtâwp thleng ta lova ho taka zuzi zo leh ta hi, a vâwrtâwp thleng zo lova tlawlh.
(antikraist), n. Sakawlh, dân bawhchhepa (Krista dodâltu).
(antikuari), n. thil hlui chîk mi or khawn khâwm mi. antiquarian (antikuerian), adj.
(antil), prep. and conj. thleng in, hmâ chuan.
(antilâwp), n. sazuk chi khat, sathâr anna nei deuh si.
(antimeridian), adj. chhûnlai aia hma, chawhma lam .
(antimâwnian), n. Chanchin |ha hian Kristiante hi dân leh hrai chunga lêng thei turin min hlâng kâng tawh tia ringtu (khurbîng pâwl ngaihdân ang hian).
(antinapshal), adj. inneih hma thil.
(antinêtal), adj. pian hma thil.
(antipairetik), adj. khawsik damdawi.
(antipathi), n. huatna ril tak, inaihalna.
(antipawdiz), n. mahni zâwn lei lehlama mi. Lei hi kan hnuai zâwn siahah verh tlang ta ila, kan awmna leh a tlangna lai chiah chu. Thil inralkah or inang lo lutuk. antipodal, adj.
(antipenalt), adj. thumala a ri hnuhnûng ber dawttu tu leh (Thiamthainumawngtawlh-ah hian a 'nu' lai hi a antepenult a ni ang).
(antirainam), n. Sâp pangpâr chi khat, buk taka par \ana a lera zuih ral.
(antiriawr), adj. hma lam(ah).
(antisemait, -semait), n. Juda hnam hua or engto mi. anti-semitic, (-simitik), adj.
(antisident), adj. hma lama âwn. n. hmakhalhtu.
(antisipeit), v.i. lo ring lâwk, thlîr lâwk. anticipation, n.
(antisâwshal), adj. vântlâng kalh mi, mipui hmakhaw ngai lo mi, vântlâng tana hnawksak.

(antitawksin), n. kawchhûnga natna hrik tuihnâng hlauhawm lo dodâltu (Ar sa \hing ei sual kan tih te hi ei hmain chhuang lum mah ila, a chhûnga natna hrik chi khat staphylococci lo pung tawh khân tuihnâng hlauhawm deuh mai a lo chhuah hman tawh a, amah thi mahse, a ruang hlauhawm chu a bo chuang lo. Antitoxin hian chu mi tûr hlauhawm chu a seh da \hin a ni).
(antithisis), n. a kalh zâwnga khaikhinna, kalhna.
(antiuas), adj. a langa thianghlim, thiam inchantîr.
(antiutawrd), adj. zirtîr loh, zilh loh, nungchang mawi lo, mâwl.
(antrabld), adj. buai lo, ngaihngam, dam.
(antraid), adj. chhin loh, fiah loh.
(antrawdn), adj. rah loh, dai loh, tlawh loh.
(antru), adj. rinawm lo, dik lo.
(antruth), n. dâwt thu.
(antu), prep. see to, hnênah.
(antuain), v.t. hlûm phelh.
(antuist), v.t. phelh.
(antâwnim), n. thu awmze inkalh, a letling (Upa antonym chu naupang a ni. Hniam antonym chu sâng).
(anuaind), v.t. and v.i. hlûm phelh.
(anuaiz), adj. fing lo, âtthlak.
(anuantid), adj. duh loh, hnâwl.
(anuardhi), adj. tlâk lo, tling lo.
(anuavaring), adj. phêt lo.
(anueiri), adj. fimkhur lo, inring lo.

(anânas), n. lakhuihthei, anana an ti bawk.
(anîkual), adj. intluk lo, inchen lo, inrual lo, inang lo, tlin lo.
(anîmia), n. thisena a mûr sen chi pâi tlêm, dâng, dawldâng. anaemic, adj.
(anîsthetik, anesthetik, -thitik), adj., n. hriatna thazâm tichawmawlh or tihit (tihik) thei, hnimhlum anga na hriatna tibo thei.
(ap), adj. chung ber.
(ap), adv. and prep. chungah, chhakah, chho zâwngin, hmâr lamah, thlengin.
(ap-), adj. hrisêl, tling, tlâk, nun ngîl.
(ap-), adv. chho zâwng. upward(s), adv. chho zâwngin.
(ap-), n. a vâwrtâwp.
(ap-), n. mi hausate ningkhâwng la hre ve si lo mi dingchhuak thar thut.
(ap-), v.t. chawi sâng. n. chawi sânna, rilru zângkhaina, engthâwlna.
(ap-greid), v.t. kal chhohtîr, n. chho.
(ap-kantri), adv. and adj. ram rilah.
(apar), adj. chungnung zâwk. n. pheikhawk chung (a kephah tiam lovin).
(aparishn), n. thil inlâr, thlarau.
(apartein), v.i. inkaihhnawih, kâwk, intuh.
(apartenans), n. thildanga bet, thildang nêna inkûngkaih. appurtenant, adj.
(apartiar, apachar), n. kua, âwng.
(apathi), n. ngaihsak lohna, khawngaihna neih lohna, thinlunga vei neih lohna. apathetic, adj. apathetically, adv.
(apawint), v.t. ruat, hna pe.
(apawji), n. arsi inhlat lai ber (Lei hêl tura rocket kah chhuahte pawh hi an sân lai ber chu apogee a ni a, an hniam (lei an hnaih) lai ber chu perigee a ni thung).
(apawkalips), n. Thuthlung Thara Thupuan, thu puan rêng rêng. apocalyptic, adj.
(apawkawpe, apawkawpi), n. thu mala a hawrawp hnuhnûng ber paih (Poetry-ah an hmang bîk. The eternal aiah Th' eternal. In the night aiah I' the night).
(apawkrifa), n. sakhaw bua a ziaktu hriat chian chiah ngam loh (Thuthlung Hluia kohhran \henkhat ina bu 14 an hnâwl tâk ang kha).
(apawl), v.t. tithlabâr, ti\im sung sung.
(apawlawg), n. thufing (Esopa thawnthu ang hi).
(apawlawji), n. thlavâng hauhna, inchhîrna, ngaihdam dilna.
(apawn), prep. chungah.
(apawpleksi), n. thluaka thisen kal buai emaw vânga tlûk thut (|awng hmangah chuan rilru buai, â). apoplectic, -al, adjs.
(apawsl), n. Gospel theh darh tura ruat, Tirhkoh, eng pâwl pawha a khaipa or zuitu rinawm.
(apawstrawfi), n. he chhinchhiahna (') hi, mi biak laklawh laia mi dang biak thut.
(apawtheawsis), n. pathiana siam or bia, mihring emaw, thurin emaw chawi vul.
(apawzit), adj. rem, remchâng, âwm. appositely, adv. appositeness.
(apbreid), v.t. puh, hau.
(apbringing), n. seilenna, chawi lenna.
(apeis), adv. rang takin.
(aperatas, aparatas), n. hmanrua.
(apetait), n. tisa châkna, chaw châkna, ril\âm.
(aphawld), v.t. tungding, kengkawh, chawi kâng, chelh, \an.
(aphawlstar), v.t. lukham leh lachilh lam siam, tukverh puanzâr ilo siam.
(apheld), pa.t. and pa.p. of uphold. tungding, kengkawh.
(aphil), chho zâwngin, harsatna kârah. adj. chho, harsa, khirh.
(aphiv), v.t. chawi kâng. upheaval, n. a chunglânga so chhuahna, buaina.
(apisîz, êpisîe), pl. of apex.
(apkip), n. khawsak rêlna, inchâwmna.
(aplai), v.t., v.i. hnawih, chuktuah, chunga tla, kâwk, dîl, ngên.
(apland), n. hmun zo. adj. zo.
(aplawd), v.t. kut bênga fak or chawimawi, thâwm neia fak. applause, n. applausive, adj.
(aplawng, aplow tiin a ri lek lek zâwk a ni), n. ding char, ngêng.
(appendaisitis), n. rilphîr nâ.
(aprait), adj. ding ngîl, mi dik, fel. adv. ding ngîlin.
(apraiz), v.t. hriattîr, hrilh.
(aprapt), adj. bung thut, âwih thut, chhumbung, bung.
(aprawbeishn), n. remtihna, phalna. sent on approbation, an lei duh nge duhlo tia endik hmasak atâna mi hnêna zawrhsum thawn.
(aprawksimeit), adj. vêl, tluk teuh. v.t., v.i. hnaih. approximately, adv. approximation, n.
(aprawprieit), v.t. manhi tâna zuah or hmang, eng emaw bîk atâna zuah or ruat. (aprawpriat) adj. rem, mil, âwm. appropriately, adv. appropriateness, nn.
(aprawpâw), adv. zûl takin, rem takin, chumi kâwk or chumi azârah chuan. adj. chu mi lam hawi chuan, a hun remchâng (French \awng a ni).
(aprawr), n. buai bengchheng. uproarious (-rias), adj.
(apreiz), v.t. man bithliah, a hlut dân rêl, thil awmdan enthlithlai. appraisal, appraisement, nn.
(aprentis), n. hna zirtîr, mi tharlâm, zir tûra inpe. v.t. apprenticeship, n. zirna, zir tûra inpêkna.
(aprihend, aprehend), v.t. man, hrethiam, hlau. apprehensible, adj. apprehention, n.
(aprikawt), n. theite chikhat.
(aprâwch), v.t., v.i. pan, hnaih, tluk teuh, mi va bia. n. hnaihna, panna kawng, kalkawng, mi va biakna. approachable, adj.
(aprîsieit), v.t. a hlut dân hrethiam, \ha ti, a man tipung. v.t. man pung.
(aprût), v.t. a zung chawpa pawt phawng.
(aprûv), v.t., v.i. entîr, remti, pawm, fak. approval, n.
(apsaid), n. chunglam. upside-down, letling.
(apset), v.t. letling, paih thlu, khaikhup, timangang, tibuai. n. linglehna, hrehawmna.
(apsteirz), adv. chhâwng chung lamah/chungnungah.
(apstrim), adv. lui hnâr lamah.
(apstrâwk), n. ziaha thai chhoh.
(aptaras), adj. thla nei lo.
(apteik), n. hriat ran dân.
(apthrast), n. hawlh chhoh, tawn chhoh.
(aptitiud), n. remchânna, milna, inpeihna, tlinna, rilru thlêkna lam.
(apâche), n. Red Indian hnam khat. apash tia lam rîk a nih chuan mi butut, mi rura.
(apâwrshn), v.t. bithliah neia sem chhuak.
(apêrent, aparent), adj. hmuh theih, a lan dân ringawtah chuan.
(apîl), v.i. ngên, \anchhan, mit la, rorêlna sâng zâwka thubuai chhawm.
(apîrient), adj. inkeu or kau, inhawng, kaw \huah thei chi. n. kaw\huahna.
(apîs), adv. pakhat zêlin, pakhat zêl atân.
(apîz), v.t. tilungawi, tlawn lungawi. appeasement, n.
(ar), v.i. kal sual, sual.
(arab), n. Palestina chheh vêla hnam chikhat. Arabian (arêbian), adj.
(arabl), adj. leilet or thlawhhma atâna tlâk leilung.
(arai), adj., adv. \i\oh, kawm ngel ngul, dik lo leh mawi lo taka kawi or thle.
(arait), adv. dikin, a dik zâwngin.
(araiv), v.i. thleng, thlen. arrival, n.
(araiz), v.i. tho ding, lâng, lo piang, lo chawr, lo awm.
(arant), adj. sual, chimawm.
(araund), prep. velin, hual, vâk vêl.
(arauz), v.t. titho, tiharh.
(araw), n. thal (kibâr nei).
(arawgeit), v.t. mahni tâna hauh, huamhauh.
(arawrut), n. pângbâl chi khat.
(arawz), v.i. tho.
(arban), adj. khawpui lam thil.
(arbawr), n. hnim \ona tual, huan, thingbuk hnuaia kawng, huana \hutna daihlim.
(arbawrial), adj. thinga chêng, thing ang. arborescent, adj. abrorescence, n.
(arbein), adj. khawpui rawng kai, nun sâng.
(arbitar), n. thu lai vawtu, thubuai remtu, rorêltu, endiktu.
(arbitrari), adj. dân mumal nei lo, mi dang râwn lova thil ti, mahni thua lum, mumal lo.
(archbishawp), n. bishop zînga a hotu.
(archdaiawsîz), n. bishop bial (puithiam or pastor satliah bial aia zau).
(archdiuk), n. lal upa sâng pâwl, Austria ram lal fapa.
(archdîkawn), n. pastor or puithiam sâng pâwl (bishop dawttu).
(archh), n. kaihkulh. v.t. kaihkulha sa, tikûl. adj. fing vervêk. Prefix a nih chuan a ber (Arch-enemy - Hmêlma lian ber).
(archhin), n. naupang, chimawm.
(ardiuas), adj. harsa, âwih.
(arei), n. mumal neia intlar, thawmhnaw, bungrua. v.t. dah rem, thuam, chei.
(arein), v.t. hêk, puh, chhuahchhâl.
(areinj), v.t. siam fel, dah rem, tlar, buatsaih, zaipâwl ilo sak atâna hla buatsaih. arrangement, n.
(arest), v.t. titâwp, lâksak or chhuhsak, mi mit la, man. n. inmanna, tihtâwpna.
(argas), n. mit za nei, 'Argus' tluka harhvâng or inrâlring.

(aristawkrasi), n. mi lian rorêl, mi lian pâwl. aristocrat, n.

(arj), v.t. kar, nawr, tur. n. châk thutna.
(arjensi), n. hmanhmawh \ûlna, hmanhmawhna. urgent, hmanhmawh, \ûl tut tut.
(ark), n. thil kual, bial pangkhing, electric \êk êng.

(arkaivz), sawrkâr lehkha hlui dah khâwmna.

(astarawid), n. ni hêltu arsi (planet) tênau. (A tam zâwk chu Sikeisen leh Jupiter inkârah an her a. Entlang lian ber pawhin 1,500 vêl chauh an la hmu chhuak thei a. An zînga a lian ber chu Ceres a ni a, hawlh tlangin mêl 480 leka hrawl a ni).

(astraid), adv. nemngheh. adj., adv. kâr, kârkalak.

(astrawlawji), n. arsi inher dân a\anga mihringte aien theihna (Hmânlai chuan an ngaisâng hle \hin a. Tûnlai erawh zawngin kutze en ang lekah an ngai tawh a, mahse astrology hi arsi chanchin zirna tak tak astronomy hring chhuaktu a nih avângin thil duhawm chu a ni thawkhat e).
(astrawnawmi), n. vân sâng thil (ni leh thla leh arsi) chanchin zirna science.

(atarmawst), adj. tâwp ber, hla ber.
(atarni), n. ukil (solicitor an ti bawk).
(atashe), n. palai \huihruai or hnungzui.
(atavizm), n. hringtu ni lova pi leh pute zia khawk (Chuvângin hmalam sâwn lova hnungtawlh tehkhin nân an hmang \hin). atavistic, adj.
(atawl), n. tuifinriata rannung chi khat ruang (coral) tling khâwmina thliarkâr a siam (Dân narânin a kual pup a, a laiah dîl thûk lo tak a awm \hin).
(atein), v.t., v.i. thleng, tlin, hlawhtling. attainable, adj. attainment, n.
(atemt), v.t. tum, bei, chhin.
(ateniueit), v.t., v.i. tipan, pan, tidal, dal. atte nuate (d), adj. pan, dal, chêr, ria.
(atest), v.t. hriatpui, nemnghet, a dika chhâl. attestation, n.
(atharst), adv. tuihâl, châk, nghâkhlel.
(athlît), n. insawizawi mi. athletic (athletik), adj.
(athuawrt), adv. a sîr zâwngin, a \helhin, buaithlâk takin.

(atiun), v.t. rimawia siam, miltîr, khuang rualtîr.
(atmawsfiar), n. boruak. atmospheric (atmawsferik), adj.

(atrawfi), n. pangti mûr or pêng chêr sâwng zo or tê tial tial.

(atribiut), v.t. a nihna ve rênga hmehbel, puh, hnamhnawih. n. ziarânga tel. attribution, n.
(atrishn), n. innâwt, innâwt phuai, inhrawt da.
(atâwn), v.i. zângnadawm, lungawina siamsak, tlan. atonement, n.
(auawk), v.t. tho.
(auawsh), adv. tui fâwn theh phâkah, tui len kual vêl.
(auchh), interj. aiah! (na entîrna).
(auei), adv. hmalam panin, kalpui, eng lai pawhin, vatin, chawplehchilhin, a\angin, awm lo.
(aueik), v.t., v.i. muhîl kai tho, tur tho, tur harh, tiphûr, tho.
(aueir), adj. hria. awareness, n.
(aueit), v.t., v.i. nghâk, châng, hmabâk.

(aur), pron. kan ta. ours, pron. kan ta. (these are our books = these books are ours).

(autlandish), adj. mi tih ang lo, mak.
(autlaw), n. hnawhchhuah, suamhmang. v.t. dân huang a\anga hnawtchhuak, khap.
(autle), n. pharh chhuah, theh chhuah, sênso.
(autlet), n. chhuahna, hlet.
(autlive), v.t. dam rei lama khûm.
(autluk), n. hmelhmang, khaw thlirna, khaw hawi dân, hun rawn inher dân tûr.
(autmanûvar), v.t. bum kawi, inveh thiam lama khûm.
(autmawst), adj. pâwnta ber.
(autnambar), v.t. tam lama khûm.
(autpawst), n. ram rila hmun khuar, râl vên bûk.
(autpeis), v.t. aia kal chak zâwk leh pel.
(autput), n. siam chhuah zât, siam zât.
(autpâwr), v.t. leih bua. outpour, outpouring, nn. bua, chhuak zawih zawih, tam tâwk tak.
(autraid), n. aia chak zâwka sakawr chungchuang, sakawr nêna lehpel.
(autrait), adj., adv. a ngial a nganin, tlang, kawng engkimah, nghâl, vat.
(autraival), v.t. khûm.
(autran), v.t. tlân pêl, khûm.
(autrejas), adj. thinurthlâk, rapthlâk.
(autrigar), n. puanzâr lawng kah parhna, vaicha nghahchhan, lawnglêng.
(autrij), n. thiltih râwng tak. outrage, (autreij), v.t. nasa taka tithinur.
(autsaid), n. pâwn. adj. pâwn lam. adv., prep. pâwnah.
(autsaiz), adj. hrawl lua.
(autset), n. a tir, \anna.
(autshain), v.t. ên lama khûm, aia langsâr zâwk.
(autspred), v.t. pharh. n. ram pharh.
(autstrechh), v.t. tilawr, phah chhuak.
(autuawrn), adj. hlui, rawih.
(autvai), v.t. ela khûm.
(autvawt) v.t. vote-a hneh.
(autwei), v.t. bûk, rih lama khûm.
(auîk), adv. kâr tin, kâr khatah.
(auîri), adj. ning.
(avalânsh), n. vûr min, vûr tawlh.
(avangkiular), adj. nute nu\a emaw, pate unaupa (pa-mi) emaw lam thil (uncle adjective).
(avardipoiz), adj., n. British bûkna. (Pound 1 = 16 ounces).
(avarij), n. chawhruala chhuak, a vântlâng.
(avaris), n. duhâmna, sum ûm luattukna. avaricious, adj.
(avars), adj. ngaina lo, hua. averseness, n.
(avau), v.t. a langa puang, inpuang.
(avauchh), v.t. tih tak meuhva chhâl.
(avawid), v.t. pumpelh, pehhêl, hnar.
(avawkêshn), n. A dik tak chuan mahni hna pângngai kalsana hna pênhleh thawh hi a ni a; mahse mahni hna pângngai tih nân hian an hmang ta a ni. Mahni bûrna hna.
(avawnt), interj. Thlâwk kat rawh! Thlâwk bo rawh!
(aveil), v.t. chhawrbâwk, \angkaipui.
(aveniu), n. kalkawng or kawtthlêr, dân narânin a sîr tuaka thing phun tlar, a \huanga thing phun tlar, tih dân kâwng or kawnghmang.
(avenj), v.t. thungrûl, phuba lâksak. avenger, n.
(aviditi), n. duhâmna, phûrna. avidly, adv.
(avn), n. chhang urna thuk, thuk.
(avî), interj., n. chibai, Mari an chibaina (avi aiah ave an ti bawk \hin).
(aw revuar), interj. chibai, dam takin (French \awng - kan intawh leh hma chu).
(aw), n. \ihbai khawp hiala zahna or hlauhna, mak tihna. v.t. mak ti, hlau, \ih.
(aw), v.t. ba, vei.
(awbarn), adj. sen-uk.
(awbaw, awbawe, awbawi), n. ham rîk, pâwt pâwt chi.
(awbbtreperas), adj. bengchheng, buai.
(awbdiurat), adj. luhlul, khirh, ngawltâwt.
(awbelas), n. phêk mawnga thu sawi fiah tûr chhinchhiahna kros (†). obeli (awbelai), pl.
(awbesâns), n. zahderna thiltih, zahdera chibai bûkna.
(awbfaskheit), v.t. tithim, tibuai. obfuscation, n.
(awbidiens), n. thu âwihna. obedient, adj. thu awih.
(awbjargeit), v.t., v.i. zilhhauh.
(awbjekt), n. thil hriat theih, tum, thil, thil hmuh, rilru pawn lam thil. v.t. hnial, kalh.
(awblaij), v.t. phût, sakhithingchunglâwn, tha bat, lâwm. obligation, n. tiamna, tih ngei ngei tur, lawmthu sawi bat. obligatory, adj. tih tûr \ûl, bat. obliging, adj. phal, tawh awlsam, hawihhawm.
(awblawkhui), n. sawi chhiatna, inhauhna \awngka.
(awblawng), adj. sâwl.
(awbleit), adj. mûm pêr deuh.
(awblitareit), v.t. nuai reh, tichimit. obliteration, n.
(awblivians), n. hriat chian lohna, mangnghilhna, theihnghilhna, nikhaw hriat lohna.
(awblêshn), n. inthawinaa thil hlan.
(awblîk), adj. âwn, a thawi zâwng.
(awbnawkshas), adj. duhawm lo, ngeiawm.
(awbsawlesent), adj. hlui, hman ngai tawh loh. obselesence, n.
(awbsawlît), adj. hman tawh loh, hluihlâwn tawh, hlui.
(awbsekhuiz), n. vuina, sûnna.
(awbsikhuias), adj. hmuhsitawm khawpa inphah hnuai, ingaitlâwm lutuk.
(awbskhiur), adj. biru, chiang lo, lâr lo, challang lo. v.t hliah, thup.
(awbstakl), n. hnawksak, dâltu.
(awbstinat), adj. luhlul, ngawltâwt.
(awbstrakt), v.t. dang, dâl, hnawh, hliah. obstruction, dâltu, danna, hliahtu, tihbahlahtu. obstructive, adj. hnawk, tibahlah thei, dîpdâl thei.
(awbsîn), adj. bawlhhlawh, zahmawh. obsceneness, obscenity (awbseniti), nn.
(awbtein), v.t. hmu, nei, dawng, la. v.i. tlâk, chîng mêk.
(awbtius), adj. bil, kâk zau, chhawih, chut.
(awbtrûd), v.t inrawlh lui, huangtau. obstrusion, n.
(awbvars), adj. leh lam, hmachhawn, pawisa tlang hmai lam (milem chuanna lam).
(awbvias), adj. hriat sa, lang tlang sa.
(awbviet), v.t. \ûl lova siam, hnâwl, pumpelhtîr.
(awbzarv), v.t. thlîr, enthla, hmu, chungchang sawi, zâwm, serh.
(awbê), v.i., v.t. zawm, thu âwih.
(awbîs), adj. thau. obesity, obeseness, nn.
(awd), adj. kawpkim lo, kawp nei lo, chuang, bâng, chuangliam, mak, dân ang lo.
(awdibl), adj. benga hriat theih, hriat tham.
(awdiens), n. ngaihthlâkna, ngaithlatu, inlêngte kawmna (In chhûnga ennawm entute hi audience an ti a. Pâwna entu erawh hi chu spectator an ti thung).
(awdisi), n. hmasâng Grik chanchin sawina hla.
(awdit), n. pawisa vawn dân leh hman dân endikna.
(awditawriam), n. ennawm entute awmna pindan zau.
(awdêshas), adj. huai, ngampa, kâwlhrâwng. audaciousness, audacity, nn.

(bakanal), n. adj. zu pathian betu puithiam, zu heh, zu lam thil.
(baksam), adj. thau, chawm, chum leh duhawm, hlim thei, tha za thei, tîng thei.
(baktîria), n. hrik chi hrang hrang, enlenna nena hmuh tham chauh.
(balad), n. hla chi khat.
(balans), n. bûkna (patla), rilru fim, thil inchawih, thil chuangtlai, pawisa hisâp hnua a chuangbâng la awm. v.t. bûk, tehkhin, khaikhin, intluka siam.
(balastar), n. vawn bân, chelhtu ngul, palchawi.
(balawt), n. vote pêkna lehkha, v.t. thlang, inthlang.
(bale), n. lâm ropui ber chi.
(balerina), n. ballet lâm thiam hmeichhia.
(balgerian), adj., n. Bulgaria thil, Bulgaria hnam or \awng.
(balihu), n. bengchheng taka thil sawi mawi.
(balj), n. v.i. poh, tolâwt, lawr chhuak.
(balk), n. tam lam, len lam, tam zâwk, tam tak, thil lian tak, bungraw phurh.
(balkawni), n. in chhâwng bathlar, banga chuanna tolawt.
(balun), n. balûn.
(bam), n. mawngtam, pa nikhualo.
(bam), n. rimtui, damdawi hriak, damdawi.
(bambl), v.i. zei lo taka chetla, buarchuar taka khawsa.
(bambuzi), v.t. bum, tihder.
(bamp), v.i., v.t. su dawp, tauh chawrh, su nghing, ri dur. n. tauh chawrhna, ri dawp, boruak chêt buai avânga thlawhna nghîng dawt dawt, pûn, vûng.
(bampkin), n. thingtlâng mi mâwl.
(bampshas), adj. ngeiawm khawpa induh or inngaisang.
(ban), n. chhang thlum (bâwn kan tih ang chi). n. sazupui leh thehlei lam chi koh duatna (hming).
(banchh, bansh), n. têl, hlâwm, hung, pangpar têl (hmer khat). v.i., v.t., têl khâwm, inhâwr khâwm, a bâwra awm.
(band), n. tuihâwk ilo dan nana lei tian.
(bandl), n., v.i., v.t. têl, tumtêl, tuam, hlâwm.
(banggalaw), n. bangla.
(banggl), n. mumal lo taka thil tih. v.i. zei lo taka khawsa, v.t. buarchuar taka ti.
(bangk), n. mual pâwng, tlâng dung, luikam, vaukam. v.t., v.i. a hê zâwnga thlawhna thlâwk. bank, n. pawisa dah thatna or pûk theihna company. v.t., v.i. pawisa dah \ha, rinchhan, rinpuia neih.
(bangk), n. riahna pindan, bahrik.
(bangkam), n. a hluar zâwnga thu sawina, \awngkam mawihnai ringawt ûma thu sawi, thil ho, thutak pai lo.
(bangkrapt), n. adj. sumdâwnna kawnga tla chhia, pawisa nei lo. bankruptcy, n.
(bangkuet, bangkiut), n. ruaipui. v.i ruai anga chaw ei.
(bangl), n. ngûn.
(bani), n. sazupui koh duatna, sazupui hming.
(banit), n. hmeichhe puan lukhum (nurse leh naute lukhum pawhzih ang chi hi), motor khâwl chungkhuh, khâwl khuhna rêng rêng.
(banjaw), \ing\ang (guitar) chi khat (dân narânin a hmai chu savun a ni \hin).
(bant), v.i. ki nêna insi. butt nen thuhmun.
(banting), n. puanzâr, cheimawina puanzâr, flag.
(baptaiz), v.t. baptisma chantir, hming sa. baptism (baptizm), n.
(bara), n. borough nen thuhmun.
(barak), n. sipai rual riah khâwmna in.
(baraw), n. enkawltu pâwl nei khawpui, Parliamenta aiawhtu Member nei khawpui.
(baraw), n. kua, tawmna, bihrûkna, v.t. kaw hreuh.
(baraw), n. leivûng paihna tawlailir nawr lirh chi emaw, a lirh loh chi emaw pawh (A nawrh lirh chi hi chu dân narânin 'wheel-barrow' an ti \hîn). barrow, n. thlân chung pâwng.
(baraw), n. nawr lirh chi tawlailîr ke pakhat nei.
(barawmetar), n. sik leh sa tehna sana, boruak chhah leh pan (boruak danglam) dân tehna khâwl, khaw thlir lâwkna khâwl.
(barawn), n. lal tenau, lalber hnuaia ram zau khat awptu, thil siamna hmunpuia a hotu.
(barazh, bârij), n. ngar, lungreng den, bit taka silai mu kah chhuah (a barrage of questions - a rual emaw, a indawt emaw zawhna tam tak siam).
(barbaras), adj. hnam mâwl, hnam â thil, nunrawng.
(barbekhiu), v.t. a puma em hmin, pum rep. n. sa rêpna rap, sa rêng rêng a puma rêp.
(bargandi), n. Burgandy khaw chhuak uain chi khat.
(bargar) n. tualchhûng mi khawpuia chêng.
(bargawmastar), n. Holland leh German rama khawpui bawrhsap.
(bargin), n. intiamna, inremna, hlâwk taka indâwrna. v.i. dâwr, nêp, dawn, intiam. bargainer, n. dawntu.
(barglar), n. rûkru, rûkru zân vâk. v.t. ru.
(bargreiv), n. khawpui hotu, kulh awptu.
(barial), n. phûm.
(bariar), n. râl dai, râl danna kulh, ramri, tâwp chin, thil daidanna.
(barikeid), n. kulh ang renga kawng ping, \huai pui anga kawng lo dâl. v.t. kawng hnawh ping.
(baritawn), baritone, n. bass leh tenor inkar aw thûm ve tak.
(barj), n. lawng a kuang mawng zâwl chi. v.i. zei lo taka che, su bup.
(barjan), v.i. kuhmûm, zik no chhuah, \hang, dawk.
(barjis), n. tualchhûng mi, tualchhûng mi challang.
(bark), n. lawng.
(bark), v.t. that, rêk hlum, (chuvangin tehkhinnaah chuan) thâwm nei lova hmet mit or hmet dâi.
(barlap), n. thil fûnna leh banga bel chi \helretpuan.
(barlesk), n. a ho zâwnga mi tih dân zirna, thawnthu or lemchan iloa a hluar leh a nuihzatthlak zâwnga mi thu phuah or lemchan dân zir.
(barli), adj. hrawl, sa nghet.
(barli), n. chhangphut buh chi khat.
(barnakl), n. chengkawl or tuikeplung chi, chutianga \hiante kianga bei nghet mi, \hian nghet. barnacle, n. sakawr tha za tihreh nâna a hmuia thil an vuah.
(barnûs), n. puan lukhum (Arab hnam khum chi ang).
(barth), n. lawng chawlh hmuna lawng inthlunna, lawng, thlawhna, rêl, etc. a \hutna or mutna pindan. v.t. lawng thlung, mi \hutna pe.
(bas), v.i. thlâwk, vi, vung, ri cher cher, phun sep sep, rang taka chetla (\awng lâr a ni). v.t., v.i, tivî, phun neuh neuh, a rûka thu theh darh, thirhrui khapna hmet ri. n. a vî zâwnga ri.
(basilas), n. natna hrik chi khat. (Tuberculosis bacillus - TB).
(basl), v.i. phili, buai chung. n. buai philina, che vêl.
(bass), n. sangha chi khat.
(bast), n. lim a âwm achin chung lam chuah lang, taksa a lai achin chung lam.
(bastiawn), n. kulh hungna kila khaw thlirna in sâng, inhumna, râl vênna.
(basûn), n. hamrîk aw hniam tak.
(bat), prep. tiam lovin, chauh lo chu (all but him, all except him - ani chauh lo chu), conj. mahse.

(bat), v.i., v.t., sî, tauh. n. sîkna, tauhna. uain ilo dahna thingzêm lian tak. butt, n. a hmâwr hrawl lam, thingbul, thingtuluang, savun chhah, meizial zûk bung (paih hnu), kuangbâng, chhumbung. n. sangha phâk chi rêng rêng, nghavâng.
(batak), n. mawngtam.
(batar), n. bawnghnute hriak (thil kan nân leh chhanga tah), fakderna. v.t. butter tât, fakder, tlawn.
(bathawmetar), n. tui thûk lam tehna khâwl.
(bathimetar), n. bathometer.
(batis), n. lungbang chelh nghehna pâwng, thil chelh nghehna, v.t. do, chelh nghet.
(batl), n. indona, insualna. v.i. do, sual, bei, chai.
(batlar), n. milian inchhâng vawng feltu chhiahhlawh.
(batn), n. kawrkilh, thil hlutna nei lo, thil tênau. v.t. kilh, kawrkilh kilh, tichip or hmet phui.
(bau), n. thing\ang or zâr.

(bau), v.i., kûn, bû, chibai, inphah hnuai, v.t. mi zahawmte bu chunga chibai bûka hruai lut. make one's bow, chibai bûk zeta kal chhuak, inthiar bo hmaa ennawm chhuahtu ina bu chunga entu mipui a chibaina.
(bauar), n. huan chhûnga hahchawlhna bûk, daihlim, pindan chhûngril, hmeichhe pindan pual bîk.
(bauari), n. leilet, thlawhhma (America \awng).
(bauau), n. ui bauh ri (bauh bauh).
(bauel), n. kawchhung (rîl, pumpui, etc.), thil chhûngril rêng rêng. to move one's bowel, dailêng, ê.
(baund), n. phal chin, tiam chin, huang chhung. v.t. chin tuk, khuahkhirh, hual vêl. v.i. zuang, \um, sawt.
(baunden), adj. intiam, intuk, thil tih ba.
(bauns), v.i., v.t. sawt, \um, tîng.
(baunti), n. thilphalna, thilthlâwnpDk, sipaia \ang tura inthlêmna pawisa.
(bauntias), bountiful, adjs. thil phal.
(baut), n. thawh hun, thawh ni hun engemaw chhûng awh, inelna, intihsiakna, luhaia tlûk, sual, tlun.
(baw), interj. mi dawizepte tih\haihna or vauna \awngka.
(baw), n. mipa inchei uluk or uar mi, ngaizawngtu tlangval.
(bawb), v.i., v.t. su or bu zauh zauh. n. shilling khat (\awng lepchiah a ni).
(bawbi), n. police (\awng lepchiah a ni).
(bawbtail), n. mei tawi, mei tan tawi.
(bawchh), n. vun durh or vûng, \awp deuhva thil bel, hnathawh phuai. v.t. buan deuhva bel .
(bawd), v.i., v.t. hril lâwk, kâwk, entir lâwk.
(bawdar), v.t. tibuai, zar mangang, buaipui.
(bawdi), n. taksa, ruang, taksa kut-ke tel lo, khâwl leh thil rêng rênga a pêng pawimawh lai ber, thil hlangna lai ber, tisa thil, rual khat, mihring inthurual.
(bawdigard), n. lal vêngtu sipai.
(bawdikin), n. taksa (body) tê tak tê. 'Od's bodikins (God's bodikin), Pathian taksa or pumraw tê tak (\awngkam awmze nei mang lo a ni).
(bawdis), n. hmeichhe kawr hnuai. Tunlai chuan hmeichhe kawrchung chhîng tih nân pawh an hmang tawh.
(bawdkin), n. chemtê (zum), thil chhut pawhna tê tak tê, hriau lian bil tak.
(bawdl), n. tlereuh, naupang thil khalh.
(bawgi), n. thil hlauhawm leh rapthlâk, ramhuai, phûng.
(bawgi), n. thil hlauhawm leh rapthlâk, ramhuai, phûng.
(bawgl), v.i. hlauhawm hmaa tîm, hlauva phu zawk, hreh vânga tâwi khawtlai, tîm. n. chhuanlam, buarchuar taka thil tih.
(bawi), n. lawng kaihhruai nâna tuia thil mûm (kaihbu ang reng) lâng thei an thlun beh. v.t. tuia lâng thei tûra siam, tikâng, chawi sâng, tiphûr, tihlim, chhawmdâwl.
(bawi), n. mipa naupang. Kawng tam takah chuan patling rual (sipai, hnathawkho, etc.) pawh hi boys an ti \hîn a, ram \henkhatah chuan mipa naupang tirhchhiahte pawh hi boy an ti \hin.
(bawihud), n. mipa naupan lai.
(bawikawt), v.t. n. kawmserh, ensan, tuithlâr, mausâm.
(bawil), v.t., v.i. and n. so, chhuang so, sona, pûn, khawihli hnâi neia vûng, thinur so.
(bawinaif), n. chemte zum hnung lam leh hriam lam nei.
(bawistaras), adj. buai, bengchheng, thunun hleih theih lohva buai.
(bawks), n. thingrem, bâwm, rel pindam, pindan voh bîk, Krismas lâwmzâwng. box, (bawks), n. inhnek or inchumna. v.t., v.i. hnek, chûm.
(bawl), n. thing suih mûm lianpui theha infiamna. v.t. ball theh lîr, ball vawm. bowl, n. chawhtawlh, berhbu, khuhhriang dar tak, thil kum or khuar lai.
(bawlar), n. puan lawng ngul thlunna hruizen.
(bawlas), n. thil mûm.
(bawld), adj. huaisen, pawngpawrh, huangtau, luhlul, langsâr, bung vut.
(bawld), adj. lukawlh, hmul nei lo.
(bawldar), n. lungpui.
(bawlsam), n. nuaithang.
(bawlshavik), n. Russia rama Communist thurin kenkawh tumna kawnga a vung pâwl, Communist pâwla tawrawt zual. Bolshevist, n.
(bawlt), n. kawng kalhna thîr (bawl\u), \êk, v.t. bawl\u a kawng kalh, kawl or thîr khaidiat buntir, v.t. tlân thut, zuang thut, tho thut.
(bawm), n. and v.t. bawm, thil puak thei, bawm thlâk khum.
(bawmawnd), n. khawvêl nawmna.
(bawmbardîr), n. laipui pu zînga a bel kai hniam ber pâwl.
(bawnas), n. pawisa pung bâka a lukhâwng dang awm, thawhlâwm pung insema mahni chanvo, hlawhfa or hnathawktute hlawh bâka lawmman pêk.
(bawnfair), n. meipui chheh dai hâl.
(bawnz), n. Buddha puithiam.
(bawr), n. vawkpa (dân naranin nghalchang), vawk or sanghal sa.

(bawr), v.t. chhun pawp, hreuh, ning, kham. n. thil vih kuak, vih pawp, silai kaw zau lam, mi khamawm, titi thiam lo. bore, (bawr), n. tuifinriat a\anga lui chhuaha tui fâwn lût (mel 60 vel laia thui te a lûtin luia lawngleng pawh a nghaisa hrep thei a ni).
(bawraks), n. damdawi bawlhlo chi khat.
(bawraw), n. pûk, hawh, mi tih dân or hnam dang dân entawn.

(bawrd), n. thingzai phêk, thing phêk, chaw, thu rêl tura \hu khâwm (committee, council), thil phâk chhah tak (lehkha khawng, tile, etc.), insathahhneh, chess or draught khelhna thil phêk, hriattirna or hriattirna târ chhuahna (e.g. notice board); (lawng lamah chuan) lawng sîr. v.t. thing phêka khuh, thing phêk phah, nitin thil a man neia mi chaw eitir, lawng, thlawhna etc. a chuang kai.
(bawrdam), n. ninna, khamna.
(bawrdaw), n. Bordeaux khaw uain siam.
(bawreaz), n. hmâr thli. horeal, adj.
(bawriêlis), n. hmâr tâwp vân sanga rawng mawi tinrênga electric zung inkâp êng pup pup chi. Chhim tâwp lama mi chu 'aurora australis' (awtrê-lis) a ni.
(bawrn), pa.p. of bear, châwi, zâwn, phur.
(baws), n. thil bâwk. v.t. tlereuh bâwk nêna chei. boss, n. hotu, hruaitu, thuneitu. v.t. ho, kilkawi, mi chaldelh.
(baws), pl. of beau.
(bawsn), n. lawng hmanraw lam (a lawngleng phurh, a puanzar, a hruizen, etc.) enkawltu bîk.
(bawst), v.i. uang, inchhuang, v.t. uanpui, chhuang.
(bawt), n. lawng (dân naranin lawnglêng; mahse lawng lian tih nân pawh an hmang).

(bawtam), n, mawng, chhuat, a hniam ber, a bul, mawngtam, \hutthlenga a \hutphah lai hi, lawng chhuat (a kuang chhuat), li mawng, tuipui mawng, v.t. nghahchhan. at bottom, a dik a dik chuan. be at the bottom of, a chhan or a titu bera chu.
(bawtani), n. hnim, thing leh thlâi rêng rêng chanchin zirna.
(bawtl), n. saidawiûm, ûm, peng. v.t. saidawiûma thun, ûm or bûra thei rah ilo um, insûm, inkhuahkhirh.
(bawtri), n. theipui chi khat (Buddha zuitute ngaihsân êm êm).
(bawvain), adj. bâwng lam thil, bâwng ang.

(bazard), n. mu lian chi, sava chi \henkhat, mi phutkhat, mi dawihzep, mi \uanfum, lungphûr thlahtu, mei leh khâwnvar ênga thlawh luh thut thut chîng, (chuvangin) buai deuh nuaia thil ti thut thut mi.

(bazilika), n. hmasâng Rom vânglaia bazâr atan emaw rorêl nân emawa in hrawl pui an sak, kil li leh dung leh vâng neia an sak. An Kristian hnuah Biak Inah te an let a. Biak In ropui tak tihna ang deuhvah an hmang ta.
(bazûka), n. rocket kah chhuahna silai, hamrik hawlh tawlh zoh zoh chi.
(beal), n. pathian lem, pathian suak.
(beanit), n. laifei, lailungdawt. v.t. laifeia chhun.
(bedbag), n. khumfa.
(bedevl), v.t. tibuai, tichiai, ramhuai zâwl.
(befadl), v.t. tibuai, mumal lova siam.
(begail), v.t. bum, thil ninawm hawisan.
(behâwld), v.t. and v.i. en, hmu, ngai teh.
(bei), adj. sen-uk. n. tuipui khawmual kâra tengsawl lût, tuipui pêng. n. ban pui inkâr. n., v.i. bauh, hûk, beleuh, ramsa a kaw tâwpa \ang mangang hram ri.
(beib), n. nausên.
(beid), v.t., v.i. bual, inbual, tui chêng, thil sil.
(beik), v.t. ur, kang, hem hmin, em char.
(beil), n. thil têl, thil fûn. bale, n. sual, hliam.
(beil), n. thubuai sawi hma or sawi laia intlan chhuahna. v.t. lawng chhuata tui tling paih.
(beilif), n. police officer chi khat, in hmun lo ram zuartu, in hmun zuara sumdawng.
(bein), n. chhiatna, thil sual, hrehawmna, sualna hnâr.
(beir), adj. ruak, hmuh theiha awm, tlem tham, rethei, inhawng.
(beirn), n. naupang (Scottish \awng).
(beis), n. chawlhhmun, bul\hut, a bul, innghahna bul, bâwlhlova a hlo chi khat. v.t ngahchhana hmang. base (beis), adj. rawicha lo, hniam, hmuhsitawm, bawlhhlawh, sual, pawisa chhia, pawisa lem.
(beis), n. zaipâwla a aw hniam ber.
(beisal), adj. nghahchhan.
(beisin, beisn), n. thlâng dar, chawhtawlh, dil, lui kam ruam.
(beisis), n. thil nghahchhan, a bul\hut.
(beist), v.t. vua, hêm. v.t. khât deuhva \hui.
(beit), n. a chah, a thlêmna. v.t. thlêm (Nghakuai chah, vawmtlak chah, etc.), khualzin hrâi, ui ûmtîr, tibuai, zar buai.
(beiting), prep. tiam lovin.
(bekhawz), adv. and conj. avângin.
(bekheim), pa.t. of become.
(bekn), v.i., v.t. kut zaizir emaw, lu thin emawa mi ko.
(bel), n. nula hmêl\ha.
(belaw), v.i., v.t., n. bâwng bû, ring taka au, thûm taka hrâm.
(belchh, belsh), v.t., v.i. irh, phuh chhuak.
(beleit), v.t. tikhawtlai, tihnufum.
(belfri), n. dâr khaina in sâng, biak in chhîpa dâr khaina.
(beli), n. pum, dul, chhûl, thil chhûngril, thil kiar lai, kawchhûng.
(belijarent), adj., n. indopui nei lai mêk, râlhrât.
(belikaws), adj. râlhrât, tawrawt, butut.
(beljian), n., adj. Belgium hnam, Belgian thil.
(belletr), n. thu ziak or phuah nalh tak.
(belowz), n. pûm zah chi.
(belvidîr), n. in chhûnga boruak emaw, êng luh nân emawa zarhliap nei an tihkuak ang hi, mualpâwng chunga in thengthaw.
(ben-gawli, beng-gawli a ni lo), adj. n. Bengali \awng, Bengali hnam.
(benain), adj. \ha, zaidam, mi khawngaih thei.
(benedikshn), Pathian malsâwmna dîlna inkhâwm or \awng\ai, malsâwmna.
(benefakshn), n. thil \ha tih, thil thlâwn pêkna, \anpuina.
(benefisens), n. thil \ha tih, \anpuina lawmawm. beneficent, adj.
(benefit), n. hlâwkna, duhsakna, v.i. hlâwkpui.
(benevalens), n. thil \ha tih châkna, khawngaih thiltih, mi rethei \anpuina pawisa thawh.
(benizn), n. malsâwmna.
(berbêrian), n. hnam mâwl, hnam â. barbaric, adj.
(beri), n. theihmu chi khat.
(beri), vt. phûm, khuh, thukrû.
(beril), n. lunghlu chi \henkhat.
(bersaz), n. nau awih hla.
(berîv), v.t. thil hlu rûksak, thil chântir, thihnaa \hentir. bereft, bereaved, pa.t., pa.p. of bereave.
(bevarij), n. zu, thingpui, thil in mi (in chi) rêng rêng.
(bevi), n. nula or hmeichhe rual, sava rual.
(bevl), n, âwih mâm, thil mâm âwn, thil kil zauh lam tehna hmanrua kaih thleh theih.
(bi), n. khuai (a zu nei chi), America ramah chuan a huhova intihlim nân emawa mihring kal khâwm.
(bi), v.i. ni, awm, nung.
(biatifai), v.t. hlimna leh lâwmna pe, malsawmna dawntîr, chatuan lâwmna dawnga chhâl. beatific, (bietifik), beatifical adjs. beatifically, adv.
(biatituid), n. van nawmna, hlimna sâng ber chi.
(biawkemistri), n. thil nung timur awm dân zirna.
(bibiulas), adj. thil tui hîp lût or fâwp thei.
(biblabard), adj. hmêl khawlo khawpa \ap.
(bibliawgrafi), n. lehkhabu hrang hrang râwn tûr ziak chhuahna.
(bichh), n. chinghnia or sihal nu, uipui, a diriam zâwnga hmeichhe kohna.
(bichh), n. tuipui kam.
(bichhans) v.i. and adj. a palha lo awm, thil lo thleng palh.
(bichhkawmber), n. tuifawn sei pui, lawng chawlhhmuna lên vah chîng mi, Pacific tuifinriat thliarkara tuikeplung vâi emawa khawsa mi.
(bidabl), v.t. phuh huh, tihuh. v.t. hnûk huh, hnûk bawlhhlawh.
(bidai), v.t. rawng dum.
(bidait), v.t. chei, thuam.
(bidaizn, bidizn), v.t. a lepler zâwnga chei.
(bidak), v.t. bu zauh, liluh.
(bidang), v.t. vaivut phul, êk hnawih.
(bidast), v.t. vaivut kâitir.
(bidawb), v.t. chulh, hnawih.
(bideiz), bedazzle (bidazl), v.t. êng lutuka chhun.
(bidek), v.t. cheimawi.
(bidifn), v.t. tibengchhêt.
(bidim), v.t. tithim.
(bidiu), v.t. dâi anga tihnâwng.
(bidragl), v.t. lei hnâwng leh hmun bawlhhlawha hnâk hrep (bedaggle).
(biduawrf), v.t. titê chem chem, sitawma siam.
(bielzibab), n. Philistine-ho pathian lem biak, Baal hming chi khat, ramhuai lal.
(bifaul), v.t. tikhawlo, ti bawlhhlawh.
(bifawg), v.t. \iauchhuma tuam, rilru chîbu.
(bifawl), v.t., v.i. chunga thleng, chunga tla.
(bifawm), v.t. thil phuana khuh.
(bifawr), prep., adv., conj. a hmaah.
(bifit), v.t., v.i. hmeh, mil, remchang, dik, âwm.
(biflauar), v.t. pangpâra khuh.
(bifrend), v.t. kâwmngeih, \hiana siam, tlawn.
(bifûl), v.t. bum, chhaih nawmnah, tham lo taka chhaih (mi phutkhat biaka bia).
(bigami), n. nupui pasal pahnih neih.
(bigawn), interj. chhuak rawh! thlawk kat rawh!
(bigawt, bigat), n. mahni pâwl or kohhran âtchilh, khaw hmulo khawpa mahni pâwl \an mi. bigoted, adj. bigotry, n.
(biget), v.t. paw chhuak, hring. begat, hmanlaia beget pa.t. begot aia an hman \hin.
(bigild), v.t. cheimawi, rangkachaka luan.
(bigin), v.i., v.t., \an, awm \an.
(biglûm), v.t. tingui.
(bigraim), v.t. tibawlhhlawh.
(bihaind), adv., prep. hnungah.
(bihed), v.t. lu tan chhum.
(biheiv), v.t., v.i., khawsa, chetla.
(bihâf), n. aiah, tânah.
(bihûf), n. ham\hatna, remchang.
(bijûel), v.t. lunghlu (jewel)-a chei.
(bikam), v.i., v.t. ni, chang, mil, timawi, inhmehtîr.
(bikar), vi. thil tenauva hnial, phe vet vet, ri hiau hiau, n. insual buaina. bicker, n. thleng, thing kuang chawhtawlh.
(bikham), v.t. thlêm, dam, tidam, tilungawi, buai or bengchhenna tireh.
(bikhâwl), v.t. hming ko or hming lam.
(biklaud), v.t. chhûm anga hliah hlim.
(bikuest), n. rochhiahna, ro khâwm.
(bikuidh), v.t. rochhiah.
(bilai), v.t., dâwttir, dik lova chantir, hmel dik lo lan.
(bilan), n. thîr chhe chi tangkaraw tui leh dâr chawhpawlh.
(bilav), v.t. hmangaih. beloved (bilavid), adj. n. hmangaih.
(bilaw), n. tuifâwn hrawl tak, v.i. nasa taka fâwn.
(bilaw), prep. adv. hnuaiah, hnuaihnung, phû lo, tling lo.
(bilawkeshn), n. a ruala hmun hrang hmun hniha awm theihna.
(bilawng), v.i. inhnamhnawih, tel ve, kalpui, zawm.
(bilbaw), n. ngûnhnâm, khandaih.
(bilei), v.t. tlereuhva chei, khing, hual, zîm, lambun, phuar.
(biliak), adv. mai thei.
(bilian), n. tlûklehdingâwn sâng khat. France leh America ramah chuan tlûklehdingâwn khat.
(bilitl), v.t. deusawh, hmusit, endawng.
(bilj), n. thingrem mûma a puar lai hi, lawng mawng zâwl zau lai ber, lawng chhuata tui chhe tling.
(billingzgeit), n. \awng chaltlai, ânchhia.
(bilâwd), v.t. fak.
(bilêbar), v.t. vêl, vaw hrep, nghaisa.
(bilîgar), v.t. hual, zîm.
(bilîv), v.t., v.i., ring, awih.
(bimadl), v.t. tichîbû, mumal nei thei lova siam.
(bimawn), v.t. pawiti, sûn.
(bimetalizm), n. pawisa chhera rangkachak leh tangkarua ang khata an ngaihna.
(bimiuz), v.t. tichiai.
(bimîn), v.t. hnûk hniam, titlâwm.
(bin, binzh), v.t. and v.i. chiah huh, in vak.
(binait), v.t. thima thuam, hrilhhaina nena khahtir.
(binak), n. lawnga chhim leh hmâr kâwk dahna bâwm.
(binam), v.t. tihik, tizeng, thil hre lova siam.
(binari), adj. pahnih inkawp, arsi \hiang invir tawn (entlang nên chauhva hmuh kawp theih).
(binawkl, binakl), n. entlang phîr.
(binigaansi), n. ngilneihna. benignant, adj. benignly, adv.
(binîth), prep. hmaah.
(biparas), adj. phîr hring.
(biraj), v.t. thîk, itsîk.
(birei), v.t. tilang, puang, phawrh chhuak.
(bireit), v.t. hau hrep.
(bireta), n. puithiam lukhum kil li nei.
(birêi), v.t. tikhawlo, tibawlhhlawh.

(bisaid), prep. kiangah, sirah, bulah, chu lo rêngah, pawn lamah (beside himself with fury - thinur luat avângin a inthehnghilh or a pâwn lamah a chêng tawh), adv. 'chu lovah' 'chu bakah' tihna a nih chuan besides tih nen a inang.
(biset), v.t. hual, nawr, kar, nêk.
(bishawp), n. puithiam or pastor bial tam tak awptu puithiam sâng, uain chi khat.
(bishru), v.t. anchhe lawh khum.
(biskit), n. bisikut.
(bislawbar), v.t. chil pik khum, fâwp chawk chawk, ngeiawm khawpa fakder.
(bismarchh), v.t. tibawlhhlawh, tihâng, hnawih dum, tiung.
(bismat), v.t. in\ing, hnawih hâng.
(bismath, bizmat), n. thîr hlo chi khat.
(bismîr), v.t. chulh, tât, hnawih, tibawlhhlawh.
(bispangl), v.t. thil tle neuh neuhva chei.
(bispekl), v.t. chhun hâng thliah thliah, \ial.
(bispektakld), adj. tarmit vuah.
(bispit), v.t. chil chhâk khum or pik khum.
(bispred), v.t. khuh, phah hnan.
(bispîk), v.t. sawi lâwksak, dilsak.
(bist), n. ramsa chhia leh \ha hriatna nei lo, ramsa ke pali nei, mi nunrawng.
(bisted), v.t. chhâwk, \anpui, chhawr, \angkâi.
(bistow), v.t. pe, hlân.
(bistraid), v.t. kâr, kapkalak.
(bisîchh), v.t. ngên. besought, beseeched, pa.t. and pa.p. of beseech.
(bisîj), v.t. hual, sipai nena hual, ninawm khawpa ngên or zar zar buai.
(bisîm), v.t. and v.i., ang, hmeh, inhmeh, phû.
(bita), n. Grik hawrawpa a pahnihna (ß).
(bitaid), v.i. and v.t. lo thleng, chunga tla.
(bitaims) adj. a hun dik, hun remchangah.
(bitawkn), v.t. entir, kâwk, hrilh lâwk.
(biteik), v.t. kal, mahnia ti.
(bithingk), v.t. ngaihtuah chhuak, mahni inngaihtuah.
(bitiumen), n. thil laih chhuah zînga alh thei chi hrang hrang (petrol, alkatra, etc.).
(bitl), n. panruang.
(bitrawdh, betrawth), vt. nupui pasala inhual. bethrothal (bitrawdal) n.
(bitrei), v.t. phatsan, bum, tum lohva puangzar.
(bituikst), prep and adj, inkârah.
(bituin), prep. and adv. inkârah, laiah.
(biubow), n. \hâl \hoh. bubonic, adj.
(biueil), v.t. vi. sûn, pawi ti.
(biueir), vt., vi. invêng, pawisa (rawh). v.t. laka invêng.
(biuichh), v.t. aikaih, zêl.
(biuildar), vt. mak tihtîr, chawk buai, tichiai.
(biuip), vt. \ah khum, pawi ti.
(biuraw, baraw), n. dawhkân pawhdawh nei chi, pisa.
(biurawkrâsi), n. sawrkar hna pêng hrang hrang neia ram rorel.
(biuti parlawr, parla), n. hmeichhe incheina dâwr (sam tihkirna, powder, hnawihsen leh lipstick ilova incheina dâwr).
(biuti), n. hmêl\hatna, nalhna, mawina, hmêl\ha.
(biutias), adj. hmêl\ha.
(biutirik), adj. butter thil.
(bivalv), n. kep pahnih nei chi (tuikep, etc.) adj. valve (kep or kharkhep) pahnih nei.
(bivar), n. tuia khawsa sazu lam chi, chutiang hmul hlu tak mai, beaver hmula siam lukhum, kutkawr, puan etc. |awng lerah chuan khabe hmul or khaber hmul nei.
(bivuak), n. zârhliap nei lova riak, ram palailenga bûk nei lova riak.
(bizhû), n. tlereuh incheina chi, thingrem tê tak tê.
(bizi), adj. buai, taima, hna ngah, hmanhlel. v.t. inhmang, hmanhlel, thawk.
(biznis), hna, tih tûr, thil \ûl, sumdawnna, mahni chungthu bîk.
(bizâr), adj. mak, danglam, chungchuang.
(biîawnd), prep. piah lamah, phâk bâkah, tih lovah chuan. adv. aia hlaah, n. hriat phak loh, thlarâu khawvel.
(blabar) n. nghapui thau or hriak.
(blad), n. thi, thisen, thisena inzawmna, mi uluk leh induh mi tak, thinurna, thisen inchhuahna or thah.
(blad-fiud), n. chhungkua or chi leh kuang inkâra thisen inchhuahna a awm avânga buaina lo chhuak.
(blaf), n. vaukam bung vut, lui or tuipui kam khâm, inbumna, intihderna. adj. tlang, zêp thei lo, âwih, v.t. bum, tihder.
(blagârd), n. misual, mi nungchang mawi lo, mi hnuaihnung.
(blaidh), adj. hlim thei, zuanzang.
(blaimi), interj. e khai! het!
(blaimi), interj. e khai! het!
(blain), n. durh, khawihli.

(blaind), adj. mitdel, hmuh theih loh, kawng mumal nei lo, kal tlang theih loh, khaw hmu lo, rin thiltiha tih, ngaihtuah lova thil tih. n. tukverh puanzâr, lehkhadenah chuan mahni chan en lova pawisa vâwr. v.t. mit tidel, tithim, khaw hmu lova siam, bum, mit tivai.
(blait), n. thing, hnim leh thlai natna hri (a vei chu an uai a, an thi mai \hîn).
(blaiti), n. (sipai \awng lâr) mahni ram, mahni in-leh-lo.
(blajan), n. vuakna tiang tawi hmâwr bâwk nei. v.t. vua.
(blak), adj. dum, hâng, thim, ngui. n. rawng dum, v.t. tidum, hnawih hâng. in black and white, ziak ngeia chuang, rawng dang tel lova a dum leh a vâr chauhva milem ziak or thlalâk.
(blandar), v.i. thil tisual, mumal nei lova chetla, hisap dik lo. n. thil tihdik lohna.
(blandarbas), n. silai (awlan or ulhbun) ngul tawi tak, kaw zâu deuh.
(blangk), adj., ziak loh, ruak, hmela engmah lang lo, ngaihna hre lo, hla phuaha a tlar tâwpa ri inmil (rhyme) nei lo chi.
(blangkit), n. kawmawl, thil hliahkhuhna. v.t. tuam, khuh. wet blanket, n. mi hlim lai chawk nguitu, mi kawm nuam lo.
(blansh), v.t. and v.i., tivâr, vâr.
(blant), adj. hriam lo, zum lo, bil, hram, hraw, bung, chhâw, chhawih. v.t. tibil, blantness, n.
(blar), kum deuh hleka lam rîk), n. bawlhhlawh kai, chiang lo ruai, phe ruai. v.t. tichiang lo.
(blarni), n. mi fakderna or fuihpawrhna \awngka.
(blasfemi, blasfimi), n. \awng bawlhhlawh, Pathian zah lohna \awngka.
(blasfîm), v.t. thil thianghlim sawi chhia or sawi hnâwm, v.i. ânka mawi lova \awng, ânchhe lawh. blasphemer, n. blaspheme-tu. blasphemous, adj.
(blash), n. v.i. zaka sen âwm âwm, a sen kâi, lâwm emaw, hrilhhai emaw, zah luat emaw avânga hmai sen awp awp.
(blaster), v.i. zâp or chhêm ri thut, tawrawt chhuah, chapo taka \awng. n. thli chhêm thut anga ri huau, \awng chapo.
(blauz), n. kawrthuah dul deuh hniang hnuang, hmeichhe kawr thâwl deuh, dân naranin tâi vêla hrên rek.
(blauzi), adj. tai tûk, bawrchhawr.
(blaw), v.i. chhêm, tleh, hâm. v.t. chhêm, hâm ri, zâp, pâr chhuak. blow, n. vuak, hnek, chûm, chhut.
(blawchh), n. and v.t. thil rawng da rian ruan, a rual lova rawng da ruai, pangti bawl hnâi la, val kiau kuau.

(blawk), n. lungtum or thingtum (dân naranin kil li nei), thil sah chhanna thing tum or lungtum, thil tum vuak chhan or nem chhan (e.g. bêl dolung), chanchinbua milem or thlalâk nem kai tura an siam, in pindan tam tak nei, in tlar rual khat, ram bial khat. v.t. dang, dâl.
(blawk), n. pâwl or sawrkar \angrual.
(blawnd), n. and adj. vun ngo leh sam buang (hmeichhe sawi nân chuan blonde tih a ni deuh bik; mahse tunlai hi chuan blond tih hi a hmeichhe tân pawh an chelek tawh a ni).
(blawsam), n. and v.i. pangpâr (dân naranin thei ei chi pâr), pâr chhuak, vul lai or vânglai.
(blawt), n. hmingchhiatna, chhunhan, bawlhhlawh kai. v.t. tibawlhhlawh, chhun hâng, nuai reh, tihmingchhia, nemna lehkha nena lehkhatui nem hul.
(blawt), v.t. hâm puar, a ai tâwk chuahva sangha rêp pung.
(blazà), adj. nuam hre tawh lo, da tawh, kham tawh.
(blefarizm), n. mit kaih piansualna.
(bleid), n. hnah kau phêk, tlahthî, chem or ngunhnâm phêk dâp or hriam lam, virmep bân (thlawhna hmavir or hmaizaha a bân).
(bleim), v.t. puh, mawhpuh, mawh phurhtir, dem, n. mawhphurhna, demna. blamable, (bleimabl), adj.
(bleir), v.i. khêk, ring taka hrâm, tawtawrawt ri ang fiak leh \eng inkawp, n. hrâm, khêk.
(bleiz), n. alh, êng pup pup, langsâr taka târ chhuah. v.i. êng taka alh. blazes, n. pl., meidil alh, nasa taka khawsa.
(bleizn), v.t. vantlâng hmaa puangzâr, langsâr taka târ. n. pasal\ha chhinchhiahna.
(blench, blensh), v.i. tîm.
(blingk), v.i., v.t. mit khap sak, mit siai, haider, ensan, melh zawk, n. melh zawk.
(blits), n. thlawhna a\anga bomb thlâk (khum), v.t. thlawhna nena bomb thlâk khum.
(bliuish), adj. of blue.
(blu), adj. dumpâwl, duk, ngui, nguai, dâng, dawldâng, n. rawng dumpâwl, vân (mitthim), tuipui.

(blâst), n. thli chhêm or tleh thut, boruak phuh fiak deuhva ri thei ham rîk , thil puakina boruak a hlap, hnim or thlai hri (a vuaia a thihpui), v.t. chhêm thut, bomb tipuak. v.t. puak theia hal darh or phin darh.
(blâwk), n. (\awng lepchiah), mi, mihring.
(blêtant), adj. bengchheng, ri nuai nuai, zahna hmu lo khawpa hrawmhrâw or tâl bâwraw. blatantly, adv.
(blîchh), v.t. tivâr, a vâra hnawih, a vâra dum, v.i. a vâra inlet. n. rawng vâra dum. rawng vâr.
(blîd), v.i., v.t. thisen chhuah or hloh, thi, hrehawm tham khawpa pawisa inlâk sak.
(blîd), vi. n. berâm bê.
(blîk), adj. rawng or zia nei lo, ngui, hlimawm lo, vawt, hulhliap nei lo. bleakly, adv. bleakness, n.
(blîr), adj. chiang lo, phê ruai, v.t. tifiah lo, bum. bleariness, n. bleary, adj.
(blûm), n. and v.i. pangpâr, pâr lai, pâr, thil vul lai or vânglai hun, no tak. |awng lepchiahah chuan bloody tih nena a diriam leh a elsen zâwnga thil sawina a ni.
(brabl), v.i. chiar bengchheng, inhauh buaina siam.
(bradhar), n. unaupa, nu\a, anpui, sangawi zâwnpui, sakhaw biakpui.
(bradl), n., sakawr hmuia a kaih herna hrui phuar, inthununna or inkhuahkhirhna thil, luhlul thiltih. v.t., bridle vuah, thunun, khuahkhirh.
(braiar), n., hnim buk hlîng nei, ram rose pangpâ, hnim buk chi khat, a zung bâwk a\anga kuaite siam theih.
(braiawlawji), n. lung hmul hlobet chanchin zirna science.
(braib), n. thamna. v.t. tham.
(braid), monu, mo tûr.
(braidal), n. inneihna, mo lawmna ruai. adj. inneihna thil, mo lampang thil.
(braidual), n. misual hruai \hatna hmun, tân in.
(brain), n., tui al, tuipui tui, tuipui. briny, brinish, adj.
(brair), n., hnim buk hlîng nei, ram rose pangpâ, hnim buk chi khat, a zung bâwk a\anga kuaite siam theih.
(brait), adj., êng, lang chiang, hlim thei, fing, thiam thei.
(brak), n. puan phuai lai.
(brakeit), adj. kea hmul nei (sava hmul ang).
(braki), tawi.
(brakish), adj. al pial pual.
(brakit), n. thil dona, thil do kângtu, thu or nambar kualkhungna , thil bûk thei do kângtu, v.t. bracket nena do kâng, kualkhung.
(brakt), n. pangpâr a hnah kuang chawr kak lai taka par chhuah chi.
(brama), n. China ar chi \ha. n. Hindu puithiam min ber.
(brambl), n. ram theihmu chi khat.
(bramîlia), n. lakhuih lam chi rêng rêng.
(brant), n. tha pui, ha pui, a zângkhauh or nasa lai tak, v.t. a na lai tuar.
(brar), n. Negro-hovina a sam khai zâwnga 'brother' an lam dân.
(brasalz spraut), n. zîkhlûm chi khat a zîka hlûm mang lova a panga bâwk chho thluah.

(brash), n. vawk hmula siam thil khuihna or nawhna, lakhuih, rawng hnawihna hmanrua, lem ziakna hmanrua, electric khâwla thil vir lai lo nâwttu, insualna, indona, ral nena intawhchilhna, thingbuk or hnim buk hmun, ramhnuai, \ûl pik. v.t. nâwt, khuih, chulh, phiat.
(brasier), n. hmeichhe hnute dâwmna.
(brau), n. mitko, chaldâr, tlâng tolawt, hmelhmang, lan dân.
(braun), adj. uk, sen-uk, rawng hâng.
(brauz), v.i. thil chawr no or zîk no tlân or pet, ngaihsak mang lo leh bawhkân neia thu chhiar. n. thing\ang.
(bravâdaw), n. huaisenna, vaupung, ât huai.
(brawchh), n. pâwl ilo chhinchhiah nân emaw, mahni inchei nân emawa âwm vêla bel chi thil siam, badge (baj).
(brawd), adj. zau, rilru zau, a tlângpui.
(brawdkast), adj., v.t. theh darh, puang zâr, radio-a puang (broadcast hian past tense a nei chuang lo).
(brawdsaid), n. lawng pang or sîr lam, lawng panga laipui, lawng pang laipui rual kah.
(brawil), n. insual buaina. v.i., v.t. chhûm, chhuang so.
(brawk), pa.t. of break.
(brawkali), n. parhlâwm (parbâwr) chi khat.
(brawkar), n. sumdâwng, thawmhnaw hlui zuartu, palai, puarak.
(brawkeid), n. silk puana thil lem \hui.
(brawngkaw), n. sakawr la sâwi hmin loh.
(brawnz), n. dârsen leh \în chawhpawlh. adj. bronze rawng anga êng-sen deuh puap.
(brawshur), n. lehkhabu tê tak tê, pamphlet.
(brawthl, brawdhl), n. nawhchi zawrhna hmun or in.
(bred), n. chhang, chaw rêng rêng, chhuan rêlna.
(bredran), n. pl. of brother, hmanlaia brothers aia an hman, unaute u.
(bredth), n. vâng lam, zau lam, khawhawi zau, rilru zau.
(breid), v.t. a kikiau zâwnga chei or \hui or zep. n, zeh or or phiar kikiau.
(breik), n. thil che lai chelh dinna hmanrua.

(breik), v.t. tikeh, tichat, thliar hrang, thil tla lai lo dawng, puang, chhu pawp, titliak, mi paukhauhna tizâm, ran sawizawi, ngam, hneh, dân bawhchhia, thil chîn dawklak simtir, ûm darh, chan darh. v.i. daidang, thliar hrang, chhum, chat, puak per or dah, hma tâwn kua, awm dân danglam thut, hmuh theiha lang, chanchin darh thut, pawisa tlachham, aw \ial, tlu, phuan thut, inzawmna chat, \hian inbân, khaihlak. n. khaihlakna, inzawm lohna, thil tâwn kuak, chawlhlâwk hun.
(breil), n. mitdel ina kut zung\ang hmanga thu an chhiar theihna tûra hawrawp ker an chheh.
(brein), n. thluak, finna. v.i. thluak hnâm sawk khawpa chhut or vuak.
(breis), n. thîr kawra bân lam tuamna phaw, thil cher nghettu, thul verhna herh virna hmanrua, bracket lian chi , kekawr dârbak. v.t. cher nghet, insingsa, intuaihnum.
(breislit), n. ngûn, kutkawl.
(breiv), adj. huaisen, ngêng, langsâr, a langa mawi, v.t. hnai taka tawhchilh, chhel taka tuar chhuak, cho, America rama Red Indian zîngah chuan an pasal\ha.
(breiz), v.t. chhîn upa mung.
(breiz), v.t. dâra khuh or luan.
(brekfast), n. tuk\huan, v.i., v.t. tuk\huan ei.
(brekial, brakial), adj. bân lam thil.
(brest), âwm, âwm bâwr, hmeichhe hnute bu, ran or ramsa hnute bu, rilru or thinlung. v.t. do, tâwn, tuar, bun or hung or vuah. make a clean breast, inpuang, sual puang.
(breth), n. thaw, thâwk, thâwk theihna, nunna, thli fim. catch one's breath with bated breath, mak tih luat vâng emaw, hlauh leh zah vâng emawa thaw ngam mang lova thlir.
(breviti), n. tawina, \awngkam or thu ziak tawina, thu renchemna, tawi famkimna.
(brichh), n. thil keh, thil tihkeh, thil tâwn kuak, thil chhumbung, dân bawhchhiat, thutiam hlen loh, intihbuaina, kulh bang tâwn kuak, v.t. su kua.
(brid), v.t., v.i., n. thlah, vulh, khâwi, thlah \ha, thlen tîr, no pai, no keu, no, chi khat.
(bridh), v.i., v.t. thaw, chawlh lâwk, khaihlak, nung, dam, thaw lut, hîp lut, thâwk khum, thaw chhuak.
(brigantîn), n., brig ang deuh hleka ngul hnih nei puanzar lawng.
(brigeid), n., battalion rual khat khai khâwmtu sipai pâwl, mipui ho khat.
(brij), n. lei, lawng chunga lawng captain dinna, dawhkân, \ing\ang hrui kam marna, thil inzawmna, hmun rûak or âwng kham kaina, lehkhaden chi khat. v.t., lei dawh, zawm, kham kai.
(brik), n. leirawhchan.
(briliant), adj., êng tak, tle tak, nalh tak, fing tak, thiam tak.
(bringk), n., kotlâng, ko, hmâwr, vaukam.
(brinjawl), n., bawkbâwn.
(brisl), n. hmul khauh tak, (pig's bristle - vawk hmul), v.i. hmul thi ding, hmul anga ding sang.
(britl), adj. keh awlsam, ram.
(bru), v.t., v.i. chhuang so or lum (thingpui), zu sa, thil um, thu phiar or mung, inmung, inso (buaina or thlipui angin).
(bruam, brauam, brûm), n. sakawr pakhat hnuh chi tawlailir chung leh bang nei, motor rêng rêng a driver \hutna chung nei lo.
(bruk), n. lui tê. v.t. tuar thei, ngaithei, ngaithiam, hlimpui.
(brunet), n. hmeichhe sam dum leh vun hâng.
(brânch, brânsh), n. thing\ang, thing zâr, pêng, bân, zâr, v.t. pêng, zâr, \ai.
(brâs), n. dâr, pawisa (\awng ler), rimawi tumtu pâwla dâr hmanraw tumtu pâwl .
(brâvaw), n. misual kâwlhrâwng tak, tual that atâna mi rawih. interj. a \ha! i ti\ha lutuk! (Hmeichhe thiltih fak nân a nih chuan brava!).
(brâwchh), v.t. chhun pawp, hawng, sawi chhuak.
(brâwkard), dân bul.
(brêi), v.t. chhu sawm. n. sabengtung hrâm, \eng taka bâ. v.t. sabengtung anga hrâm.
(brîdhid), adj. hrilhru, sawi sap.
(brîf), n. ukil-ina thubuai kalhmang tlângpui a khai khâwm, thu kaihtawi or tlângpui. adj. tawi tê, tawi famkim.
(brîviari), n. Katholic ho tûk tin Mass rawngbâwl \awng\ai bu.
(brîvieit), n. thil hrilhfiahna bu te, ukil thu ziak.
(brîz), n. thli, thli fim, v.i., tleh, thâw. breese, brize (briz), n. vaihmite, thophurh.

(brûd), n. thlah, no, \hum, \hui, fate, naupang rual, chhuungkua, chi khat, thlah khat, thlahtu, pian leh murna, arte \hum. adj. thlahtu atân. v.i., v.t. awp, tui awp, keu, vulh, lungngai taka ngaihtuah, ding taka ngaihtuah.
(brûin), n. savawm hming, savawm kohna.
(brûm), n. hmunphiah, v.t. phiat.
(brût), n. ramsa zînga a mâwl pâwl, mi tawrawt, mi nunchhia. adj. ramsa nungchang ang mai, nunchhia, tawrawt, mâwl.
(brûz), v.t. vaw sâwp, chhu sâwp, chhu dip, tikhem, tiphuai, tipem, tipilh. n. hliam, pem, pilh.
(bu), interj., v.i., v.t., a dichim or hnehsawh zâwnga eu.
(bu), interj., v.i., v.t., a dichim or hnehsawh zâwnga eu.
(buchhar), n. sa zûar, ran talh mi. v.t. ran talh, nunrawng taka tihlum.
(budiaraiz), v.t. lehkhabua thu zahpuiawm lai lai suat or paih.
(buduar), n. hmeichhe pindan pual bîk.
(bugeinvilla), n. sarawn pangpâr.
(buk), n. lehkhabu, bu, Bible, lehkhadena tlinna phit zât. bring to book, chachhuah, thiamthu sawi tûra koh.
(bul), n. bâwngpa til reh loh, bâwng chal, nghapui (whale) leh sai leh ramsa chi hrang hranga a pachal. n. pope thupêk, pope dân siam.
(bulatin), n. sawrkâr chanchin târ chhuah.
(bulavar), n. kawngpui or kawtthler zâu tak, a sîr tuaka thing intlar.
(bulawk), n. bâwng pa til reh.
(bulbul), n. tlaiberh.
(buli), n. mi tiduhdahtu, ngam zâwngte sawisak hmang, mi vau hmang. bully, (buli), n., v.t. inkhelh dâwna inthahna, inthah.
(bulian), n. rangkachak leh tangkaraw chher loh or chhûn loh.
(bulit), silaimu.
(bulrash), n. phairuang.
(buluark), n. kulh, kulhpui, râl dai, tuipui kama tuifâwn danna bang.
(burbawn), n. kalh or dodâltu, vaimim zu.
(burg, barg), n. lung banga hung kual khawpui, kulh.
(burzhuazi), n. mimir, mi khawsa thei, mi neinung.
(bush), n. hnim buk, ramhnuai. beat about the bush, pehhel.
(bushel), n. buh leh thei tehkhawng gallon riat dawng, chutiang tehna bâwm chu.
(but), n. pheikhawk rawng sâng nei, v.t. boot bun, pêt, chhuih. boot, v.t. hlâwkpui, n. hlêp, ham\hatna.
(buzam), n. awm bâwr, \ang nem, hnute bu, ângchhûng, thinlung, zîngah. adj. lungrûkah, kawmngeih.
(bâwa), n. saphai lam pâwl, rûl hrawl ber ber chi, an ramsa man fuh tawh chu a ziala zial hlum chi.
(bâwgas), adj. a suak, a lem.
(bâwgi), n. tawlailir rit tak, hniam tak si, rêl pindan.
(bâwhîmian), n. and adj. Bohemian hnam, Czechoslovakia \awng, in leh lo nei lova vâk vêl hnam (gypsy) anga mumal lova khawsak chîng, dân leh hrai pawisa lova khawsa.
(bâwl), n. thil mûm, bâwl, silaimu. ball, n. lâmna.
(bâwlaid), n. khawchân or chhawihfa thlâwk, dân naranin a tâwpa puak chi.
(bâwlawmitar), n. êng zung chak lam tehna sana or khâwl.
(bêbl), n. in sâng, \awng mumal nei lo, chiar nawk nawk, mumal lohna. (Babel in sâng thu a\anga chher a ni).
(bêizh), n. sahmul puan rawng dum loh.
(bêkn), n. vawksa rêp or \în.
(bênal, banal), adj. thil ho, thil satliah.
(bêr), v.t. châwi, keng, phur, la, tuar, do, zâwn, lam hawi, kâwk, hring, pai. v.i. tuar, dawhthei, kâwk, dâwl zo. n. savawm.
(bêthaws), n. thu sawi leh thu ziaka thu zahawm tak a\anga a holam zawnga thu tihtâwp.
(bîchh), n. nawhalh thing ang chi.
(bîd), n., v.t., v.i. \hi fang thil, \ingmit, \hi fang, Katholik-ho \awng\aina \hi (rosary).
(bîdl), n. kohhrana bial khat awptu, college-a hotu pakhat.
(bîf), n. bâwng sa, pangti, tihrawl \ha, thahrui ngah.
(bîgam), Mosolman lal nula emaw, hmeichhe nihna nei sâng tak.
(bîgl), n. uisathiam tê chi, enthlatu, khawpui dân kengkawhtu officer.
(bîk), n. sava hmui, hnâr, hmui.
(bîkar), n. no lian, no tung.
(bîkn), n. hmun hlauhawm chhinchhiah nâna hmun sânga khawnvar chhit, tlâng chhipa mei dêt, thlawhna kawng bo loh nâna an kaihhruaitu atâna khawnvar chhit ên. v.t. entawn atâna êng, ên.
(bîlial), n. ramhnuai, angel tlu sualte zînga mi.
(bîm), n. thîr or thing banpui or khanchhuk, thil rel or siam rêng rênga a za pui ber, êng zung, radio zung.
(bîn), n. be chi rêng rêng, kâwm neia rah chi.
(bîn), pa.p. of be.
(bîng), n. thil awm, thil siam, nihna.
(bînâwn), adj. hria, hriat.
(bîr), a. Sap zufang.
(bîr), n. mitthi zâwn hlâng (thinga siam).
(bîrd), n. khabe hmul. v.t. khabe hmula man, va chapchar.
(bîstingz), bâwng no neiha a hnute sâwr hmasak ber.
(bît), an\am bulbawk buluih ang deuh thlum duak chi.
(bît), v.t. and v.i. vua, vêl, hneh, khûm, phe vat vat, zaipâwl hruaina tiang vai, chawk kâwi, n. thil ri nawn (mar phu, sana chek, etc.), bial enkawl huam chhûng.
(bîtl), sephung ang chi rêng rêng (rawmung tiamin). nungcha thla kâwr khauh tak nei chi tawh phawt.
(bîzam, bezam), n. thing\ang or mau kuang hmunphiah.
(bûbi), n. mi chhaw, pa phutkhat, exam-naa hniam ber.
(bûdi), v.i. tûm, ngui.
(bûkê), n. pangpâr têl khâwm, pangpâr phal or \he.
(bûm), n., v.i. puanzâr, lawnga puanzâr kap parhna fung thing tlâwn sei tak, puak dur, ri thûm dup, ri huau huau, \hang thut, hausa thar thut.
(bûmarang), n. Australia rama tiang kawi vawm thlawh lo lêt leh thei chi, thil titu lama sawhkhâwk lêt leh chi, sawhkhâwk.
(bûn), n. dîlna, ngenna, induhsakna, thilthlâwnpêk, lawmman.
(bûnsan, bansan), adj. mi fing pakhat R.W. Bunsen-a thil lam kâwk.
(bûr), n. thingtlang mi, South Africa rama Dutch pêm lût, mi nungchang mawi lo.
(bûr), n., adj. South Africa rama Dutch (Holland mi pêm lût) thlahte (dân naranin leilet lam beia khawsa).
(bûrzhua), n. mihring, khua leh tui, mi khawsa thei pâwl, dâwrkai, sumdawng. adj. khawsa thei, dân hlui ngaina mi, ninawm, khamthlâk.
(bûst), v.t. hma sâwntir, ti\hang, n. nawrna, tih hmasâwnna.
(bûth) n. hliap, zârhliap, huau huau or puipun ni chhûng lek atâna thingpui ilo zawrh nâna hliapzâr (Telephone booth - kawngkama telephone bunna in tê).
(bûti), n. thil rûk khâwm, suamhmang or ral rûnho thawmhnaw rûk, lawmman.
(bûz), n. zu, zu chenna. v.t. zu in, rui.
(cadet), n. sipai officer zir lai, officer hna zir lai.
(candar), n. ngîlna, zêp neih loh, nuntlang nihna.
(charp, a kum tak), n., v.i. sava hrâm, hrâm.
(chatar), v.i. \awng bawrh bawrh, awmze nei lova tîtî, vâwt tih vânga ka khâwng bap bap.
(chatil), n. thawmhnaw, bungrua.
(chelaw), 'cello, n. violoncello kaihtawi. 'cellist, violoncellist kaih tawi.
(chhabi), adj. chum, chawm, bing.
(chhaf), n. favai, si, thil tlâktlai lo. v.t. dem fiam.
(chhafir), v.i. indawn, indawn buai.
(chhaid), v.t. hau, zilh, kamkhat.
(chhaild), n. naupang, fa. (children, pl.). with child, nau pai.
(chhaim), n. dâr chi hrang hrang thlûk mumal neia ri chhâwng, dâr ri mawi. v.i. ri mawi, ri ral ral, inmil. v.i. mawi tak tiri.
(chhaina), n. sailungvâr ang reng thlêng leh no leh thîrhrui ban lu bâwk siam nâna an hman.
(chhak), n. arpui \uk ri, âr, koh duatna. v.i. \uk. chuck (chhak), v.i. paih theh.
(chhakl), n., v.i. nui heuh heuh, arpui \uk, arpui note koh anga ko (a-a a, chiuhiah, etc.).
(chhalenj), v.t. cho, puh, hnial. n. chona, rinhlelhna lantîr.
(chhalis), n. berhbu, sakrament semnaa uain dahna no.
(chham), n. \hian kawmngeih tak.
(chhamp), n. thingtum lu lam.
(chhampiawn), n. thurin leh thupui humtu or leklârtu, infiamna lama a chak ber or thiam ber or ti\ha ber. v.t. hum, vêng.
(chhandlar), n. sathaukhâwnvâr siamtu.
(chhangk), n. thil chhum bung hrawl tak. (cut off a chunk of meat - sa hrang hrawl tak hlep thla).
(chhanl), n. lui kuang, lawng kal theihna tui dung, tuipui rêk, zin vahna kawng. v.t. channel siam, nawr khuar.
