(chhansiri), n. rorêlna sâng (High Court) pêng.
(chhap), n. mi tuemaw, pa. chap, n. khabe, biang, heh, rêp.
(chhapel) n. biak in, \awng\aina pindan.
(chhapi), n. \hian pa te nêl taka kohna.
(chhaplin), n. lawng, sipai pâwl, vântlâng ho khat leh chhûngkaw malte'na puithiam pual bîk an rawih.
(chhapman), n. thil zuara vâk vêl mi.
(chhaptar), n. thuziaka a bung.
(chhariawt), n. sakawrtawlailîr, hmasânga indona leh intlânsiak nâna an hman sakawrtawlailîr.
(chhariti), n. hmangaihna, khawngaihna, lainatna, thil phalna, thil thlâwn pêk. charitable, adj.
(chhart), n. ram leh tuipui lem, kawng zawn nâna ram leh tuipui lem ziah, thil hming ilo ziak thlithlaina phêk. v.t. ram lem ziak or chhui.

(chhartar), n. nihna leh chanvo nemnghehna thu ziak, thuthlung, neitu inthlâk dâwna thuthlung ziak, vohbik nihna. v.t. charter nena thlung, pawisa chawia mahni puala lawng, thlawhna leh zin vêlna hmanraw hawh. (The king flew in a chartered plane - Lalber chu ama puala thlawhna ruat bîkah chuan a thlâwk a).
(chhastaiz), v.t. sim tûra hrem, hrem zal, hremna nêna thunun.
(chhat), v.i. titi, tlângnêl taka inkâwm.
(chhawis), n. thlanna, duh zâwk thlanna, a \ha ber. adj. thlan nahawm.
(chhawk), n. tlak, châwk. v.t. chalk nên ziak.
(chhawk), v.t., v.i. rêk, inhnawh tâwt, thaw thei lova siam.
(chhawklit), n. kurtai hmâwngsâwi ang thil thlum. adj. chocolate rawng ang, sen-uk.
(chhawp) v.t. tan, tan chhum, chêk, ek, chan sawm. n. chhumbung, thil tan chhum, kêl or berâm or vawksa hrang (a nâk ruh telin).
(chhawpstiks), n. China hovina thîrfian leh thîrkut aia chaw ei nâna an hman mau hmawlh kawp khat.
(chhawrtl), v.i. aw hniam leh thûm deuhva nui.
(chheh, chhek), n. Slav hnam, Czechoslovakia rama chêng.
(chhein), n. khaidiat, thil inzawm chhâwng, inzawmna, thil sei lam tehna link 100 or fit 66, hmun hrang hranga mi pakhat dâwr hun.
(chheinj), v.t., n. tidanglam, thlâkthleng, thlâk, thlêng nawi. v.i. danglam, kawr hâk thlâk.
(chheir), n. Sap \hutthlêng, chêr, rorêltu \hutna or dinhmun, chairman dinhmun, electric nêna dehhlumna \hutthlêng.
(chheis), v.t. ûm, sa pêl, hnawt bo. n. inûmna, sa pêl, sa hnu chhui. wild-goose chase, n. thil beisei phâk loh tûr ûmna. chase, n. khâwl ha chelh khâwmna kâwm.
(chheist), adj. nungchanga thianghlim, thinlung thianghlim, nula/tlangvâl la ngai lo, pâwlpui la nei lo, hnahkhat.
(chhek), n. pawisaa chan theih lehkha, pawisa lâkna lehkha (check an ti bawk).

(chhek), v.t. tiding, chelh, dang, hau, endik, chîk, fiah, ze killi tam taka \ial (check shirt - kamis dung leh vâng zâwnga ze \ial nei). n. chess khelhnaah chuan a lal vauna, tihdinna, danna, thil hming ziah tlara duh zawng zawng chhinchhiahna thai hi, pawisaa chantîr theih lehkha thupêk (dân narânin 'cheque'), ze killi nei insi \hat.
(chhekarz), n. draught (draft) infiamna.
(chhembarlin), n. lalber leh miliante mutna pindan enkawltu officer, company tangka vawngtu.
(chherab), n. serafîm chi khat, naupang duhawm tak. cherubs, cherubim leh cherubims, pl. of cherub.
(chheri), n. theite chi khat. adj. cherry hmin anga tai.
(chherish), v.t. ngaina, ngaihlu, thinlunga vei or chhawm.
(chhes), n. sa atâna milem ker hmanga innawrna or infiamna.
(chhesn), v.t. hremna nêna tithianghlim, hrem, sim tûra hrem.
(chhest), n. thingrem hrawl tak, tangka bâwm, âwm (bâwr).
(chhiftin), n. chi khat lal.
(chhik), n. artê, sava no, naupang koh duatna.
(chhil), n. hritlâng, mi tinguitu. adj. vawt tia khûr, hritlâng kai. v.i. vâwt ti. v.t. tivâwt, tingui.
(chhilblein), n. khawvawh laia kut leh ke vûng.
(chhili), n. hmarcha.
(chhimni), n. meikhuchhuah, lal\în dârthlalang.
(chhimpanzi), n. zâwng lian zînga mihring ang teuh ber.
(chhin), n. khabe.
(chhingk), n. kak, khi chat, pawisa thin rîk chheng chheng. v.i. ri chheng chheng.
(chhip), v.t. thîrkhen nêna ker, thel. n. thing har, thelna hâwng or hâr te tak tê, pawisa pound khat. chip of the old block, pa te ze khawk hlauh.
(chhipmangk), n. hleimualrâng.
(chhisl), n. thirkhen. v.t. ker.
(chhit), n. lehkha thema thu thawn, slip.
(chhu), v.t. \hial. n. sahdah hmuam khat. chew the cud, ran \henkhatina an thil ei an irh chhuah leha an \hial nawn ang hi, ngun taka ngaihtuah.
(chhuz), v.t. thlang. chose (chhawz), pa.t of choose.
(chhâns), n., adj. hun, hun remchâng, thil lo thleng palh, thil ni thei, a pawi tûr leh tûr loh hre lova thil tih luih.
(chhânselar), n. chief minister. Chancellor of the Exchequer, British sawrkâra pawisa vawngtu Minister.
(chhânsmedli), adj. tual thah palh (a thattu pawh a fimkhur loh vâng emawa thiam chang thei vak bîk lo).

(chhânt), v.t. zai, hlaa chawi, thlûk nei lek leka chham or hril. n. hla. Katholik Mass rawngbâwlnaa puithiamina zai chunga thlûk tidanglam mang lova thu sei tak tak a chham ang hi. (Solfa-a 'do' ringawtah te hian thu tlar hnih lai chham zâwl âwt ila, chu chu chant ani).
(chhâr), v.t. hliau ung or ût, kâng ût.

(chhârj), v.t. chaw thun, silai mu thun, electric thun, hna tuk sak, man zât chhiar, puh, insualna leh indonaa nawr or bawh thut. n. man zât, silai zên thun zât, awmpui, enkawl, kaihhruai, electric inthun khâwl zât, puhna, hêkna, nawrna, bawhna. charges, sênso.
(chhârkâwl), n. meihawl.
(chhârm), n. aizial, aikaih, zêl, ai neia an chhâl tlereuh awrh leh bun chi, nungchang duhawmna, mi hîp theihna. v.t. aizial, mi hîp, mi tilâwm.
(chhâwrz), n. hna kahpah, hna pênhleh, ni tin inchhûng hnathawh.
(chhêf), v.t. nâwt sa vur, nâwt phuai, tithinur. v.i. thinur, âng.
(chhêmbar), n. pindan, inkhâwmna hmun, rorêlna hmun, silai ngul bul lam or mawng lam. chamber of commerce, sumdâwnna tihhmasâwn tumte pâwl.
(chhêra), adj. renchem, fîmkhur.
(chhîf), n., adj. lal, lu ber, pawimawh ber.
(chhîk), n. biang, kawngka biang, zahtheih lohna.
(chhîp), adj. man tlâwm, tênau, ho.
(chhîr), n. rilru put dân hlimna, râwl nêna lawmpui or fuihna, inlawmna. v.t. hnêm, fuih, lâwm, lawmpui.
(chhît), v.t. bum. n. bumhmang.
(chhîtâ), n. keite chi khat (ramsa zînga tlân chak bera an sawi).
(chhîz), n. Sâp saum kan tih mai, bâwnghnute khal a\anga thingfanghma phel hmêl ang tak thil khal an siam.
(da-, dawmestik), adj. inchhûng khawsak lam thil, in lam thil, mahni bil, ngam, khawi ngam, tualchhûng or mahni ram chhûng thil.
(dab), hming vuahsak, nihna siam sak.
(dabl), adj., n. a lêt hnih, a kawp, anpui, aiawh, thlep khat. v.t. a lêta puntîr, thlep, aiawh. v.i. a lêta tam, inthlep. doubly, adv.
(dabl), v.t. tuia thing, tuia theh. v.i. tui sawisa, beitham taka thil ti.
(dablit), n. hmân lai mipa kawr tâwt tak, thil tihnawn, a kawppui.
(dablûn), n. hmân lai Spanish pawisa.
(dachh), adj. Holland ram mipui leh an \awng.
(dachhi), n. Sâp lal upa (duke) ram awp chhûng.
(dad), n. kawr chhia, bomb tlawlh, pawisa lem, thil lem, thil \angkai lo.
(dadl), v.i. pai, nghet lo taka kal.
(daf), n. chhangphut hmeh ban, hnimhnah \âwih mêk. v.t. chei thar leh, ran rûk chhinchhiahna chei danglam.
(daf), v.i. ninhlei, infiam.
(dafar), n. kut themthiam lo, mi tlâktlai lo, pawisa chhia, thil laihchhuah tumna khur tlawlh, lunghlu lema tlereuh siam zuar mi, a taktak anga chhâla thil lem zuar mi.
(dafawdil), n. pangpâr chi khat.
(dag), n. bâwng leh ran dang hnute bu or hmûr.
(dagar), n. chemte lu zum.
(dagarawtaip), n. thlalâk dân chi khat.
(dagl), v.t., v.i. hnûk huh, theh huh.
(dahshund, dakshunt), n. ui khân hniam leh rawng sei tak chi.
(dai), pahnih, a lêt hnih kawp.
(dai), v.t. rawng hnawih, rawng dum. n. rawng.
(dai), v.t. thi, mit, chul, chuai. die (dai), n. \humvâwr lung.
(daiabawlik), diabolical (-ikal), adjs. ramhuai ang, ramhuai thil, Diabola thil.
(daiadem), n. lallukhum.
(daiafram), n. hamdâ, duardâ, hâm, râng.
(daiagawnal), adj. a khawkham zâwnga thil kil pahnih inep zawmtu.
(daiagnawz, -aws), v.t. natna endik.
(daiagnâwsis), n. hnathawh dân a\anga natna awmte hriat theihna, thil awmzia sawina. [diagnoses, (daiagnâwsiz), pl.].
(daiagram), n. thil hmêlhmang riruang, a lema entîrna.
(daial), n. sana hmai, thil tehna sana. v.t. telephone-a sana hmai bial hmanga mi ko.
(daialawg), n. mi pahnih or pahnih aia tam inkâra thusawi, mi inbiakna.

(daialekt), n. bial khat leh hnam khat \awng chîn dân bîk, \awng tuallêng tling meuh lo \awng dân ze hrang (Zoram chhim-chhak bial chuan 'lo kal' tih aiah 'rawn kal' tih hi an chîng \hîn a, chu chu dialect a ni).
(daiaman), n. lunghlu, lehkhadena zum, baseball khelhna tual (zum anga kil li nei).
(daiamitar), n. a tan tlanga tehna, thil bial or mûm tan tlang.
(daiana), n. Rom mite êng pathiannu, thla pathiannu, thianghlimna hming chawitu, sa pêltute pathiannu.
(daiaper), n. puan them kil li nei (chaw ei dawhkâna hman chi).
(daiari), n. ni tin thiltih chhinchhiah or ziah luhna bu.
(daiarki), n. mi pahnih rorêl, a \huanga ram or pâwl or lal pahnih rorêlna.
(daiarnal), adj. ni tin, ni khat thil, chhûn thil.
(daiatawmik), adj. atom pahnih nei.
(daiatawnik), adj. solfa-a a thlûk chhukchho bi pângngaia kal.
(daiatraib), n. inphaman zata tîtî, rei tak chhûng inhauh bawrh bawrhna.
(daiawksaid), n. oxygen hlova atom pahnih awmna.
(daiawsis), n. bishop bial chhûng.
(daidelfik), adj. chhûl hnih nei.
(daiet), n. ei tûr inchawh lâwkna, ei tûr inruat sak, chaw. v.i. ei tûr intuk, \han luattuk loh nâna ei lama inkhuahkhirh.
(daigraf), n. hawrawp pahnih ri pakhat nei (\hina \h, hringa hr).
(daigres, digres), v.i. pêng, pelhe, thu dang daiha pêng, thu mumal lo rawlh. digression, n.
(daihard), n. ngaih dân leh duh dân thlâk hreh chi, luhlul.
(daiing), adj. thi mêk, chimit mêk, thihna thil.
(daim), n. America dollar hmun sâwma \hena hmun khat, cent 10. dime novel, thawnthu bu man tlâwm tak (dân narânin ngaihnawm duh tak).
(dain), v.i. chaw ei. dine out, hmun danga chaw ei.

(dainamaw, dinamaw), n. thîrhîpthei inkâra dârzai kual virtîra electric siamna khâwl, (electric motor nên a pianhmang chu inang titih mah se, dynamo hi chu electric siamtu a ni a, electric motor hi chu electric tha nêna dynamo tihvir a ni).
(dainar), n. chaw eitu.
(dainâwsawr), n. khawmual awle chi mang tawh (laikîng râpthlâk).
(dair), adj. râpthlâk, pawi leh hlauhawm.
(dais), pl. dice, v.i. \hum vâwr, the die is cast, vâwr lung chu vâwrin a awm ta, sût leh theih a ni ta lo, kohkîr rual loh.
(daisefalas), adj. lu hnih nei.
(daitheiizm), n. pathian pahnih awm rinna.
(daiv), v.i. liluh, boruaka bir thla, pûka lût, ngawa tlan lût, lût, bir lût. n. lei hnuaia tawmna, thil sual tihrûkna khur (American).
(daivalj, divalj), v.t. lailang, puangzâr.
(daivalzhn, divalzhn), n. pawh darhna, pawh \henna.
(daivars, divars), adj. danglam, inang lo, chi tam tak.
(daivart, divart), v.t. thle pêng, la pêng, kuai pêng.
(daivarz), adj. eng emaw zât, pakhat aia tam.

(dak), n. varak, varak nu (a pa chu drake), tuia inhnimna, bûk zauh, kûn zauh. v.t. tuia hnim zauh. v.i. bu zauh, liluh, tuia inhnim zauh. lame duck, mu awngrawp. play ducks and drakes, lailêntuipala lung vawm.
(dakat), n. hmân lai Europe rama pawisa lâr tak.
(dakawit), n. suamhmang a ruala chetla.
(dakt), n. taksa leh thlai kûng chhûng tuihnâng kalna dâwt, electric hrui phûmna thîr dâwt.
(daktil), n. zung\ang, hla thua ri pathum inzui (a hmasa chu thlûk sei, a zuitu pahnih chu thlûk ran, Entir nan - Lêngi man).
(daktil, daktail), adj. nêm, thlep awlsam, thunun awlsam.
(dal), adj. rilru chak lo, fingvâr lo, thil hre har, nguai, ngui, rawng lâr lo, khaw dul, dul, bil.
(dali), v.i. engmah lova hun khawh ral, infiam, inchûl.
(dalmêshan), adj. Dalmatia ram thil. n. Dalmatia ui râng.
(dalsit), adj. thlum, mawi, thlûk inrem.
(dam), adj. \awng thei lo, ri lo, \awng mawh, chhaw.
(dam), v.t. chatuan hremna tuartîr, hremhmuna kal tûra ruat, anchhe lawh.
(damd, hla thuah chuan damnid), adj. anchhe dawng, hremhmuna kal tûra ruat.
(dami), n. milem, mi \awng mawh, mahni thu leh hla nei ve lova mi tirhkah mai mai, a lem, lehkhadena chan khat changtu awm lo.
(damij), n. thil tihchhiat, thil tihchhiat hlut lam or a man zât.
(daming, damning), adj. thiam lo, hrem tlâk, hrem chi.
(damnabl), adj. anchhe dawng tlâk, hrem tlâk, huatthlala.
(damneshn), n. thiamloh chantîrna, chatuan hremna.
(damp), v.t. nghat chawrh. n. ri dawp, bawlhhlawh leh thil dang dahkhâwmna hmun, sipai thawmhnaw dahkhâwmna hmun.
(dampi), adj. tawi si san \ha si, tawi si nghet si.
(dampling), n. chhang diak ur hmin.
(damzl), n. nula.
(dan), adj. paw-uk. n. tlâng mual pâwnga kulh.
(dan), ti tawh.
(dandarhed), n. mi chhawih.
(dandi), n. inchei âtchilh mi.
(dandilaian), n. pangpâr chi khat.
(dandl), v.t. chhaih, chhawnchhaih.
(dandraf), n. luphut.
(dang), n. êk, bêwng êk lei\ha.
(dangk), adj. hnâwng, hnâwm, huh.
(dangl), v.i., v.t. khai, inkhai, uai, zui kawi.
(danjan), n. tân in thim tak.
(dans), n. thil thiam har mi, mi chhawih.
(dans), n., v.t., v.i., lâm.
(dapar), adj. te, \uanrang, fel.
(dapl), adj., v.t. \ial, rang.
(darbar), n. mipui ngaih dân ngaihthlâkna hmunpui, rorêlna hmun, mipui kawmna.
(darm), n. vun. derma leh dermis an ti bawk.
(darst), hmân lai leh sakhaw \awnghmanga 'dare' past tense.
(dart), bawlhhlawh, bawlhhlawh kai, lei \hîl. throw dirt, tihminghliau.
(darth), n. vânna, to na, \âm.
(darvish), n. Mosolman sakhaw zuitute zînga puithiam ang reng ho khat (tisa nawmna mausâmtu pâwl).
(dask), adj. hâng, thim, dum. n. thimhlim, var\ian.
(dast), n. vaivut (lêng vêl), vaivut paw, thil dip, lei, thlân. throw dust in one's eye, biakbum.
(dauajar), n. hmeichhai hausa, pasal sûn tawh hmeithai mahni pasalte ro khâwmtu, hmeithai zahawm.
(dauar), n. ro khâwm, sum-leh-pai chhawm. v.t. ro khâwmtîr, thuam chhawmtîr.

(daun), n. sava hmul nêm tak. down (daun), adv. chhuk lamah, hnuai lamah, chhim lamah (khawthlang hi hnuai lama awm anga kan ngai angin chhim lam hi an ngai \hîn a ni), hmasâng a\anga tûn, zêl, khumbetin, ziakin. v.t. thlah, chawlhsan. up and down, vei sek.
(dauri), n. hmeichhe thuam leh ro chhawm.
(daut), v.i., v.t., ringhlel, ngaih\ha lo, a ngaihna hre lo, hlauthâwng. n. rinhlelhna, hlauhthâwnna.
(dauti), adj. thei, chak, huaisen.
(dauz), v. dâwi tiang nêna tui hna awmna zawng chhuak.
(dav), n. \huro, va\hu, mîmsirikût, vahui, pârva, hmeichhe koh duatna.
(daw), n. chhangphut hmeh ban, pawisa.
(daw), n. sazuk nu, sakhi nu, ramsa chi \henkhata a nu.
(dawb), v.t. chulh, rawng hnawih.
(dawfin), n. hmân lai France ram lalber fapa upa ber.
(dawgarel), n. hla thu mumal lo.
(dawgawn, dawgawnd), interj. dog on it, het!
(dawgid), adj. beidawng har.
(dawglegid), adj. kaiza peu.
(dawguawchh), n. lawnga thimhlima dârkâr hnih chhûng khawthlîrna.
(dawj), v.t., v.i. bum kawi, pehhêl, pumpelh.
(dawk), n. hnim chi khat. dock (daw), n. lawng chawlh hmun, rêl chawlhna lai. v.t. dock-a châwl or chawlhtîr.
(dawkhiument), n. lehkha pawimawh. documental, adj.
(dawkit), n. thu ziak lâk tawi, a chhûnga thil awm chuanna lehkha them, thubuai rêl tûr zât ziahna bu, lei phalna lehkha. v.t. ziak lût, lehkha phêk hnung lama a thu awm kaihtawi ziak.
(dawktar), n. daktawr, kohhrana mi thiam, sakhaw chanchin hre mi, zirna lama sâng, lawng chawchhûm. v.t. damlo enkawl, thawm \ha.
(dawktrin), thil zirtîr lai, thurin.
(dawktrineir), n. thil âwm ang tak chhawrbâwk theih si loh ngaihtuah chhuak tu.
(dawl), n. chanpual, chanpual semna, rethei thilpêk, sawrkâr hlawh pêk, chanpual tlêm te. v.t. tlêm tlêma sem chhuak.
(dawlar), n. na, tuarna, lungngaihna.
(dawlawmait), n. thil laih chhuah chi khat chinai pai.
(dawlawras), adj. na tuar, lungngai,
(dawldramz), n. nguaina.
(dawlfin), n. zâwngdulinu.
(dawltanizm), n. rawng thliar hran theih lohna, sen leh hring hriat hran theih lohna, mahni duh dân ang leh tuina zâwnga lehkha zirna.
(dawm), n. inchung mûm.
(dawminawz), n. infiamna chi khat.
(dawmineit), v.t. awp, hneh, chaldelh, chungtlâk, langsâr.
(dawmini), n. zirtîrtu, pastor.
(dawminiar), v.i. hneh, awp, lal hrawt. domineering, adj.
(dawminikal), adj. Lalpa thil.
(dawmisail, -sil), n. mahni chênna hmun or ram. v.t. hmun ngheta chêntîr.
(dawngki), n. sabengtung.
(dawnt), do not kaihtawi.
(dawnt), v.t. tih\haih, tihlau, titîm. dauntless, adj. huai, hlau lo.
(dawnêshn), n. thilthlâwnpêk.
(dawr), n. kawngkhar, kawngka, panpawhna.
(dawrmaus), n. sazu chi khat thlasik chhûng zawnga muhîl chi.
(daws), n. damdawi ei zât tûr bi, damdawi ei khat, thil bithliah zât. v.t. damdawi pe.
(dawsail, dawsil), adj. kaihhruai awlsam, ngam, hmin.
(dawsar), n. bang puanzâr ropui tak.
(dawsij), n. damdawi pêk zât.
(dawsiê, dawsiar), n. mi mal emaw, thubuai emaw chungthu chuanna lehkha tumtêl pawimawh.
(dawtar), n. fanu. daughter-in-law, fa mo.
(dawtij), n. duatna, pangchanna.
(dawz), v.t. nghet vak lova muhîl, muthlu.
(daz), doeth, doth (dath tia lam rîk tûr. Hmân lai \awnghmang leh tûn lai huna sakhaw lam \awng hmang a ni a, does aiah an hmang \hîn (He doeth unto others...).
(dazl), v.t., v.i., tlê, mitvai khawpa ên, mak khawpa êng, mak khawpa nalh or mawi or thiam or nal. dazzling, adj.
(dazn), n. dawrzawn khat, 12. Number zâtin a hmakhalh chuan dawrzawn tam tak pawh ni se 'dozen' tho a ni a. A dawrzawn zât sawi a nih lêm loh chuan 'dozens' tih a ni. six dozen, dozens of them.
(de-, divawlûshn), n. inhlan chhâwnna, thuneihna inhlân chhâwng.
(debiutant, debutant), n. vântlâng hmaa inlan hmasakna tawngtu mipa [hmeichhia chu debutante (debutangt, debutant)].
(debri), n. keh sawm, chhe hnawk nulh, thil chhe darh nuai, lung darhsarh.
(ded), adj. thi, ball chêt loh lai, vâwt leh nguai, hlobet leh thing awm lo, tâwpkhâwk, dik lutuk.
(dedikheit), v.t. thil thianghlim atâna ruat hrang or serh, impumpêk, hlân.
(def), adj., n. bengngawng, ngaihsak lo, chhûngmu nei lo.
(defamêshn), n. intihhmingchhiatna, dik lo taka insawichhiatna. defamatory (defamatawri), adj.
(defarens), n. mi thu zawmna, mi hnuaia inphahna.
(defikeit), v.t. thil fîm, thlawr fîm. v.i. e, dailêng.
(definishn), n. sawifiahna.
(definit), adj. chiang, dik chiah, zat chiah, huang chiah.

(dei), n. ni, chhûn, dârkâr 24 chhûng (zanlai a\angin), ni khata hnathawh hun chhûng, damchhûng, khaw êng, tukverh thîr (thing) tun inkâr âwng, hun. call it a day, \in or bânsan zai rêl. day by day, ni tinin. day off, chawlh ni. the other day, hmân ni. win the day, hneh, ngam.
(deil), n. ruam zâwl, ram kuam, lui ruam.
(deili), adj., adv. ni tin. n. ni tin chhuak chanchin bu.
(deim), n. chhûngpui nu, nu, hmeichhia, nu challang.
(dein), n. Denmark hnam (mi). Danish, adj. Dane thil. n. Dane \awng.
(dein), v.i. inphah hniam, chan hnuaihnung leh tlâwm zâwkte biak phâka inphah hnuai.
(deinjar), n. hlauhawm. dangerous, adj.
(deinti), adj., tui, nêm, derthâwng. n. thil tui tak.
(deir), v.i., v.t. cho, ngam, zuam. daring, adj. huai, hlau lo.
(deiri), n. bâwnghnute hmunpui, bâwnghnute hriak siamna hmun. dairy-farm, n. bâwng vulhna huan.
(deis), n. dawhsâng, thusawitu dinna dawhsâng, maichâm chungzâr.

(deit), n. ni, tarik, thil thlen hun, nula, tlangval lên chhuahpui. v.t. hun pe, ni ruat, nula tlangval lênvahpui. v.i. \an, awm \an. date-line, n. khawchhak leh khawthlang inthliarna lai. out of date, thil hlui. up to date, tûn lai hun thil. date (deit), n. tûm rah thlum chi.
(deita), n. kawhhmuhna, hmawrhmuhna. datum, sing.
(deiz), v.t. tibîng chûk chûk, timit sulh, a ngaihna tihre lo, tichi-ai, ênkhalh. dazed, adj.
(deizi), n. ram pangpâr chi khat.
(dek), v.t. khuh, tuam, chei, tiang. n. a khuhna, lawng chhuat (a mawng ni lovin), lawnga chhuat chhâwng, chhuat chhâwng, lehkhaden bu khat.
(dekadens), n. tlâkchhiatna, tlâkranna.
(dekagawn), n. thil lem kil sâwm leh sîr rîn sâwm nei.
(dekahîdrawn), n. thil sakhat hmai sâwm nei.
(dekalawng), n. Pathian Thu Sâwm Pêk.
(dekamp), v.i. pût chhuak, tlân bo.
(dekasilabl), n. hla tlar ri mal sâwm nei (Chan ka nuam chul hnu a par zo zamah), thu mala ri sâwm nei (Vanlalpathianmalsawmnadawngliana).
(dekastik), n. hla châng tlar sâwm nei.
(dekeid), n. sâwm rual, kum sâwm bi.
(dekhawras), adj. âwm, inhmeh, dik, fel, rem.
(dekhawreit), v.t. chei mawi, tangkapui pe, chawimawi. decoration, n.
(dekhiupl), adj. a lêt sâwm.
(dekhlamêshn), n. puanzârna, thu sawi tûr ruat sa.
(dekhlareshn), n. puanna, chhâlna, ziaka nemnghehna.
(dekhlineshn), n. âwih, pêng kawi.
(dekstar), adj. ding lam.
(deksteriti), n. kut \uan ranna, khawr lohna, veikhawr lohna.
(delibareit), v.t., v.i. ngaihtuah, rilrua bûk, inrâwn, rêl. adj. (dilibarit), ngaihtuah fel sa, tum lâwk diam, tihluih thil, fimkhur taka tih.
(deligeit), v.t. palai or aiawha tîr. n. palai, aiawh.
(delikasi), n. thil tuihnai, mawihnaina.
(delikit), adj. nêm, no, hriatna hriam nei, derthâwng, sîn, pan, hraw lo, dimdawi ngai.
(delitîrias), adj. mi tina thei, hlauhawm, tûr pai.
(deluij), n. tui lian, tui lian a kuanga luang liam, tui lêt. v.t. tui lian anga hnâwl, tam taka vûr.
(delv), v.t., v.i. lailang, bih, chîk, zawng, âwih bung.
(demagawg), n. mipui hruaitu, thu sawi thiam. demagogic, adj.
(demarj), v.t. chiah, hnim.
(dematirialaiz), v.t., v.i. nihna paih, engmah lova chan.
(demawnstreit), v.t. entîr, lantîr, chhuahtîr, thiltih nena entîr.
(demawralaiz), v.t. tirilru chhia, phûrna tibo, tibeidawng.
(demi), thu hma lama zawmna a chanve tihna.
(dengge), n. khawsik hri chi khat.
(denigreit), v.t. tidum, tihmingchhia.
(denigêshn), n. phatna.
(deniudêshn), n. hlihna, sik leh sa (ruahtui, etc.)-in lei chunglâng a hnâwl kian.
(dens), adj. chhah, pik, rilru chhah, bâwn.
(dentilinggual), adj. lêi leh ha inhnea lam rîk chi (Sap\awnga 'th' lam rîk lei tâwtina 'thing' etc. an lam rîk dân ang).
(depawpiuleit), v.t. mihring awm lova siam, a chhûnga mihring chêng hnawt chhuak or that mang.
(deprideit), v.t. suam, rawk, tirêm, rauh, ei, pet.
(derawgeit), v.i. lâk tlêm sak, sawi chhia.
(derik), n. rit chawi sawnna khâwl.
(derilikt), adj. thlahthlam, rauhsan, hnuchhawnsan.
(deringdu), n. huaisen thil.
(derinjar), n. puakruk tawi chi.
(desaltari), adj. bet lo, nghet lo, kânglâng, mumal lo, ti pawlh pawlh.
(desawleit), v.t tikhawhar, thlalêra siam. adj. (desawlit), fianrial, khawhar.
(desikeit), v.t. pho ro, rêp ro.
(desikhreit), v.t. thil serh tiduhdah, tibawlhhlawh.
(desimal), adj., n. a sâwm bia chhiar, hmun sâwma \henna.
(desimeit), v.t. hmun sawma \hena hmun khat la chhuak, vântlâng hrem nâna mi sâwm zînga pakhat zêl tihhlumna, pawh darhna, nasa taka tihtlemna.
(desparadaw, -redaw), n. mi beisei bo, mi pawisak nei tawh lo, suamhmang, mi â.
(desparit), adj. beisei bo, beidawnthlâk, pawisak nei tawh lo khawpa beidawng.
(despikabl), adj. hmusitawm.
(destin), v.t. ruat, thi tûra ruat.
(destitiut), adj. tlachham, kawnkaw, hlamchhiaha awm, thlahthlama awm.
(det), n. leiba. debt of honour, pawisa inkhêlna leibat.
(detawneit), v.t., v.i. tipuak, puak. detonation, n.
(deth), n. thihna.
(devasteit), v.t. tiram, tichhia, suam, suasam. devastation, n.

(devl, devil), n. ramhuai, Setana, mi sual tâwpkhâwk. v.t. hmuihmer nêna chhûm. v.i. mi hna rinawm taka thawhsak. printer's devil, n. press hnathawk zînga a tuai ber (Chuvângin khâwl ha rem dik loh sawi nân pawh an hmang \hin). play the devil, thil tichhe chiam, thil tihnawk or tibuai nuai. talk of the devil, mi chhe sawi chu koh aiin a sâwt.
(dezigneit), v.t. ruat, lantîr, entîr, hming vuah.
(dezignêshn), n. hming, nihna, hnathawh, dinhmun.
(dha), adj. chu, chuan.
(dhah), conj. aiin.
(dhai), pron. i (ta).
(dhain), pron. i ta.
(dhas), adv. hetiang hian, chutiang chuan.
(dhat), pron. and adj. kha kha, kha, chu chu, chu.
(dhau), pron. nangmah, i, nang.
(dhaw), conj. mahsela, chung pawhin.
(dhei), pron. anmahni, an.
(dheir), adj. an (ta). theirs, pron. an ta.
(dhem), pron. an hnenah, anmahni.
(dhemselvz), pron. anmahni leh anmahni.
(dhen), adv. tichuan, chutih lai chuan, chutah. conj. chuti a nih chuan, chuvângin.
(dhens), adv. chuta \ang chuan, chuvâng chuan.
(dhi), pron. hmân lai \awnga 'che' (you) tihna.
(dhidhar), adv. chutah, chu miah.
(dhis), pron. hei hi, he.
(dhiz), pron. and adj. hêng hi.
(dhâwz), pron. sâwng saw, sawng.
(dhêr), adv. saw tah, chutah.
(di-, defalkeit), v.t. tlâng sum vawn lai ei ru, mi pawisa kawlsak ei ru.
(diabîtîz), n. zun in pui. diabetes mellitus (melaitas), n. zun thlum. diabetic, (daiabitik, -betik), adj.
(diar), adj., n. to, man sâng, duhawm tak, hmangaih.
(diar), n. sazuk chi rêng rêng [sakhi (barking deer, sazuk bauh chi) tiamin].
(diasfekt), v.t. ngaihna tibo, tilungawi lo.
(diawdar), n. fâr thing chi.
(diawdawraiz), v.t. a rim tibo.
(dibakl, dêbakl), n. lui tui chunga vûr khang zawp chhiat or tuiral leh hun lai, keh chhiatna, mumal lova a ruala tlânchhiat.
(dibangk), v.t. a nihna lailang, mi dik lohna lailang.
(dibawchh), v.t. thlêm sual, hurna kawnga kal sualtîr. v.i. a lutuka thil ti.
(dibeis), v.t. tihniam, hlutna tibo, tihawlhhlawh, titlawm.
(dibeit), n., v.t., v.i. inhnialna, inhnial fiamna, hnial, hnial fiam, ngaihtuahho.

(dibenchiar), n. ziaka leibat nemnghehna, company pawisa puka in-leh-lo dahkhamna, ram dang a\anga bungraw lei ram dang vêka hralh chhuak lehtu hnêna lâk luh chhiah pêk kîr leh thiamna lehkha. (England a\angin press khâwl chêng singkhat man lei ila, India sawrkârin chhiah chêng sangnga min chawitîr se la, chu khâwl chu Burma ramah hralh leh ta ila, India sawrkar chuan mi rama mi lâk luh man chêng sangnga chhiah kha min pe kîr leh ang).
(dibiliteit), v.t. tiderthâwng, tichak lo.
(dibâr), v.t., dâl, khap, telh ve lo.
(dibûsh), v.i. pût chhuak, chik chhuak.
(dichh), n. khur, khuarkhurum, tuihâwk luankawr. v.i. tuihâwk luankawr siam. v.t. khur lai, khur cho.
(did), n. thiltih, ziaka thuthlung or intiamna nemnghehna.
(didakt), v.t. la chhuak, paih.
(didius), v.t. chhui nâna hmang, thil awm hmasa nêna thil inkûngkaihna zawng, a hnuleh or a kaihhnawih siam.
(didl), v.t. bum.
(diepreiv), v.t. tikhawlo. depraved, adj. khawlo, sual.
(difai), v.t. cho, pawisa lo.
(difaians), n. chona, mi pawisak lohna.
(difail), v.t. tibawlhhlawh. n. tlâng kâr kawng zîm tak.
(difain), v.t. sawi fiah, ri chin kham fel, awmze sawi fiah.
(difangkt), adj. mit, thi mang, chul, chuai.
(difar), v.i. danglam, inang lo, mil lo.
(difar), v.t. hun sawn, \hulhpui, tikhawtlai. deferment, n. defer (difar), v.i. mi thu zâwm.
(difawlieit), v.t. hnah tikawlh.
(difawlt), n. tlin lohna, dik lohna, mi pawisa kawl sawi chîbûna. v.i. tih tûr ti lo, thubuai rêlna hmuna kohva kal lo.
(difawrist), v.t. ngaw \hiat.
(difawrm), v.t. tihmêlhem, pianhmang mawina tichhia, tipiangsual.
(difeim), v.t. tihmingchhia, rêl, dik lo taka puh or hêk.
(difeis), v.t. nuai chhia, tihmelhem, nuai reh.
(difekt), n. kim lohna, chhiatna, \hat lohna.
(difens), n. inhumna, invênna, inchhanna, thubuai rêlna hmuna an mi hêka \an lâkna or thiamthu sawina.
(difereshieit), v.t. tidanglam, thlei hrang, thliar hrang.
(difikalt), adj. harsa, tawh khirh. difficulty, n.
(difiliêshn), n. fa te inlâk bo sakna, fa inchântîrna.
(difishent), adj. kim lo. deficiency, deficience, nn. kim lohna.
(difizait, difisait), n. Kristian Pathian leh mihring nihna a kawp tih ringtu.
(diflaur), v.t. pâr ti\îl, pâr thlahtîr, mawina tibo, nula himna tihbo sak, nula pawngsual.
(difleit), v.t. tithêp. v.i. thêp.
(diflekt), v.t., v.i. tikawi, kal kawi, khak kawi.
(diflâwreit), adj. pâr chuai tawh.
(difrakt), v.t. \ai darhtîr.
(difrawd), v.t. bum, ei rûksak.
(difrei), v.t. rûl, hlawh pe, man pe.
(difthawng), n. vowel pahnih ri khata ri (aw, ei, etc.) æ, œ.
(difthîria), n. hrawk na hlauhawm tak leh inkai awlsam tak.
(difuiz), v.t., v.i. a vêla theh darh, \ai darh, darh, puangzâr.
(difît), v.t. hneh. n. hneh lohna, tlâwmna, hlawhchhamna.
(digami), n. inneih vawi hnihna.
(dignifai), v.t. chawimawi, chawi sâng.
(digniti), n. zahawmna, ropuina, hmun sâng, hna sâng.
(digreid), v.t. tihniam, hlutna tikiam, tihmingchhia. degradation (degradêshn), n.

(digri), n. pâwl rahka, bi, bithliah, dinhmun, zau lam, nasat lam, zirna sikul sânga chawimawina or thiamna lama hming an pêk, thil bial reng reng hmun 360-a \hen kâk hmun khat, lei tehna mel 60, thubuai rorêlnaa thiamloh chan dan chi hrang hrang. third degree, innghaisakna nêna misual dâwptu.
(dihaidreit), v.t. tiro, tituihul, tui pai siak hul (dehydrated milk - bawngthnute dip).
(dihiumanaiz), v.t. mihring nihna leh anna tibo.
(diiti), n. pathian nihna, pathianna, Pathian (Deity) or pathian (deity).
(dijekt), v.t. tingui, tinguai, tilunghnûr.
(dijenarit), adj. da lam, \âwng, tla hniam. v.i. (dijenereit), tla hniam, \âwng lam pan, chhe lam pan.

(dijest, daijest), v.t. pumpuia \hial sawm, pai \awih, mûk taka ngaihtuah, ngaihtuah chiang. digestion (dijeschien), n. digestive, adj. digest (daijest), n. thu kaihtawi, thu lâwr khâwm, thu kaihtawi leh lâwr khâwm chhuahna chanchinbu.
(dijit), n. zung\ang, zung khat bawk, nambar.
(dikant), v.t. a mawng nawi hnutchhiaha thli chhuak, thli chhâwng, ruak chhâwng.
(dikanteit), v.t., v.i. vawi tam chham nawn.
(dikawdeit), v.t. mei tansak.
(dikei), v.t., v.i., n. tlaran, \awih, a chhe lam panna.
(dikenzian), adj. Charles Dickens a thil or chungthu.
(dikhalar), v.t. a rawng tida.
(dikhambent), adj. mu zâl.
(dikhampres), v.t. tâwtna leh mukna ata sût.
(dikharent), adj. tlan thla, uai.
(dikhawi), v.t. thlêm âwk, a chah or tawktarh nêna thlêm. n. a chah, tawktarh, thang hrui valh, thang, kilên.
(dikhawkht), v.t. chhuang so, chhûm, buatsaih, ruahman. decoction, n.
(dikhawmpawz), v.t., v.i. \awih, a pêng hrang hranga \hiat darh. decomposition (dikhawmpawzishn), n.
(dikhawntamineit), v.t. bawlhhlawh kai tithianghlim.
(dikhawntawl), v.i., n. khuahkhirhna sût.
(dikhlain), v.i. kawi, pêng, rawih, kuai thla, chhuk, âwih, duh lo. v.t. duh lo, hawisan, hersan, kûn, bu.
(dikhlamatawri), adj. mi thinlung tiso chi, thu sawi ring, \awnghmang thiama innghat.
(dikhleim), v.i. vântlâng hmaa thu sawi, puangzâr.
(dikhleir), v.t. puang, chhâl, sawi, rawng thlang, criket khelha thih kim hmaa duh tâwkna.
(dikhlenshn), n. tlâk hniamna, hmun âwih, chhuk.
(dikhliviti), n. âwihtlân, hmun âwih, thil hniam thla.
(dikhrai), v.t. sawisêl, puh, sawichhia.
(dikhrawmatik), adj. rawng chi hnih nei, rawng chi hnih chauh hmu thei.
(dikhrepiteit), v.i. puak tak tak. v.t. kâng puak.
(dikhrî), n. thupêk, dân. v.t. dâna siam.
(dikhrîs), v.t. kiam, tlem lam pan. v.i. titlem. n. (dîkhrîs), tlêmna, hekna.
(dikhâwd), v.t. code a\anga let, ziak rûk sawi fiah.
(dikinz), n. ramhuai (What the dickens are you? - Eng teh lul nge ni i tih? Eng pawi nge i khawih tak?).
(dikrepit), adj. upat vânga tha\hum, tar chak lo, rawih lam.
(dikshenari), n. a A-AW-B indawta thu awmze hrilh fiahna bu.
(dikshn), n. \awng dan, \awng kauchheh.
(diksi), n. sipai bêl dar, dekchi.
(diktafawn), n. aw thunna khâwl.
(diktam), n. thusawi, thufing, thu rinawm tak.
(dikteit), v.t. mi tâna chhiar, mi tâna sawi, thu pe. n. thupêk, thuneihna, rorêl.
(diktêshn), n. zirlaite hriat atâna thu chhiar, zirlaite sipel thiam dân endik nâna thu ziak tûr chhiar chhuahna, thupêk vung tak.
(dilait), v.t. tinuam, tilâwm. v.i. hlim, nuam ti. n. thil nuam tak, hlimawm tak.
(dilaktabl), adj. tui, tuihnai, mawihnai, nuam.
(dilatawri), adj. muangchâng, dâwngdah.
(dilei), v.t. tikhawtlai, hun tawlh sawn, tifûm, timuang. v.i. khawtlai, tlai.
(dileit), v.t. hlân chhâwng, târ chhuak, thil sual tia puh.
(dileit, daileit), v.t., v.i. tizau, parh, arh, darh, zau, rei tak thu sawi. dilation, n.
(dilema, dailema), n. a ngaihna hriat loh, a ngaihna hre lova inkhâpthlûkna.
(diletanti), n. pawnlâng taka thil hlu ngaina (der) mi.
(dilidali), v.i. tangkhang, vâk rawlai, nawmnah.
(dilijent), adj. taima. diligence, n.
(dilimit), v.t. ri chin kham.
(dilingkhuent), adj. tih tûr ti lo. n. tih tûr ti lo mi, thil tisualtu, khawtlâng hma ngai lo mi.
(dilinieit), v.t. rîn kual, rîn nêna a lem siam, lem ziak, a ruangâm chuantîr.
(diliriam), n. phûrna, tlunna. delirium tremens (-trimenz), n. ruih luattuk vânga tlûk buaina, rui tlu kaih or sual.
(dilirias), adj. rilru pelhê, rilru buai, â, na â, tlun buai.
(dilishas), adj. tui, tuihnai, nuam.
(dilivar), v.t. hlân, chhan chhuak, thu sawi, pe, nau hrintîr, hring.
(diliûviam, dilûviam), n. tuilian, tui lêt, lei leh \iauvut hnâwl tuilianina a hnutchhiah. diluvial, diluvian, adjs.
(diluid, -lûd), v.t. bum.
(dilît), v.t. nuai reh, thai bo.
(dilût, diliut, dailût, dailiut), v.t. tidal, tui nêna chawhpawlh dal. v.i. dal, inchawhpawlh. adj. dal.
(dilûzhan), n. bumna, ngaih haina, hriat sualna. delusive, delusory, adjs.
(dimai), n. lehkha chi khat, a hlai lam 22½ x 17½"."
(dimaiz), n. thihna, dah sawnna. v.t. rochhiah, hlân chhâwng.
(dimalsent), adj. awm tinuam thei, hah tidam thei.
(dimand), v.t. ngên, phût, ngiat. n. ngenna, mamawh, châkkhai.
(dimar), v.i. remti lo, a ngaihna hre lo.
(dimarij), n. rêl or lawng or bungraw chelh khawtlai, chelh khawtlai chhiah.
(dimarkêshn), n. ramri, ri kham, huang chhung.
(dimawbilaiz), v.t. sipai a\anga bântîr, râlthuam hlîp.
(dimawdid), adj. thil hlui, chîn ngai tawh loh thil.
(dimawgrafi), n. mihring awm zât chhuina.
(dimawkhrasi), n. mipui rorêlna, mipui thlan sawrkâr, vântlâng mipui. democrat (demawkhrat), n. democracy, n. thurin kengkawhtu, America rama Democrat pâwla mi.
(dimawlish), v.t. tichhia, \hiat. demolition, n.
(dimawn, diman), n. ramhuai.
(dimawnitaiz), v.t. pawisa hlutna tibo, pawisa hnûkkîr (dere leh pawisa pali leh pawisa hlui rêng rêng kha chu an demonitise tawh avângin hman theih a ni tawh lo).
(dimawt), v.t. tlâk hniamtîr (Sipai bel thum kai hi ber hnihah an demote thei).
(dimenshen, daimenshen), n. len lam, zau lam, sei lam, chhah lam.
(dimenshia), n. âtna, rilru kim lohna.
(diment), v.t. ti â, ti chiai, tibuai.
(dimerit), n. tlâk lohna, dik lohna.
(diminiushen), n. tlêmna, hniamna, kiamna.
(dimiur), adj. ngêng, zahawm, mûk, intimûk.
(dimpl), n. biangsum, pangti khuar.
(dimîn), v.t. chetla, khawsa. demeanour, n.
(dinachiar), v.t. nihna tibo, in tlâk lohva zu chawhpawlh danglam.
(dinai), v.t. phat, pawm lo, hnial, kalh, remti lo, thleng duh lo, pha.
(dinaial), n. phatna, duh lohna, hnialna, hnâwlna, hranna.
(dinamait, dainamait), n. lung hâlna. v.t. lung hâlna nêna hâl darh.
(dinans), v.t. vântlâng hmaa dem, sawi chhia.
(dinanshiet), v.t. sawi chhia, dem.
(dinar), n. ni khata chaw ei pui ber, chaw ei, ruai.
(dinari), adj. sâwm bi, sâwm thil, sâwm rual.
(dinasti, dainasti), n. lal chhungkaw inthlah chhâwngte rorêl hun chhûng.
(dinawmineit), v.t. hming vuah, hming saksak.
(dinji), adj. thim, bawlhhlawh, uk, ung, ngui, nguai.
(dinuid), v.t. saruaka siam, hlîp.
(dinâwt), v.t. chhinchhiah hrang, awmze hril.
(dipar), n. hnimtu, chiahtu, thil suahna, fian liang sei, Zângkhua (bungbu tihna ang deuh a ni).
(dipart), v.i. kal, kal bo, kalsan, chhuak, thi. the departed, mitthi.
(dipartment), n. khing, pêng, pisa pêng khat, hna chi khat. departmental, adj.

(dipaw, dîpaw, depaw, dêpaw), n. thil dah khâwmna hmun, sipai hmunpui, rawngrût awmna hmun, sipai thawmhnaw dahna hmunpui, mahni ram chhûnga sipai hnutchhiahte (ram pâwn lama rammute ni lovin), (America \awngah chuan) rêl chawlhhmun, lîrthei chawlhna hmun.
(dipawrt), v.t. dah sawn, hnawt chhuak, hnawt bo. deport (dipawrt), v.t. mahni inkengkawh, chetla, khawsa.
(dipawz), v.t. hmun sâng a\anga paih thla, hnûk hniam, lalna paih.
(dipawzit), v.t. dah, dah lût, nghat, hûng, kawltîr, phah, tling khâwm.
(dipend), v.i. inkhai, rinchhan.
(dipikt), v.t. a ang siam, chipchiar taka sawi fiah.
(dipileit), v.t. hmul thian.
(dipiuti), n. aiawh.
(dipiutêshn), n. aiawha intirhna, palai.
(diplam), v.t. a hmul or thla pawt kawlh.
(diplawi), v.t., v.i. hawng, phelh, \het darh, sipai rual tlar khata insiam.
(diplawma), n. zirna lama tlinna lehkha, sartifiket, zirna lama chawmawina lehkha.
(diplawmasi), n. ram leh ram inkâra palai thiamna, mi biangbiak thiamna, mi chêng deh thiamna.
(diplawr), v.t. pawi ti.
(diplît), v.t. tiruak, tlâkchhamtîr, tikawnkaw.
(diprai-, diprivêshn), n. chântîrna, chânna, nihna inpaihsakna, khawharna, manganna.
(dipraiv), v.t. chântîr, chhuhsak. deprivable, adj.
(dipraviti), n. suahsualna.
(dipres), v.t. beng, nem chhuk, tihniam, tikhuar, tingui, tilunghnûr, tipil.
(diprikeit), v.t. hnial, pawi ti, sual leh hlauhawm pumpelh nâna ngên.
(diprishieit), v.t. tihniam, titlâwm. v.i. hlutna kiam, tlâwm.
(dipsawmênia), n. zu châk hluah hluahna.
(dipuit), v.t. aiawha ruat, palaia tîr.
(diraid), v.t. nuihzat, nuihzabûra hmang. derision (dirishan), n. derisive (diraisiv, diraiziv), adj.
(diraiv), v.t. la, dawng, chhim, zûk, a bula chhui kîr. derivation (deriveshn), n. derivative (derivativ), adj., n.
(direi), v.i. kal buai, chi-ai. n. buai chi-aina.
(direil), v.t. rêl kawng a\anga tlân chhuahtîr or tlûktîr.
(direinj), v.t. tibuai, tikhawlo.
(direkt, dairekt), adj. ngîl, ding, panna hnai ber, hma lam, chawpchilh, chhumbung lova inthlah chhâwng, tlang, zêp neilo. adv. nghâl, ngîl takin. v.t. kaihruai, kawhhmuh, pantîr, thu pe, thawn.
(dirijibl), adj. khalh kawi theih.
(disadvântîj), n. chan chhiatna, bahlahna, hekna, hlohna.
(disafawrist), v.t. ngaw \hiat.
(disagri), v.i. rempui lo, remti lo, mil lo, inhnial buai.
(disaid), v.t., v.i. tum, ti fel, rêl fel.
(disaifar), v.t. ziak rûk chhiar or let, hre thiam.
(disaipl), n. zirtîr, hnungzui, ringtu, Isua zirtîrte.
(disalau), v.t. phal lo, khap, hnâwl.
(disapiar), v.i. bo, bibo, hmuh theih lohva awm.
(disaprûv), v.i., v.t. remti lo, pawm lo, hnâwl. disapproval, n.
(disarei), v.t. a tlar fel lai chawk hnawk, tibuai, thuam hlih sak.
(disareinj), v.t. tihnawk, chawk hnawk.
(disarn), v.t. hre thiam, hmu chhuak, man chhuak.
(disartikhiuleit), v.t. a chuktuah laia tithlawn. v.i. a chuktuah laia thlawn.
(disavau), v.t. phat, phâ, hriatpui lo. disavowal, n.
(disawbei), v.t., v.i. thu âwih lo, zâwm lo, tih hnial.
(disawbîdiant), adj. thu âwih lo, luhlul, tihmawh. disobedience, n.
(disawlûbl, dissoliubl), adj. zawp thei.
(disawlûshn, -liushn), n. inkhâwm \iak darh, zawpna, keh darhna.
(disawlût, -liut), adj. tâl tlaran, rawva.
(disawn), v.t. phat, phâ, tuithlâr, thlau thla.
(disawnant), adj. mil lo, hal, ri inmil lo. dissonance, n.
(disawnar), n. mualphona, zahna, hmingchhiatna. v.t. timualpho, nula tichhia or ngai, pawisa lâkna (cheque) pawm duh lo.
(disawnest), adj. rinawm lo, verther, depde. dishonesty, n.
(disawrganaiz), v.t. tibuai, chawk hnawk.
(disawshieit), v.t., v.i. pâwl or khawtlâng a\anga thlawn, awm hrang, hnawtchhuak. dissociation, n.
(disbars), v.t. hlawh pe chhuak. disbursal, disbursement, nn. sem chhuahna, hlawh sem chhuah.
(disbawel), v.t. rîl khei sak.
(disbilîv), v.t. ringhlel, ring lo, awih lo. disbelief, n.
(dischharj), v.t. bân, chhuahtîr, kâp chhuak, phuh chhuak, thawk. v.t. hlâng thla, pût chhuak, luang chhuak, puak darh. n. bânna, chhuahtîrna, thiam chantîrna, thil luang chhuak (zât), hnathawh.
(disdein, dizdein), v.t. hmusit, ngainêp, entleu. n. hmusitna.
(disekt), v.t. chan darh, endik atâna (ruang ilo) zai sawm, \het sawma endik.
(disembauel), v.t. rîl khei, kawchhûng phawrh.
(disembawdi), v.t. taksa a\anga la chhuak, sipai a\anga chhuahtîr.
(disembl), v.t. thup, hmaithinghâwng vuah.
(disemineit), v.t. theh darh, puang darh.
(disend), v.t. chhuk, tla hniam, thu sâwr zîm or bing, chawr chhuak.
(disengeij), v.t., v.i. tiawl, tithlawn, chhawk.
(disenshant), adj. mil lo, rualrem lo.
(disensitaiz), v.t., v.i. tichawmawlh, na hre lova siam.
(disent), v.i. lungrual lo, inmil lo, ngaihdân inkalh. n. helna, lungrual lohna, tlem zâwkte vuina.
(disentanggl), v.t. phelh, tithlawn.
(disentari, disentri), n. santên.
(disentralaiz), v.t. a laipui a\anga sem darh, sawrkâr laipui a\anga hmun hrang hranga thuneihna sem darh, sawrkâr laipuiina thuneihna leh rorêlna a pum hmawm loh tûra ruahman.
(disepshn), n. inbumna.
(disfigar), v.t. tihmêlhem.
(disfranchhaiz, -franshaiz), v.t. zalenna tibo, vote pe thei lova siam.
(disfêjia), n. thil lem harsa tihna.
(disfêvar), v.t. duhsak lo, remti lo. n. induhsak lohna, duh lohna.
(disgaiz), v.t. thup, hmaithinghâwng vuah. n. inthupna kâwr, ze thupna, nih lo anga lanna.
(disgast), n. ngeina, tenna. v.i. ngei. disgusting, adj. ten, ngei.
(disgaun), v.t., v.i. kawr hlihtîr, nihna bânsan or bântîr.
(disgawri), v.t. luak, phuh chhuak.
(disgrantl), v.t. tihrilhai, ngei. disgruntled, adj. lunghnûr, hrilhai.
(disgreid), v.t. nihna paih sak.
(disgreis), n. hmingchhiatna, mualphona. v.t. timualpho.
(dishevl), v.t., v.i. tihnawk, chawk hnawk, sam tihnawk, pheng, uai hnuang, theu, thur.
(dishârten), v.t. tilunghnûr, tizâm, tibeidawng.
(disidareit), v.t. ngai, châk ngawih ngawih.
(disident), n., adj. kalhtu, kalh, mil lo.
(disidiuas), adj. tlâk kawlh hun nei, hlun lo, hnah tlâk kawlh hun nei, thla bulh hun nei.
(disiliuzhn, -luzhn), n. fin chhuahna, harh chhuahna.
(disinfekt), v.t. natna hrik laka thian fai, natna kai theih laka tifai.
(disinhium), v.t. lei chhûng ata phawrh chhuak (leh).
(disinkhlinêshn), n. hrehna, phûr lohna.
(disintar), v.t. lei chhûng (thlân, etc.) a\anga phawrh (leh).
(disintarest), n. ngaihsak lohna, bengkhawn lohna. v.i. tingaihnawm lo, bengkhawn lo.
(disintigreit), v.t., v.i. \hiat darh, keh darh.
(disipeit), v.t., v.i. titlaran, theh or paih darh, khawhral.
(disipient), adj. awm hlei, beitham.
(disiplin), n. inthununna, inkhuahkhirhna, insawizawina, inhremna. v.t. thunun, khuahkhirh, sawizawi.
(disiunait), v.t., v.i., zawm lo, tla hrang, thlawn.
(disius), n. hman ngai tawh lohna. v.t. hmang tawh lo.
(disizhn), n. tum mumal neihna, tihfelna, rêl felna, tumna.
(diskhalar), v.t., v.i. rawng tida, rawng tichhia, tihmêlhem, tichul, rawng dang kai bawlhhlawhtîr. discolouration, discoloration, n.
(diskhamfit), v.t. tibuai, tichiai, awm tinuam lo, tihrilhai, hneh, ûm darh. discomfiture, n.
(diskharij), v.t. tilunghnual.
(diskharsiv), adj. tlân lâwn, dap lâwr, a tahtawla chhui, chhia leh \ha hriatna thil, finna thil.
(diskhas), n. thlêng thlawh, thil phêk bial, belvâl.
(diskhas), v.t. chîk taka en, sawi-ho, inhnial nâna hmang, thliar.
(diskhaunt), n. man intlêmna, man kiam zât.
(diskhavar), v.t. hmu chhuak, hre chhuak, lailang.
(diskhawnekt), v.t. thlawn, tichat.
(diskhawnsalit), adj. lunghnûr, lungngai, khawhar.
(diskhawnsart), v.t. tibuai, tihrilhai, awm ngaihna tihre lo, hneh.
(diskhawntent), adj. lungawi lo, lungni lo. n. lungnih lohna. discontented, adj. lungawi lo, lungni lo.
(diskhawntiniu), v.t., v.i. bâng, bânsan, titâwp, châw thlawn. discontinuance, discontinuation, nn.
(diskhawntiniuas), adj. thlingthlawn, chhumbung, khaihlak.
(diskhawntiniuiti), n. chhumbung, thlingthlawnna.
(diskhawrd), n. inrem lohna, intihbuaina, inmil lohna, ri chher, ri inmil lo.
(diskhawrs), n. tîtî, thu sawi, thu ngaihtuahhona.
(diskhlawz), v.i. hawng, puangzâr, lailang. disclosure (disklawzhar), n.
(diskhleim), v.t. phat, hnâwl, pawm duh lo, mawh phur duh lo.
(diskhrai), v.t. mita hmu chhuak, enthla. n. hmuh chhuahna.
(diskhraib), v.t. sawi fiah, a ziarang sawi. description (diskhripshn), n.
(diskhredit), v.t. hmehbel, duh lo, pawmsak duh lo, rinhlelh kâitîr, tihmingchhia, ring duh lo. n. hmingchhiatna, takna or dikna pai lohna, demna.
(diskhreshn), n. fîmkhurna, remhriatna, duh ang anga khawsak theihna, mahni thu liau liauva thil tih theihna.
(diskhrimineit), v.t. thlei hrang, thlei bîk, thliar.
(diskhrispansi), n. inmil lohna, inkhuangrual lohna, inchawih lohna.
(diskhrît), adj. fimkhur thiam.
(diskhrît), adj. hrang, chhumbung, chi hrang hranga siam.
(diskuaiet), n. inrem lohna, buaina, philina, ngaihngam lohna. v.t. chawk buai, tiphâwklêk. disquietude, n.
(diskualifai), v.t. hnâwl, pawm lo, tlâk lohva siam.
(diskârd), v.t. hnâwl, paih, hlîp. n. hnâwlna, bânna, mi vâkvai, thil hnâwl.
(dislaik), v.t. duh lo, ngei. n. duh loh, lungten, huat.
(dislawial), adj. rinawm lo, derthawng, ram leh hotute phatsan.
(dislawj), v.t. awmna or tawmna or riahna hmun a\anga hnawt sawn or hnawt chhuak, thlawn.
(dislawkeit), v.t. ulh, a chuktuah tipelh, dah sawn.
(dismaunt), v.i. chhuk, sakawr chung ilo a\anga chhuk. v.t. hlâng thla.
(dispach), See dispatch.
(dispait), n. hmusitna, huatna tak, diriamna. (preposition a nih chuan) nachungin, chung pawhin.
(dispaiz), v.t. hmusit, endawng. despital, despisedness, nn. hmuhsitna.
(disparij), v.t. hnualsuat, dem, chhe zâwk nena tehkhin.
(dispariti), n. intluk lohna, inthlauhna, inan lohna.
(dispars), v.t. hnawt darh, \în botîr. dispersal, n.
(dispashn), n. fîmna.
(dispawil), v.t. suam, rawk, tichereu, tirau, tiram. despoilment, despoliation, nn.
(dispawnd), v.i. lungngai, ngui, beidawng. despondence, despondency, nn. despondent, adj.
(dispawzal), n. deh ralna, semna, enkawlna, remruatna.
(dispawzes), v.t. chântîr, chhuhsak.
(dispawzhar), n. disposal.
(dispawzishn), n. remruat dân, semna, thehthangna, rilru thlêk lam, thlêk zâwng, thinchhiat-zaidam dân.
(dispeir), v.i. beidawng, beisei bo. n. beidawnna.
(dispens), v.t. sem, enkawl, kilkawi, rorêl, pe chhuak. dispense with, a lova khawsa, telh lo.
(dispensêshn), n. sem chhuahna, rorêlna, Pathian min enkawlna, mi kilkawina, inâwlna, ngaihhnathiamna.
(dispepsia), n. pum pai nuam lo, pumpui chak lohna.
(disphawrtias), adj. mi zahder lo, mi zahpah lo.
(dispiut), v.t. hnial, kalh. n. inhnialna, intihbuaina.
(displeis), v.t. la sawn, dah sawn, luahlân. displacement, n.
(displezhar), n. lâwm lohna.
(displîz), v.t. tilâwm lo. v.i. lâwm lo.
(disprûv), v.t. dik lohna lai lang.
(dispâwz), v.t. sem, dah, dek ral, thehthang, âwn, thlêk.
(disrapt), v.t., v.i. tichhia, kehchhia.
(disrigard), v.t. pawisa lo, ngaihsak lo. n. pawisak lohna, ngaihthahna.
(disripiut), n. hming hliauna.
(disrispekt), n. zahpah lohna, chêt dân chaltlai.
(dissatisfai), v.t. tilâwm lo, tilungni lo.
(dissatisfaktawri), adj. lungawithlâk lo, duhthusâm lo.
(distans), n. hlat lam, inhlat dân, kâr, inkâr, hmun hla tak, inkiltawihna. v.t. inkâr hlata dah, kalsan daih.
(distarb), v.t. tibuai, chawk buai.
(disteist), n. ngeina, duh lohna.
(distingguish), v.t. thlei hrang, hmêl leh ziaa hre hrang, tichallang, tilangsar.
(distingkt), adj. thliar hran, langsâr, fiah, chiang, danglam.
(distract), v.t. hnûk pêng, rilru kuai pêng, rilru tibuai, tichi-ai.
(distrakshn), n. tihchhiatna, chhut chhiatna, tihboralna, kehchhiatna, thihna.
(distras), n. rinhlelhna. v.t. ringhlel.
(distrawi), v.t. tichhia, \hiat, titâwp, tihlum, tiboral.
(distribiut), v.t. sem, thliar hrang, \hen darh. distribution, n.
(disueid), v.t. thlêm kawi, ti lo tûra zilh.
(disunian), n. inzawm lohna, in\henna.
(disuêzhn), n. thlêmna, ngenna. dissuasive, adj.
(disârm), v.t. râlthuam hlihsak, hriamhrei nei lova siam, inremtîr. v.i. râlthuam inhlîp, râlthuam titlêm.
(disêbl), v.t. \âwmkai lova siam, ramtuileilova siam, tisilawng, bahlahtir.
(disîs), n. thihna. v.i. thi. deceased, n. mitthi.
(disît), n. inbumna.
(disîv), v.t. bum, tihrilhai.
(ditachh), v.t. thlingthlawn, tithlawn, phelh, hnûk kîr, hna bîka tîr. v.i. thlawn.
(ditar), v.t. chelh, titîm, khap, dâl.
(ditarj), v.t. nuai fai, tifai.
(ditarmin), v.i. chin siam, ruat or rem fel, sawi fiah, tum, tumruh, titâwp, rilrua siam.
(ditarshn), n. tihfaina.
(ditaw), n. sawi tawh, sawi hnu, a ngai bawk. v.t. a ang siam leh (tûn lai chuan 'do' tiin an kaitawi tawh \hîn).
(diteil), chipchiar taka sawi, hna bîk thawk tûra ruat. n. a them, a chipchiar, chanchin sawina.
(ditein), v.t. hrêng, chelh, kawl, vawng.
(ditekt), v.t. hmu chhuak, zawng chhuak, chhui chhuak.
(ditent), n. thil che lai chelh dingtu.
(ditest), v.t. hua, ngei.
(dithrawn), v.t. lal\hutthlêng a\anga paih thla, lalna bân.
(diti), n. hla, hla thu, hla tawi tê. v.t. hla thu siam sak (a thlûk awm sa).
(ditiriawreit), v.t., v.i. chhe lam pan. deterioration, n.
(ditiumesens), n. vûng kianna (Daktawr \henkhat chuan zangfuk sawizawi nân pawh an hmang).
(ditrakt), v.t. la kiang, kiam, tihmingchhia, kiam, nêp.
(ditrangkeit), v.t. tan tawi, sât sawm.
(ditrein), v.t., v.i. rêl a\anga hlâng thla, rêl a\anga chhuk.
(ditûr, dêtûr), n. kual kawina, kawng kual thui tak, kal kualna.
(diu), adj. ba, bat, bâk, hmabâk, dik, mawihnai, awm, thleng tûra ruat. n. bat, chanvo, chhiah.
(diu), n. dai. v.t. dai tlâk, tihnawm.
(diual), adj. a kawp, pahnih kalpui.
(diual), n. mi pahnih insualna, intihhmingchhiat avâng emawa thih thlenga inbei tura mi pahnih intiamna, pâwl hnih innghirnghona. v.i. insual.
(diuan), n. hmân lai India rama State pawisa, minister of minister pui ber.
(diuawdinam), n. rîl \anna, rîlfâng hnûn.
(diubias), adj. rinhlelhawm, rin ngam chiah loh, chiang lo.
(diud), n. inchei âtchilh mi.
(diuet), n. mi pahnih sak atâna hla phuah, mi pahnih zai.
(diuk), n. mahni ram chhûng awp nei lal upa.
(diukdam), n. duke nihna, duke ram bung awp chhûng.
(diulap), n. bâwng ir fual.
(diuli), adv. a hun takah, dik takin, fel takin.
(diun), n. \iauvut mual pâwng.
(diup), n. buma awm. v.t. bum.
(diupleks), adj. a lêt, a kawp, a \huanga hmun hnih zawm nei.
(diuplikit), adj. a kawp, a lêt hnih, tlukpui, inang. n. a anpui, lehkha ziak entawn, a tlukpui ziak chhâwn.
(diuplisiti), n. phîrna, rilru kâkna, thu veivirna.
(diurabl), adj. fei, tlo, tuarchhel.
(diurêshn), n. awh or daih rei lam, engemaw hun chhûng.
(dius), n. lehkhaden leh \humvâwr lunga chhun han pahnih awmna. deuce (dius), n. ramhuai [What the deuce, (what the devil) are you doing? - Eng ramhuaiin nge mawlh che?].
(diutaraw), n. a pahnihna, a dawt.
(diuti), n. tihtûr, hmabâk, rawngbâwlna zahderna, bungraw chhiah.
(diutias), dutiful, adjs. \hahnemngai, rinawm, mi zahder thiam.
(divaid), v.t. sem, \hen darh, daidang.
(divain), adj. pathian ang, pathian thil, thianghlim, \ha tâwpkhâwk. n. Chanchin |ha hriltu, sakhaw chhui mi. v.t. thu sawi lâwk thiam, ring lâwk, sawi lâwk, aisân.
(divais), n. thil siam, khâwl, thil ruahman. device (divaiz), v.t. ngaihtuah chhuak, ruahman, duang.
(divaitalaiz), v.t. nunna tibo, chakna leh hrisêlna tichhia.
(divaliu), v.t. a man titlêm, a hlutna tikiam.
(divarj, daivarj), v.i. thle pêng, pêng hrang, danglam bîk, inpersan. divergence, n. divergent, adj.
(divaur), v.t. ei, hmawm, phûr taka rilrua la lût, or zir.
(divaut), adj. sakhaw lama inpumpe, sakhaw ngaihsak mi.
(divawid), adj. tel lo, khawhar, ruak, tlachham.
(divawrs), n. nupa in\henna. v.t. nupa \âng \hen, \hen (divorced of - nei lo, pai lo, inhnamhnawih lo).
(divawrsi), n. nupa in\hen.
(divelawp), v.t., v.i. inphelh, inhawng, zawi zawia inlailang, lailang, hma sâwntîr, ti\hang, \hang, insiam. development, n.
(divest, daivest), v.t. hlîp, hlih sak, lâk sak.
(divias), adj. hla, pênhleh, kual kawi, dik hlel.
(dividend), n. sem tûr, thil sema pakhat chanpual (a pung tiamin).
(divieit), v.i. kal pêng, pêng, dân lo anga khawsa, kal sual. v.t. tiher, tidanglam. deviation, n. deviation of the compass, a vêla thîr hîpna avânga chhim leh hmâr kâwk her dik lo.
(diviniti), n. pathianna, pathian, vân mi.
(divinêshen), n. thil lo thleng tûr sawi lâwkna.

(divizhan), n. semna, in\henna, daidanna, daidangtu, a them, a khing, vote lâk, ram bial khat, sipai pâwl khat thawmhnawa mahni intodelh thei (dân narânin army khat chanve zât), ngaihdân inpersanna. divisional (divizhanal), adj. division of labour, hna sem-zaina.
(divizibl), adj. sem theih, \hen theih.
(divâwlv), v.t., v.i. lîr thla, pe thla, hlân chhâwng.
(divâwt), v.t. phal, pe, hun pe, hun hmang, ruat bîk.
(dizain), v.t. lem ziak, duang, ruahman, tum, rilrûk, riruat. n. tumna, lem ziak, thil ruahman chhinna, phiarrûkna.
(dizair), v.t. ît, awt, châk. n. châkna, îtna, duhna, ngenna, hurna, thil ît.
(dizart), n. chaw ei kham lama hmawmsawm sem.

(dizart), v.t. tlânsan, rauhsan, phatsan, thlahthlam. v.t. tlân bo, sipai pâwl tlân bosan. desert (dizart), n. phu tâwk lâwmman hmuh tûr or tawn tûr ve rêng (hremna pawh), tlinna. desert (dezart), n., adj. thlalêr.
(dizarv), v.t., v.i. phû, tlâk, tling. deserved, adj. deservedly, adv. deserving, adj. tlâk, phu tâwk.
(dizawlv), v.t., v.i. tizawp, zawp, tui, tuiral, phel sawm, \hiat, chuai, ral.
(dizi), adj. lu hai, lu haithlâk. dizziness, n.
(dizist), v.i. titâwp, chawlhsan.
(dizl), n. diesel khâwl siam chhuaktu hming (kum 1858 - 1913).
(dizmal), adj. lungngai, hlimawm lo, nuam lo, ngui.
(dizmei), v.t. tizâm, tithlabâr. n. thlaphânna, zâmna.
(dizâstar), n. thil pawi, vânduaina râpthlâk, keh chhiatna. disastrous, adj.
(dizîz), n. natna, awm nawm lohna.
(diîfai), v.t. pathiana chantîr or chawimawi, pathiana ngai or siam, pathiana bia.
(domein), n. ram awp chhûng, huang chhûng, huap chhûng.
(drabl), v.t. chulh, hnawih.

(draft), n. thil hnuh, tam zâwk a\anga thlan chhuah, sipai lâk, sipaia lâk luih, pawisa lâktîrna lehkha, thil ruahman lâwkna, thil duan chhinna (draught an ti bawk), chawkna, pûrna. v.t. a lem ziak lâwk, duang chhin, a riruang siam hmasa, hnûk.
(drag), n. damdawi bâwlhlo, damdawi ruih theih chi. v.t. drug nêna hrai rui, kâni rui. drug-addict, drug-fiend, nn. kâni or opium ngai.
(dragan), n. hmasâng thawnthua ramsa hlauhawm tak pakhat (awle thla nei meia thaw chhuak chi hi a ang deuh ber).
(dragûn), n. hmân lai sakawr chungchuang sipai pâwl.
(drai), adj. ro, hul, tuihâl, rakzu Sâp zu hau, zu khapna hmun, ngaihnawm lo, a elsên zâwng. v.t., v.i., pho ro, hul. drily, dryly, advs. go dry, zu khap.
(draisel), n. battery hul (battery tam tak hi chu tui leh acid leih fo a ngai a ni).
(draiv), v.t. khalh, thu fah lui. [tenses - drive, drove, driven]. drive, n. motor ilo khalh luhna hung chhûng kawng, intur thutna, hna thawh châkna, beihrual.
(draj), v.i. hna ninawm thawk. n. hna ninawm thawktu, bawi, chhiahhlawh, hna ninawn.
(drakma), n. hmasâng Grik pawisa, tûn lai Grik pawisa, franc khat.
(dram), n. khuang (khuang hmelhmang pu bâwm chi rêng rêng, petrol drum etc.), bengling. v.t., v.i. khuang vua, hrilh nawn chhên.
(dramidari), n. sanghâwngsei chi dik tak.
(drangk), pa.t. of drink.
(drastik), adj. khauh tak, nasa tak, vung tak.
(draun), v.i., v.t. tuitla, tuia hnim, up hlum, luahlân, hriat theih lova siam.
(draut), n. hulna, rona, khawkhêng, dangrona.
(drauz), v.i. mutchhuak, muthlu.
(drauzi), adj. mutchhuak.
(drawbrij), n. lei pawh kân theih, lei pawh thleh theih.

(drawn), n. khawi pa (khawivah ilova a dum chi, hnathawk ve lo), mi thatchhia, mi zâra khawsa, a vi zâwnga ri, khuai thlawk anga vi, bazaa a aw thûm, ninawm khawpa \awng mi. v.i. vi, ri chur chur. v.t. tiri chur chur.
(drawpsi), n. vûng hri, tui awm vânga pangti vûng.
(dred), n. hlauhna, râpna, \ihna. v.t. hlau, \ih, râp.
(dregz), n. a mawng nawi, a êkchhia.
(drei), n. bungraw hnuhna tawlailîr.
(dreik), n. varak pa, lailêntuipala vawmna lung phêk. drake (dreik), n. dragon, khawchân, chhawihfa, hmân lai indo lawng.
(drein), v.t. zûk, hîp, thli, thlithlawr, tihul, in fai, tlak zo. v.i. zawi zawia luang chhuak, thlithlawr, pût chhuak, tuihâwk luankawr, sengso, tlak ral.
(dreinij), n. thli thlawrna, khawpui tui chhe paih dân.
(dreip), v.t. thuam, chei, thawmhnaw bâng.
(drej), n. lui mawng laih thûkna khâwl.
(driari), adj. ngui, nguai, hlimawm lo.
(dribl), v.i. tê tak tê têa far, dîr, chilthli thlauh. v.t. fartîr, tlêm tlêma sem, tawi tê têa football chhuih kual, football khalh.
(dringk), v.t., v.i. in, hîp lût, zu in.
(drivl), v.i. chilthli thlauh, mi chhaw nih, atthlâk taka \awng.
(drizl), v.i. ruah si seng seng.
(druid), n. hmasâng Britain, France leh Germany-a an puithiam pâwl.
(drungk), adj. zu rui.

(drâft), n. hnuhna, pawh, thil hnuh, inna, thâwkkhata in zât, a lem riruang (draft an hmang zing zâwk), lêna khuh zât, mipa thlan chhuah zât, sa nena inkâwia infiamna (plural draughts an hmang \hîn), thli tleh.
(drâwl), adj. nuihzatthlâk, mak.
(drâwv), pa.t. of drive. n. ran leh ramsa rual.
(drîm), n. mumang, suangtuahna, zêldin thil, duhthusam ram or thil. v.i., v.t. mumang mang. dreamy, adj.
(drûl), v.i. chilthli tla.
(drûp), v.i. uai hnuang, kûr, kun, mit sulh.

(du), v.t. ti, thawk, zo, hlen, cheibâwl, buatsaih. v.i. tlâk, tâwkfang. do (daw), n. solfa-a bul\hut. do away with, tiral, tihlum. do in, that, bum. do to death, that. do up, suih nghet, thian fihlîm, hah hnâwp. do with, chhawrbâwk, ninhleipui. do without, nghei, tel lova khawsa.
(duawrf), n. mi tê, thil fek tak, arsi tê tak tê muk leh rit tak si. v.t. titê chem chem, dip tê chem chem.
(duel), v.i. chêng, awm, luah, rei tak ngaihtuah. dwelt, dwelling, pa.p., pa.t. dwelling, n. chênna hmun, in.
(duindl), v.i. kiam, nêp, tlaran, zuai.
(duing), n. thil tihsual.
(dârbi), n. England ram Epsom Downs khuaa sakawr intlânsiakna ropui tak.
(dâwlchê), adj. thlûk no tak.
(dâwp), n. ruih theih thil, kâni, mi phutkhat, thil diak or ban, thil hnâng, thil hnawih nâlna hlo. v.t. ruih theih thil pe, kânia tirui.
(dâwt), v.i. duat, ngaina.
(dêbû), n. tih hmasak ber, vântlâng hmaa lan vawi khatna.
(dêgaw), n. America rama Spain, Portugal leh Italy hnam thlah.
(dêkhawr), n. lemchanna hmun cheibâwlna, hmelhmang.
(dêlia), n. dalia pangpâr.
(dêmâti), n. kalhna, phatna.
(dênûmâ), n. thil nihna laihlanna, thurûk puanzârna.
(dêtiv), adj., n. ruat sa, kâwk, sawi thawi.
(dêtum), n. see data.
(dîist), Pathian awm ring sia sakhaw awm or din \ûlna hre lo mi.
(dîkalsifai), v.t. chinai pai lova siam.
(dîkapiteit), v.t. lu tan chhum.
(dîkn), n. puithiam tênau, pastor puitu.
(dîl), n. chan khat, \hahnem tak, lehkhaden sem, indâwrna, intiamna. v.t., v.i., sem, pe, sumdâwng. deal (dîl), n. fâr thingzai.
(dîm), v.t., v.i. ngai, ngaihruat, ring.
(dîmaws), n. mipui, mimir, a sakechek, a nawizêl.
(dîn), n. biak in puia puithiam hotu ber, college hotu.
(dînâr), n. hmâsâng Arab rangkachak tangka, Irag ram pawisa.
(dîp), adj. thûk, ril, mûk, rûk, hniam, vei ril. adv. ril takin. n. tui thûk. in deep water, manganga awm.
(dîselareit), v.t. tizawi.
(dîsent), adj. mawihnai, duhawm, \ha, hawihhâwm. decency, n.
(dîstrawt), adj. mangang, chi-ai, buai.
(dûchê), n. Italy ram dictator, Mussolini hming an vuah chawp (hotû, hruaitu tihna a ni).
(dûm), n. rorêlna, thiamloh chantîrna, chanvo, tlâkchhiatna. v.i. thiam loh chantîr, hmabâktîr.
(dûsh), n. pangti kahna kahchik. v.t. kahchika kâp fai.
(dûê), n. France rama Douai khua. Douay Bible, English \awnga Katholik Bible.
(e praiâwrai), a chhan a\anga chhuiin (Latin \awng a ni).
(e-, imansipeit), v.t. khuahkhirhna ata tichhuak, zalenna pe.
(e-b-c), n. Sâp A-AW-B, thil bul, thil tanna.
(earawbatiks), n. thlawhna nena circus beih, vamûr chaw zawng anga thlawhtheihnaina nunchan an zir chiam ang hi.
(earawdinamiks), n. boruak chêt vêl dân chhûtna, boruaka thlawhna ilo chêt vêl dân tûr chhûtna.
(earawdrawm), n. thlawhna \umhmun.
(earawnawt), n. thlâwk mi (Rocket-a vân sânga lei hêl mite hi 'Astronaut or Cosmonaut' arsi kâr or vân sâng boruaka lêng mi, tiin an vuah).
(earawplein), n. thlawhtheihna.
(eareit), v.t. boruak thun. (Aerated waters - soda tui, a chhûnga carbonic acid gas an thun avânga a ûm han hawna phuan/phûl liam biah biah hi).
(eari), adj. boruak thil, a tak tak ni lo, suangtuahna thil.
(eawrta), n. lung hnûna thisen dâwt pui.
(eb), v.i. kiam, phai, nêp, tui fâwn kâm.
(ebaliant), adj. so liam, phûl, \awng duh.
(eban), ebony (ebani), nn. thing chi khat.
(ebrieit), ebriated, adjs. zu rui.
(echh), v.t., v.i. thil thûr (acid) hmanga thîr phêk ilova milem ker, ei chhia, seh.
(edi), n. livir, \hawngaleivir. v.i. vir.
(edibl), adj. ei theih, ei chi.
(edifai), v.t. siam, din, rinna leh thianghlimna pe, rilru tihhmasâwn.
(edifis), n. in, in lian.
(ediukeit), v.t. zirtîr.
(efarves), v.i. so, phûl, phuan.
(efat), n. tharum chhuah, tha thawh, tumna, thil tum, beihna.
(efeis, ifeis), v.t. nuai reh, tichimit.
(efemira, îfemira), n. rannung nun tawi tak, thil dam rei lo.
(efiji), n. mihring lim, mihring lem din, pawisa hmaia lem chuang. burn effigy of, tute emaw diriam vânga buhpâwl leh buara ilova an lim siama hâl ral.
(efikêshas), adj. sâwt, \angkai.
(efit), adj. chau chhia, lâktlâk tawh loh, \angkai tawh lo, ngawl.
(efiuz), v.t., v.i. thli chhuak, phuh chhuak, pût chhuak, chik chhuak.
(efiuzhan), n. luan chhuah.
(eflaks), n. luan chhuah, thil luang chhuak.
(eflawres), v.i. pâr, vul.
(efluent), adj. luang chhuak. n. lui or dîl a\anga lui luang, luang or pêng chhuak.
(eflûviam), n. engemaw a\anga thil tê tak tê pût chhuak, thil \awih mêk hu rimchhe tak.
(efrantari), n. zahtheih lohna, mi zahpah lohna, luhlulna, mi pawisak lohna.
(eg), n. tui.
(egaw), n. mahni, keimah, mahni taksa nikhaw hre lai.
(egawizm), n. mahni hma ngaihna, mahni hmasial mi, mahni inngai hlu mi.
(egsawterik), adj. pâwn lam thil, vântlâng hmaa puan tlâk, chin hriate zînga tel lo.
(egsilareit), v.t. tiphûr, tihlim.
(egsit, eksit), n. kal chhuahna, chhuahna kawngka, thihna.
(egzajareit), v.t. uar, a nihna bâka sawi. exageration, n.
(egzakt), adj. (dân) khauh, dik chiah, chiah, v.t. a man phût chhuak, phût lui.
(egzalt), v.i. nasa taka lâwm.
(egzamin), v.t. enchhin, endik, chhût, dâwp, bêl chiang.
(egzampl), n. entîrna, a chhe lam or \ha lama entawn tûr, ai. make an example of, mi dang hrâwk or tih\haih nâna mi hrem.
(egzart), v.t. nêk, chhawr, hmang, thahrui nêna bei.
(egzaspareit), v.t. tithinrim, chhaih kawlh.
(egzaw-), thu mal hmaa bei chi, 'pawn lam' tihna.
(egzawlt), v.t. chawi sâng, chawimawi, kaisantîr.
(egzawnareit), v.t. fihlîmtîr, thiam chantîr. exoneration, n.
(egzawrbitant), adj. a lutuk, tam lua, hleihluak.
(egzawrt), v.t. tur, kar, fuih, zilh.
(egzawst), v.t. tikang, hmang zo, tiruak, tichau, tha zawng zawng hmang zo, hîp ral. n. khâwla tui hu hman ral hnu paih chhuahna, tui leh tui hu paih chhuahna.
(egzawtik), adj. ram pâwn lam thil, khual khaw thil.
(egzemplar), n. entawn tlâk.
(egzemplifai), v.t. entawna siam, entîrna nena hrilhfiah.
(egzemt), v.t. âwl, âwltir.
(egzibit), v.t. târ lang, târ chhuak, entîr. n. thil entîr, thil hmuh.
(egzigiuas, eksi-), adj. beitham, tenau.
(egzist), v.i. awm, leilunga awm, nung, khawsa.
(egzistenshalizm), n. mihring hi chanvo bîk nei saa siam kan ni lo va, a thlarau thawh ang zêla khawsak chawp mai hi kan pian chhan a ni tih rinna.
(egziubarant, eksiu-, egzû-, eksû-), adj. hluar, hlim, engthâwl.
(egziud, eksiud), v.t., v.i. thlan tichhuak, hnâm chhuak. exudation, n.
(egziuvii, egzû-, eksû-), n. rannung inlihna kâwr.
(egzzwschien), n. hman ralna, chauh chhiatna. (Motor hnung hnuai lam dâwta petrol hu lo phit chhuak dawt dawtte hi exhaust a ni a; a dâwt hi exhaust pipe a ni).
(eichhbawn), n. ngûm ruh, ngûm ti.
(eid), v.t., n. \anpui, \anpuina.
(eidekawng, ei-dekaw tih ang deuhvin a 'ng' hi a ri tel mang lo), n. officer lian \anpuitu, hnungzui.
(eij), n. kum, kum zât, upat lam. come of age, kum tling (kum 21 kai). v.i. tar or hlui lam pan.
(eik), n. na ut ut, kham ut ut. v.i. na reng.
(eil), n. zu chi khat.
(eil), v.i., v.t. na, damlo, hrehawm or na tuartîr.
(eilarawn), n. thlawhna thla hnung lam fêma a thli dawn tihdanglam nâna a them kaih thleh theih an vuah.
(eim), n., v.i., v.t. tumna, thil tum, tum, silai ilo tinzawn.
(einjel), n. vântirhkoh, angel. angelical, adj. angelically, adv.
(eint), is not, am not, are not, etc. kaihtawi ni lo. Hei hi chu \awng lêr, \awngkam mawi lo a ni.
(eip), n. zâwng lian chi, zâwng anga mi tih dân zir. v.t. tlin lo chunga mi ropui zâwkte tih dân entawn.
(eir), ever kaihtawi.
(eir), n. ro khâwmtu. heir-apparent (eir apêrent), n. rokhawmtu dinhmuna ding tûra ngaih sa.
(eir), n., v.t. boruak, hmêl, hmêlhmang, zaipâwla a thlûk dik tak satu, a thlûk dik tak, puangzâr, vântlâng hmaa tar lang.
(eir), prep., conj., adv. hmain, hmaah. ere long, rei lo têah.
(eirbawn), adj. boruaka kâng, thlâwk.
(eiria), n. zau lam.
(eis), n. mal (lehkhaden), chhun han, thiltithei fâl.
(eit), adj., n. pariat.

(ej), n. hmâwr, tlâng, sîr, kam, kotlâng, thil hriam lai, hriamhrei hma, rilru hriam, thil hre thei, thinramna. v.t. hriam lai neihtîr, tlâng neihtîr, hual. v.i. zawi zawia kal, thle pêng. set one's teeth on edge, ha tiziau.
(ekhapeid), n. tlân bona, chimawm taka khawsakna.
(ekhaw), n., v.i., v.t. aukhâwk, sawhkhâwk, thangkhâwk.
(ekhiulent), adj. ei theih, ei chi.
(ekhiuri), n. sakawrpu, lal hnungzui.
(ekhuabl, îkhuabl), adj. danglam lo, ang khat, ngai râwn, ngêng, tihthinur har.
(ekhuestrian), n., adj. sakawr chungchuang.
(ekhuilibriam, îkhuilibriam), n. inbûk tâwkna, inbûk rualna.
(ekhuinawks), n. niina lei lai (equator) zâwn a kal pelh lai, lei puma chhun leh zân a inchen lai (March ni 21 leh September ni 23).
(ekhuip), v.t. thuam.
(ekhuiti), n. leilung dân dik tak, dân fel.
(ekhuivalent), adj. intluk, inzât, awmze thuhmun. n. tlukpui.
(ekhuivawkhal), adj. awmze phîr nei, rinhlelhawm, ngaihsual theih.
(ekhuêtar), n. lei kiar lai, chhim leh hmar inkâr lai tak. equatorial, adj.
(ekhuîpeij), n. hmanrua, thawmhnaw, \huihruai.
(eks), thu hma lama bei chi thil ni tawh lo entîrna (ex-serviceman, sipai bâng).
(eksail, egzail), n. hnawhchhuah, vâkvai. v.t. vahvaihtîr, hnawt chhuak.
(eksait), v.t. chawk tho, tiphûr, tiza, tizauthau.
(eksaiz), v.t. tan chhum, hlep thla. excision (eksizhan), n.
(eksarsaiz), n. inzirna, insawizawina, zirlai, zir tûr.
(eksasarbeit, egzasarbeit), v.t. tithinur, cho kawlh, tizualkai.
(eksawdas), n. kal chhuahna, Aigupta ram a\anga Israel-ho pêm chhuahna.
(eksawfishiaw), adv. a nihna a\angin, a hnathawh angin.
(eksawrsaiz), v.t. hming thianghlim chhâla chhechham, ramhuai hnawt chhuak, thlarau bawlhhlawh laka chhan chhuak.
(ekschheinj), v.t. thlâk, thlâkthleng, inthleng, indâwr tawn. n. indâwr tawnna, inthlengna.
(ekschhekar), n. ram tangka sum vawngtu, chhiah vawngtu.
(eksejîsis), n. Bible châng hrilhfiahna.
(eksekhiut), v.t. thawk, ti, hlen, tihlum.
(eksekhuiz), exequy (-khui), nn. mitthi vûi, invûina.
(eksel), v.t. khûm, pêl, fawr, chhîng.
(eksentrik), adj. a lai persan, dân pângngai ang lo, mak, phutkhat. n. mi phutkhat, mi ze mak. eccentricity, n.
(eksept), v.t. hmaih, telh lo, tiam lo. except, excepting, preps. tiam lovin, chhiar tel lovin.
(ekses), n. a chuang a liam, a lutuk, tisa nawmna chen luattukna.
(ekshaleshn, egzaleshn), n. thaw, thâwk.
(eksheil, egzeil), v.t., v.i. thaw chhuak, nam, chhuah, tui hua chhuak.
(ekshium, egzium), v.t. phûm hnu phawrh leh, ruang phawrh leh. exhumation, n.
(eksibishn), n. entîrsiakna, thil târ lanna, thil entîr.
(eksijent), adj. hmanhmawhthlâk, rîkrum thil, \ul thut.
(eksikhrabl), adj. tenawm, anchhedawng. execration, n.
(eksikhreit), v.t. anchhe lawh, mausam, ten, hua.
(eksind), v.t. tan chhum, hlep thla.
(eksiuent, -siuent), n. kal chhuah (na).
(ekskaveit), chhuak, cho.
(ekskhalpeit), v.t. ngaidam, thiam chantîr, fihlimtîr.
(ekskhamiunikheit), v.t. kohhran a\anga hnawt chhuak. excommunication, n.
(ekskharshn), kal chhuah, vah chhuah, hlim hlawp ûma vah vêlna, lênlâm, râl \hâwnna, thupui a\anga pênhlehna, thu sawi lai pênsanna.
(ekskhiuz), v.t. ngaidam, thiam chantîr, chawlh phalna pe, râlbân phalna pe. (ekskhius), n. chhuanlam.
(ekskhlamêshn), n. au chhuah, mak ti sawina, makna chhinchhiah (!). exclamatory (ekskhlamatawri), adj.
(ekskhleim), v.t., v.i. au chhuak, run taka sawi.
(ekskhlushn), n. dah hranna, chhiar tel lohna, hmaihna.
(ekskhlusiv), adj. chhiar tel loh, telh loh, a bîk, indah hrang, interek.
(ekskhlûd), v.t. hmaih, telh lo, dah hrang.
(ekskhresens), n. sawrbâwk, a chhe zâwnga \hang duang, ngâwt, singsihlîp, hri anga lênna, darhsarhna.
(ekskhriment), n. êkchhia, êk, zun-êk.
(ekskhrit), v.t. hnawt chhuak, chik chhuak, e chhuak, paih chhuak.
(ekskhritari), adj. êk lam thil.
(ekskhrusheit), v.t. na tuartîr, nghaisa.
(ekskhuizit), adj. nalh tak, lutuk.
(ekspair), v.t. thaw chhuak, phuh chhuak. v.i. thaw chhuak, thi, tâwp.
(ekspairetawri), adj. thâwk chhuahna thil.
(ekspairi), n. hun tâwpna, kinna.
(ekspairing), adj. thi \ep.
(ekspalshn), n. hnawh chhuahna.
(ekspand), v.t., v.i. tizau, zauh, tilian, \hang lian, tipuar.
(ekspanj), v.t. thai chhia, nuai reh.
(ekspargeit), v.t. lehkhabua thun fel lo lai thian fai or paih. expurgation, n.
(ekspart), adj. thiam, nâl, themthiam, hmangchang hria.
(ekspaund), v.t. hrilhfiah.
(ekspawstiuleit), v.i. hnial, remti lo.
(ekspawz), v.t. lailang, tilang, pho, hem, sawi fiah, sik leh sa tuartîr.
(ekspawzd), adj. hawn, hliahkhuh loh.
(ekspawzhar, -zhiar), n. hawnna, hliap nei lova awmna, sual laihlanna.
(ekspawzishn), n. laih lanna, târ lanna, vantlang hmaa tar lanna, hrilhfiahna, thu bulbâl sawi fiahna.
(ekspedishn), n. hmanhmawhna, zam\hatna, rammutna, a huhova ram fanna, ram fang pâwl.
(ekspekt), v.t. ring, beisei, lo thlen ring.
(ekspektawreit), v.t., v.i. khâk chhâk, khuh chhuak.
(ekspidait), v.t. tihmanhmawh, thawn chhuak.
(ekspieit), v.t. zângna dawm, rûl, sual man tuar.
(ekspirians), n. a taktaka hriatna, thiamna, a bul a bâl hriatna, chin hriatna. tuarna, hriatna, thazâma hriatna.
(eksplanêshn), n. sawi fiahna, a chhan.
(eksplawd), v.t., tipuak, sawi bawrhbâng. v.i. puak.
(eksplawit), n. thil tih ropui tak, huaisen thiltih. v.t. chhawrbâwk, mi ei, mi hlêp.
(eksplawr), v.t., v.i. ram thar hmuh chhuah tuma zin, ram thar zawng, ngun taka endik.
(eksplawshn), n. puak.
(eksplein), v.t. sawi fiah, hrilhfiah, a chhan sawi.
(ekspletiv, -plîtiv), adj. tikim, luah khat. n. thu châng tikimtu thu mal, belhchhah, ânchhe awmze nei lo.
(eksplikebl), adj. sawi fiah theih.
(eksplikeit), v.t. thu bulbâl tichiang.
(eksplisit), adj. chiang taka lang, a ruh langa sawi, fiah.
(eksprawpriet), v.t. chhuhsak.
(ekspârti), adj. lehlam pâwl hmakhua chauh.
(ekspêshiet), v.i. dap zau, huang zau, sawi zau.
(ekspêtreieit), v.t. ram pâwn lama thawn chhuak, mahni ram a\anga hnawt chhuak.
(ekspîdient), adj. remchâng, âwm. n. remchâng, \ul, mamawh.
(ekspîreshn), n. thâwk chhuah tâwpna, ralna.
(eksreiz), n. kawchhûng thlalâkna, electric zung sîn chi.
(ekstarmineit), v.t. timang, tichimit, nuai bo. extermination. n.
(ekstarpeit), v.t. timang, nuai bo.
(ekstasi), n. hlim ruihna, nasa taka phûrna.
(ekstempawre, -pawri), adv. tihchawpin, phuahchawpin.
(eksteniueit), v.t. tinêp, tikiam. extenuation, n.
(ekstikeit), v.t. tichhuak, tâl chhuak.
(ekstingguish), v.t. timit, timang, ropuina nêna luahlân, dîp bo.
(ekstingkt), adj. mang, mit, awm tawh lo, (tlâng kâng) thi fel tawh.
(ekstiriawr), adj., n. pâwn lam.
(ekstrênias), n. pâwn lam a\anga lo kal, pâwn lam thil, pênhleh, \ûl lo.
(ekstrîm), adj. lutuk, tâwpkhâwk, hmâwr tâwp, piah ber, khauh. n. tâwp rêt, a ber.
(ekstrûd), v.t. tilawr.
(eksîd), v.t. khûm, pêl.

(ektaw), thu rêng rêng ecto tiha \an a nih chuan 'a pawn lam' tih a kâwk ang. [Thlikthliêkbâwm, kelbuh, saphihrik, vangvat, etc. te hi ectoparasite (pâwn lam a\anga mi nunna chhimtu) an ni a. Rulhut. T.B. hrik, etc. te hi chu kawchhûng lam eitu (intraparasite?) an ni ve thung].
(ekzima), n. vun natna chi khat, vun bawl \hit \heta a hnua tui hliam hliam (ke zung\ang kârah te).
(elawkhiushn), n. vântlâng hmaa thu sawi thiamna. Same as eloquence.
(elawkhuent), adj., thu sawi thiam.
(elbaw), n. kiu, kiu thlep, kawi thlep tak. kiuva nghawk or nghawng, mipui kâra innghawk tlang. at one's elbow, hnaivaiah.
(eldar), adj. upa zâwk. n. upa, aia upa, khawtlâng upa or hotu, kohhran upa.
(eldawrâdaw), n. Spanish ram thar zawngtute'na America rama rangkachak luanna ram an zawn, rang mangkhenga hausak theihna hmun (tûn lai chuan chi\ha vâwrna hmun hmingahte an chawi \hîn).
(elefant), n. sai. white elephant, thil kawl hautak (Zûnteinu, ka siam ang che..).
(elefantaiasis), n. ke vûng natna, tilpuk.
(elejibl), adj. chhiar theih loh, ziak fiah lo.
(elieneit), v.t. sawn, hnawtchhuak, tuithlâr. alienable, adj. alienability, alienation, nn.
(eligant), adj. nalh.
(eliji), n. sûnna hla, hla urhsûn.
(elijibl), adj. thlan tlâk, duhawm, nupui/pasal atâna îtawm, dânin a pawm theih chin.
(eliksir), n. nunna tui.
(eliktrishan), n. electric thil thiam mi.
(eliktrisiti), n. kawlphethiltihtheihna.
(eliment), n. thil bul, a hmahruai, thil rêng rênga a pawimawh lai pakhat, leilunga thil pawimawh ber ber pali (mei, tui, lei leh boruak) zînga pakhat.
(elimineit), v.t. hnawt chhuak, telh lo, hnâwl, chawk bo, nuai bo.
(elips), n. bial sâwl (artui ang deuh).
(elisit), v.t. dâwp chhuak, kar chhuak, zâwt chhuak.
(eliveit), v.t. chawi sâng, rilru tisâng, khawhawi tisâng, tiphûr.
(elizabîthan), adj., n. Lalnu Elizabethi hun chhunga mi (A.D. 1533 - 1603).
(eliziam), n. hmasâng Grik-ho paradis, mitthi khua, hmun nuam.
(els), adv., adj. a nih loh chuan, chu lovah.

(else hi eles leh es a ni lo ang bawk hian, film pawh hi filim of fim a ni lo; hriat thamin l hi m-ah hian pial lut mai ani), n. vun pan tak, sarâng, hamda, duar, thlalâkna lehkha, cinema thlalâk, romei pan tak. v.t. hamdaa tuam, cinema thla la.
(elusideit), v.t. tifiah, tichiang, entîrna nêna sawi fiah.
(elît), n. thlan chhuah, a \ha leh challang leh thiam thlan bîk.
(emalshn), n. intizawp tawn lêm lova thil tui chi hnih inpawlh.
(emaneit), v.i. pût chhuak, luang chhuak, chawr chhuak.
(emarald), n. lunghlu hring nghelh.
(emari), n. thil nawh mâmna lehkha thapa an siam thil laihchhuah sak tak mai.
(emarj), v.i. lo lang, inlâr, tui a\anga lo lang, lo thleng.
(emaskhiuleit, imaskhiuleit), v.t. mipatna tihbosak, tihmeichhia, a nua siam.
(emawshn, imawshn), n. thil nung hnathawh, thinlunga vei dân, thinlung deh dân, rilru phawklêk dân.
(embangk), v.t. lei kotlâng nêna daidang.
(embar), n. meiling.
(embasi), n. mi rama palai awmna hmunpui, palai hna.
(embatl), v.t. kulh bang siam sak, indo tûra inpuahchah.
(embauar), v.t. zâr hliah, hliap.
(embleiz), v.t. hâl alh, ropui taka cheimawia târlang.
(emblêzn), v.t. ropui leh langsâr taka târ.
(embrawkheit), v.t. chiah huha nâwt or hru (pawnthema pân sil angin).
(embreis), v.t. pawm, kuah, huam tel, zawm.
(embriaw), n. thil keu tûr hrik, la keu tûr chi nung, note insiam \an.
(embâm), v.t. damdawi nêna \awih thei lova siam, rimtui hnawih.
(embâwldn), v.t. tihuai, tihuangtau.
(emetic), adj. luak tichhuak. n. luakna damdawi.
(emfasaiz), v.t. uar.
(emfasis), n. uarna.
(emigreit), v.i., v.t. mahni ram pêmsan.
(emiuleit), v.t. entawn, el.
(empair), n. lalber awp ram zau tak, hneh taka ram awp chhûng, emperor lalna.
(emparar), n. lalna ram zau tak nei, empire awptu, lalberte zînga a ropui pâwl an kohna.
(empauar), n. thuneihna pe.
(empirik), adj. fiah ngai, hmuh leh tuar chawt hmaa hriat theih loh. empirical, adj.
(empirisizm), n. thil bul chhût tumna (philsophy) kawnga mahni hriat leh fiah ve chiah hmaa miina thil dik saa an lo pawm tawh pawm duh lohna.
(emplawi), v.t. chhawr, ruai, hmang, hna pe.
(emplein), v.t. thlawhna chhûnga dah lût. v.i. thlawhna chhûnga lût, thlawhnaa chuang.
(empleisment), n. dah, laipui bunna dawh sâng.
(empti), adj. ruak, thufûn lo. v.t. tiruak, bun. emptiness, n. come away empty, kutbênga lo haw leh.
(empâwriam), n. thil lei khâwm zawrh lehchhâwnna dâwr, dâwr lianpui, dâwrpui.
(enaf), adj. tâwk, tâwk fang, daih tâwk. have enough of, kham tawh, ning tawh.
(enakt, inakt), v.t. thawk, chang, ti, dâna siam.
(enamawr), v.t. hmangaihtîr, ngaihzâwntîr.
(enarji), n. tha, chakna, thahrui.
(enarveit), v.t. tizuai, tizâm, tichak lo.
(enawrmas), adj. hrawl tak, tumtlang tak, nasa tak. enormity, n.
(enchhant), v.t. ngaizâwng tûra dawi, nasa taka tilâwm.
(enchhein), v.t. khaidiata hlîng, thlung.
(endau), v.t. vulh, tihausa, thuam, pe, châwm, hmeichhe thuam chhawmtîr.
(endawkhrain), adj. taksa chhûnga thisen châwm \hatu tuihnâng paina bâwm or \halbe.
(endawrs), v.t. phalna pe, remti, nemnghet, lehkha hnung lama mahni remtihpuina thu ziak. endorsee, n. chutianga endorse saka chu.
(endawsparm), n. thil chi rêng rêng chhûnga a hlam chaw inphûm.
(endevar), v.t. tum, bei. n. tumna, beihna.
(endiar), v.t. tiduhawm, ngainattîr. endearment, n.
(endiu), v.t. thuam, chei, ziarâng pe.
(endiur), v.t. chhel taka tuar, tuar chhuak, tuar. v.i. tlo, chhel.
(enema, enima), n. mawng kahna, mawnga damdawi tui kah luh.
(eneni), n. hmêlma, râl, khingpui.
(enfawrs), v.t. tihluihtîr, dân kengkawh or lekkawh, dân chelek, zawmtîr.
(enfranchhaiz, -chhiz), v.t. zalênna pe, vote theia siam.
(enfîbl), v.t. tichak lo.
(engalf), ingulf, v.ts. pum hmawm, tuam.
(engard), v.t. hrêng, vêt.
(engeij), v.t. thu thlung, ruai, chhawr, vuah, rilru pe, indo, inhnamhnawih. v.i. thu intiam, inhnamhnawih, indo.
(engrein), ingrain, v.ts. tuk nghet.
(engreiv), v.t. ker, milem ker, ker mawi, rilrua tuh nghet.
(enhâns), v.t. titam, belhchhah, uar sauh, tizual. enhancement, n.
(eniumareit), v.t. chhiar chhuak, hming chhiar.
(enjendar), v.t. hring, siam, awmtîr, tichhuak.
(enjin), n. khâwl, rêl lu, hmanrua.
(enjiniar), n. khâwl lam thiam mi, (America ramah chuan) rêl khalhtu. v.t. ruahman, buatsaih, rêl.
(enkhambar), v.t. tibahlah, dipdâl, phurrit siam sak, uai rit.
(enkhamp), v.t., v.i. bûk khuar, puan in kaih. encampment, n.
(enkhampas), v.t. hual.
(enkharij), v.t. tithatho, phûrna pe, fuih, tikâwlhrâwng.
(enkhauntar), v.t. tâwk, tawng, inring lova tawng thut, hmelma tawng thut. n. intawhna, hmêlma nêna intawhchilhna.
(enkheij), v.t. bâwma khung.
(enkheis), v.t. bâwma khung, hual khuh, tuam. encasement, n.
(enkhlawz), v.t. hual, khung.
(enkhlawzhar), n. huang, hung chhûng.
(enkhleiv), n. mi ram chhûnga ram bung neih, mi ram chhûnga ram ker.
(enkhrast), v.t., v.i. kâp bawl, tibawl, a kâwr siam. encrustation, n. chawkhir.
(enkhrâwchh), v.i. mi huang va dai, mi hum dai, mi dipdâl.
(enkindl), v.t. hâl, chhêm alh, tiphûr, tizauthau.
(enlaitn), v.t. tiêng, tifiah, hrilhfiah, tifing, sakhuaa harh chhuak. enlightenment, n.
(enlaivn), v.t. tithaho, tihawt, chawk phûr.
(enlârj), v.t. tilian, tizau, zauh, thu uar. v.i. \hang, lian. englargement, n.
(enmiti), n. inhmêlmâkna, inhalna, inngeih lohna.
(enrap), v.t. tuam, fûn, ngaihtuah ding, ngaihtuah mûk.
(enrapchar), v.t. nuam ti taka siam.
(enreij), v.t. tithinur.

(ensaikhlawpîdia), n. thil chi tam tak awmze sawi fiahna lehkhabu, thil chi khat chanchin awm zawng zawng chuanna lehkhabu. (Encyclopaedia of Britannica a awm a. Chutah chuan hmasâng a\anga mi hmingthang zawng zawngte chanchin te, ramsa chi hrang hrang chanchin te, arsi hming leh an chanchin \heuh te, Krismas chanchin leh a lo awm \an dân chanchin thlengin a chuang kim biai a ni. Encyclopaedia of Magic a awm bawk a. Chutah chuan mitdawivaih chi hrang sing tam tak a chuang bawk a ni).
(ensaikhlikal), adj., n. lehkha thawn darh, bishop zawng zawng hnena pope lehkha thawn kual.
(ensain, ensin), n. chhinchhiahna, ram chhinchhiahna puanzâr, sipai pâwl chhinchhiahna puanzâr, chutiang puanzâr khaitu chu, hmân laia British sipai officer hniam ber.
(ensanguind), adj. thisen kai.
(ensarkl), v.t. hual, hêl kual.
(enshrain), v.t. thlâna dah, hmun thianghlim leh serha siam.
(enshraud), v.t. tuam, ruang tuam, khuh, fûn.
(ensiu), v.i. zui, a hnuleha lo awm.
(enskawns), v.t. him taka biru, rem taka tawm.
(ensleiv), v.t. bawia siam, sala chhawr.
(ensneir), v.t. âwk.
(entail), v.t. kaihhnawih, loh theih lohva siam, a hnu leh awmtîr.
(entair), adj. a vai, zawng zawng, pumhlûm, hlang, hlawp, hlîr. entirety, n.
(entais), v.t. thlêm, hruai sual, hîp.
(entaitl), v.t. hming vuah, phal sak, thuneihna pe.
(entanggl), v.t. tihnawk, tichingchivêt, buainaa inhnamhnawih, âwk.
(entar), v.i., lût, tel ve, inrawlh. v.t. lût, luh, tel ve, ziak lût.
(entaraitis), n. rîl pân.
(entarik), adj. rîl lam thil. n. rîl pân, khawsikpui (typhoid).
(entarpraz), n. thil tum, tum khirhkhân tak, paukhauhna.
(entartein), v.t. lo lawm, ruai siam sak, mikhual thleng, mi rilru la, hlimna siam sak, suangtuah, ngaihtuah, pawm, rilrua vuan.
(entawmik), adj. rannung lam thil.
(enthrawn), v.t. lal \hutthlenga \huttir, lala siam.
(enthuziazm), n. thathona, phûrna.
(entiti), n. hil, thil awm, leilunga thil siam rêng rêng, nihna nei, takna nei.
(entrast), v.t. rinawm taka kawltîr, ring taka hlân, thu chhiah.
(entreilz), n. sa kawchhûng, sa pumpui leh a rîl.
(entrein), v.t. rêla dah lût. v.t. rêla chuang.
(entri), n. luhna, ziah luh.
(entrâns), n. luhna, kawngka. v.t. zêla awmtîr, nuam ti lutuka siam.
(entrît), v.t. ngên, dîl.
(entuain), v.t. herh, zem, chingchivêt, kherh.
(entûm), v.t. thlâna dah, phûm.
(envairawn), v.t. hual.
(envawi), n. palai.
(envelap), v.t. tuam, fûn, khuh, hual, thup.
(envelâwp), n. tuamtu, fûnna, lehkha ip.
(envi), n. îtna, îtsîkna, awhna, thîkna. v.t. awt, thîk, îtsîk.
(envishan), v.t. mitthlaa hmu, hmu lâwk.
(envizij), v.t. mitthlaa hmu, thlîr lâwk, suangtuah.
(enâwbl), v.t. tithangmawi, chawi sâng, tiropui.
(enêbl), v.t. titheia siam, thuneihna pe, tih theiha siam.
(eparântaw), n. hnam hrang hrang inbiak theihna \awng phuahchawp.
(epidarmis), n. vun chhia.
(epifani), n. Khawchhak Mifingte hnêna Krista inlâr chawimawina kût ni (January ni 6).
(epik), adj., n. ropui lai thil, hla nêna vânglai hrilhna.
(epikaltiar, epikalchar), n. khuai khawi, khuai khawi dân.
(epikhiur), n. ei lama duh tui.
(epikhiurian), adj. nawmsipna ûm mi, tisa nawmna ngaisâng mi.
(epilepsi), n. phungzawl nâtna. epileptic, adj.
(epilâwg), n. tlipna.
(episentar), n. lîrnghîng nghînna lai zâwn lei chung.
(episkhawpasi), n. bishop hovina kohhran an awpna, bishop hna.
(episl), n. Tirhkohte lehkhathawn.
(episâwd), n. thu bung leh châng, thu sei tak kâra a bung châng pawimawh lai pakhat.
(epitawmais), v.t. kaihtawi.
(epitawmî), n. kaihtawina, tê leh tâwi zâwka entîrna.
(epitâf), n. thlân lunga thu ziak.
(epron, epran tiin a ri lek lek a ni), n. kawr balh vên nâna hma lama puan awrh hi.
(erand), n. thu thawn, intirhkahna, thuchah.
(erant), adj. vâkvai.
