(erar), n. dik lohna, tihsualna.
(eraw-, irawnias), adj. dik lo.
(erawtik), adj. hmangaihna thil, hurna thil, hur.
(eremait, erimait), n. sakhaw lama inkhuahkhirh tumna avânga fianriala khawsa, mahni chauhva hmun fâla chêng.
(eri, iri, airi), n. mu-âr-la bu, muvanlai bu.
(erimik), adj. thlaler lam thil.
(erudait), adj., n. lehkhathiam.
(erzats), n. aiawh, thlâkna.
(erâws, îraws), n. Grik ho hmangaihna pathian (mipa naupang pianhmanga piang), thla dawta arsi (planet) hnai ber (entlang nen lo chuan hmuh tham loh).
(es-, îsthetiks), n. thil mawina chhûtna (lem ziak, hla mawi, etc.).
(es-aw-es), n. mangan thu hriattîrna.
(esawterik), adj. thurûk, mak, mi tlêmte hriat thil.
(eschhu), v.t. hawisan, mausâm.
(esens), n. awmze ril zâwk, nihna ril, lairil, awmzia.
(esenshal), adj. \ul, pawimawh.
(eskhaleid), n. leilâwna kulh bang lâwn.
(eskharp), n. hmun âwih.
(eskhawrt), n. \huihruai, kalpui, vêngtu, hnungzui. v.t. hruai.
(eskheip), v.t., v.i., n. tâl chhuak, tlânbo, pumpelh, him, pût chhuak, tal chhuahna.
(eskhimaw), n. Eskimo.
(eskhuair), n. Pu, lehkha thawna hming bula zahderna thu belh.
(espai), v.t. mita hmu, phâwk thut.
(espauz), v.t. inneihtîr, inhualtîr, rilrua pawm, thurin kengkawh.
(espeshal), adj. bîk, special.
(espiawnazh, espiawnij, espaiawnij), n. ram leh ram inenthlâkna.
(esplaneid), n. tuipui kam ilova veivahna lamlian zâwl.
(espri), n. rilru hriamna, harhvânna. esprit de corps (espridekawr), mahni pâwl tâna tlawmngaihna or \hahnemngaihna.
(essei), n. ai chhinna, tum chhinna, thu ziaka thil chanchin sawina. v.t. tum chiin, aitechhin.
(esteit), n. in leh lo.
(esthit, isthit), n. thil mawi lampang ngaina lutuk mi. aesthetic, aesthetical, adjs.
(estreinj), v.t. hmêlmâk, ensan, kâwmserh. estrangement, n. inensanna, ngaihsak lohva awmna.
(estuari), n. lui chhuah lam.
(estîm), v.t. chawisâng, ngaisâng, zah, ngaihtuah. esteemed, adj. zahawm.
(ethik), adj. tih tûr leh mawhphurhna lam thil, mihring chanvo leh mawhphurhna thil.
(etiket), n. mi biangbiak dân, mi zahder thiam dân, mi hma leh mi zînga chêt dân mawi, phungthlûkna.
(etsetara), n. chutiang zêlin.
(evanesent), adj. tlo lo, pilril awl.
(evanjel), n. Chanchin |ha.
(evar), adv. englai pawhin, a ber, engtiang pawhin. ever and anon, a khât tâwkin.
(evargleid), n. dîl leh dûm zau tak.

(evawliushn, ivawliushn, ivawlûshn), n. inphelhna, \han danglamna, thil nung mâwl tê a\anga zawi zawia thil nung sâng zâwka \han danglamna (thil nung rêng rêng hi mihring tiamin lei hrik leh tui hrik mâwl tê tê a\anga insiam chho kan ni tih rinna hi), fel taka a huhova kalna. evolutionary, adj.
(evieit), v.i. thlawh zir or chîng.
(evikt, ivikt), v.t. hnawtchhuak, dân thupêk nêna chhuhsak. eviction, n.
(evins), v.t. zia chhuah, lantîr.
(evisareit), v.t. kawchhung phawrh, rîl khei.
(evri), adj. tin, kip, \heuh.
(evâwk, ivâwk), v.t. ko chhuak, chawk tho.
(expidishas), adj. rang.
(fabiulas), adj. mak, ropui.
(fabrikheit), v.t. phuahchawp.
(fadhawm), n. hlam khat, feet ruk. v.t. teh, a rilzia or awmzia chhût.
(fadl), v.t. hrai rui., v.i. rui let dêr, zu duh, zu ngawl vei.
(fai), interj. teh chai a che!
(faial), n. damdawi bûr tê.
(faiat), n. urhsûn taka thupêk, thubuai rêltu phalnaa thiltih.
(faibar), n. la zai, thil zai sîn, hrui, thil inthuah dân, na, fuat. fibreless, adj. na nei lo, hruihrâm lo, paukhauh lo. fibroid, fibrous, adjs. fibre ang, hruihram, na.
(faif), n. phênglâwng tê chi. v.i. fife tum.

(fail), n. surai, lehkha thil khâwmna, lehkha thil khâwm, kawng zâwng neia lehkha khâwl \hat, sipai intlar. v.t. lehkha thil khâwm, kawng zâwng neia dah or thliar, thubuai rorêlna bua ziak lût, suraia nâwt.
(fain), adj. \ha, nalh, mâm, sîn. fine (fain), n. lei chawi. v.t. lei chawitîr, in fine, a tâwpah chuan.
(fainait), adj. chin nei, tâwp nei.
(faind), v.t. chhar, zawng chhuak, hmu, nei thei. n. thil hlu chhar chhuah.
(fainis), n. a tâwpna.
(fair), n. mei, kângmei, phûrna, silai kah. v.t. hâl, chawk phûr, tipuak, hna a\anga bân, kâng, alh, silai kâp.
(fairflai), n. dumde.
(fairi), adj. mei ang, phûr, thatho.
(fait), v.t., v.i. sual, bei, do, khing. n. indona, inbeihna, inkhinna. fight it out, chin hriat law law tûra inbei. fight shy of, tîm.
(faj), n. thil ho, awmze nei lo, hmawmsawm thlum. v.t. bel, thawm, a lem siam.
(fakchiual), adj., n. dik pai, a tak kalpui.
(fakhalti), n. chhia leh \ha hriatna, taksa leh rilru hnathawhna, pianpui thiamna, sikul sânga thil zir chi khat, sikul sânga zirtîrtuho, hna chi khat thawkho.
(fakir, fêkir), n. Vai (Mosolman) puithiam (dawithiam ang renga an sawi tel).
(fakshas), adj. hel.
(fakshn), n. innghirnghona, pâwl inrem lo, a hel pâwl.
(faksimili, -le), n. anpui chiah, a copy chiah.
(fakt), n. a tak tak, a dik, thudik, thil kalhmang leh awm dân, thil nihna, thil dik anga ngaih tawh phawt mai (lo dik ta lo mah se). as a matter of fact, a dik a dik chuan.
(faktar), n. titu, thil thlentîr or awmtîrtu, chhiarkawp namber puntîr kimtu zînga pakhat, chuang awm lova sem theitu nambar. factorial, adj.
(faktari), n. thil siamna hmunpui.
(faktishas), adj. phuahchawp.
(falangks, fêlangks), n. sipai rual insawh muk, hnung zuitu pâwl muk tak.
(falanjar), n. thinga chêng chi leh dul vuna note pawmna ip nei chi ramsa.
(falas), n. zang.
(falasi), n. dik hlelhna, hriat sualna.
(falaw), adj. leilet dah \âwl or khêk tui, thlawhhmaa siam loh ram. v.t. let phut ting sia buhbâl chîng leh ta lo. fallow (falaw), adj. rawng sen-dâng, eng-sen.
(falibl), adj. dik lo thei, hre sual thei.
(falkhram), n. tulung kar chhan.
(falmineit), v.i. puak dar, vauna emaw, tharum nên emawa dân lekkawh, hau. v.t. tipuak, thawn chhuak. n. acid puak thei.
(falâwpian), adj. hmasâng Italian daktawr Gabriele Fallopio thil.
(falêshas), adj. dik hlel, ngaihdân hruai sual thei.
(fambl), v.i. zei lo taka che vêl, zei lo taka khawih. v.t. zei lo taka hmang.
(famin), n. \âm.
(fan), n. fiamthu, nuihza, hlimna.
(fand), n. pawisa thawh lâwm, sumdâwn bul \anna pawisa, sum hnâr, thil vawn or pai \hahnem tak.
(fandament), n. mawngtam.
(fandamental), adj. a bul, bulpui, pawimawh.
(fanel), n. meikhuchhuah, bûr rawng zima tui thunna ang chi (khâwnvârtui thunna, etc.).
(fanerawgam), n. hlobet pâr thei.
(fanfeir), n. a ruala tawtawrâwt tam tak ham rîk, ropui taka puanzârna or tlângauna.
(fanggas), n. thil \o zînga a mâwl ber pâwl, pâ chi rêng rêng (phûngsahmim tiamin, thil hmuar te chenin).
(fangk), n. tîmna. v.t. tim, ti hreh, \ih.
(fangkshn), n. kalhmang, a thawh dân, inkhâwmna pawimawh, puipunna. v.t. ti, thawk. functional, adj.
(fani), adj. nuihzatthlâk, mak.
(fanjai), funguses (fanggasez), pls. fungoid, fungous, adjs. pâ ang, pâ lam thil.
(fansi), n. mitthlaa thil hmuh, suangtuahna, mitvai, mahni rilru lêm zâwng, duh zâwng. adj. rilru lêm, duh zâwng, nalh, chân buai, uluk leh lêr taka chei. v.t. suangtuah, ngaihruat, duh, lâwm.
(fansiar), n. thil ngaina mi, ran ngaina mi. (dog-fancier - ui lâwma vulh mi).
(fantawm), n. thlarau inlâr, thlâ, phûng.
(fantazia, fantezia), n. dân pângngai kalhmang zui lova hla phuah.
(fantazm), n. mitthlâa hmuh, thlâ.
(far), n. fâr thing chi.
(far), n. hmul, sahmul.
(faraw), n. lei leh khuar thlûr, khuar, zûr.
(faraw), n. vawkte \hui. v.t., v.i. vawk no keu (no nei). farrow, adj. no hruai loh lai.
(farbish), v.t. nawt tlê, tihmêl keu leh.
(fardhar), adv. chu lovah, chu bâkah, hla zâwkah. adj. hla zâwk, belhchhah.
(fardhar), farthermore, farthermost, farthest, advs., adjs. further nen thuhmun, mahse, farther hi hlat lam sawi nâna hman a ni deuh bîk.
(fardhar), v.t. tihmasâwn, chhawmdâwl, \anpui.
(farenheit, farenait), adj. Dr. Gabriel-a lum leh vâwt tehkhâwng, tui hi degree 32-ah vûrah a khang a, degree 212-ah a so tia tehkhâwnga siamna.
(farfar), n. luphut, phuhlip.
(fariar), n. sakawr pu, sakawr daktawr, sakawr pheikhawk khen saktu.
(faringks), n. hrawk, dang.
(fariseik, -al), adjs. \ha der.
(farisi), n. hmânlai Juda sakhaw pâwla dân zawh kim tum mi, a lang a pauva \hat tum mi.
(farkheit), adj. kâk.
(farl), v.t. zial.
(farlaw), n. chawlh, chhu\i. v.t. chawlh pe.
(farlawng), n. yard 220, farlawng, fîng khat.
(farmakawpiia), n. damdawi buatsaih dân chuanna bu, damdawi chhêkna hmun.
(farmasi), n. damdawi zawrhna, damdawi chawhpawlh dân.
(farment), n. dawidim, chawl. v.t. mung, um, \hoh. v.i. \awk, inum, in\hoh, thinso.
(farn), n. katchat.
(farnichhar), n. inchhûng bungrua/thuamhnaw.
(farnis), n. thuk lian, thil chhuanna or rawhna meipui.
(farnish), v.t. chei, pe, thuam.
(fartail, fartîl), adj. ram \ha, lei \ha, ram chang, lei tui, hlâwk, thil thar siam chhuak thiam.
(fartilais), v.t. lei ti\ha or titui, raitîr, rahtîr.
(fartiv), adj. a rûkin (furtive glance - melh ru).
(farvar), n. thathona, phûrna.
(farvent), adj. phûr, thatho, \hahnemngai.
(fas), n. philina, phêk buaina. v.i. phili.
(faset), n. hmai khat, hmai tam tak nei (thingrem, in, etc.) hmai zînga a hmai khat.
(fashn), n. thil chîn thar, inchei dân thar, inchei dân, khawsak dân, zia, tihdân. v.t. chei, duang, chher, timil.
(fasil, fasail), adj. tihawlsam, thunun awlsam.
(fasilieit), v.t. tiawlsam, tiremchâng, awlaia siam.
(fasineit), v.t. aikaih, aizial.
(fasist), n. Italy rama socialism leh communism ep tûra politics pâwl lo chawr chhuak. Fascism, n. chutiang pâwl thurin chu.
(fast), n. \hing rim, châwmpangkâr rim. v.i. hmuar.
(fastidias), adj. chêkngel, ti kher kher, duhtui, uluk.
(fastigeit), v.t. vua, hêm.
(fasâd), n. in hmai lam, kawt lam bang, khualchhâwn lam, kawng lam ântu bang, bang hmai.
(fatiuas), adj. a, rilru tlêm, mâwl.
(fatîg), n. chauhna, kulchona.

(faul), adj. bawlhhlawh, tenawm, rimchhia, khawchhia, dân bawhchhia, tâng hnawk. v.t. tidik lo, tihnawk, su. v.i. chhia, bawlhhlawh, hnawk. n. infiamnaa dân bawhchhiatna, tihdik lohna. fall foul of, inhmu chhia.
(faul), n. âr, sava.
(faund), v.t. din, a lungphûm siam, nghahchhan siam, \an chhana hmang, vulh. v.t. ring, tlawhchhan, hmachhuan. found (faund), v.t. thîr leh suan ilo chhûn tuia thil siam.
(faundling), n. naute thlahthlam chhar, fahrah chhar.
(faunt), n. tui hna, lui hnâr, tuikhur.
(fauntin), n. tui hna, tuikhur, englai pawha a phingphisiau zâwnga chik tûra tui hna siam, thil rêng rêng chhuahna hnâr, khâwnvâra a tui awmna bâwm.
(faw), n. hmêlma.
(fawbia), n. thil râpna leh huat bîkna [ui â sehin tui (hydro) hlauhna (phobos) a nei. Hydrophobia, tui râpna].
(fawdar), n. ran chaw. v.t. ran chaw pe.
(fawibl), n. kimhlelhna, âtna kawng, tlin lohna kawng.
(fawil), v.t. titlâwm, a ngaihna tihre lo, bum, dâl. n. invai fiam nâna hman ngûnhnâm bil leh a hmâwr zum aia thîr bâwk nei. foil (fawil), n. thîr phêk pan tak, \în phêk pan tak.
(fawist), v.t. puanhnuai ru, a rûka la lût, a tak tak anga lantîr.
(fawks), n. sihal, kâwl ui, mi verther, fing vervêk.

(fawl), n. tla, tlu, sawp, indonaa thi, tla hniam, hrilhai hmel pu, uai, âwih, bei, thlêmna laka tlu, châng, lo thleng, \an, châna tlu. n. tlâkna, tlâk chhiatna, tlâwmna, râl kuta tlâkna, man tlâwmna, favâng thing hnah tlâk kawlh hun, inchaia \an khat, suala tlûkna. The Fall, n. suala Evi leh Adama tlûkna.
(fawlaw), v.t. zui, thawk, chhui, zir, entawn, zawm, hrethiam, chhawm.
(fawlchhawn), n. kâwlhnâm kawm.

(fawld), v.t., n. thlep, thleh, thuah, tuam, kuangkuah, kut suih, kuah. fold, n. a thuah, a lêt engemaw zât (ten-fold - a lêt sâwm). fold, n. berâm huang, huang chhunga beram rual, kohhran. v.t. huanga khung.
(fawldstûl), n. \hutthleng veivâk kaihthleh theih, lallukhum khumtîr \uma lal\hutthleng, bishop \hutthleng bân nei lo, biak ina \awng\aina bu nghahchhan.
(fawli), n. thil âtthlâk.
(fawliaw), n. lehkha kâwm, lehkha phêk thleh.
(fawlij), n. hnah rêng rêng a hlâwma sawina, hnah.
(fawlkn, fawkn), n. mu, mupui.
(fawls), adj. dik lo, dân ang lo, dâwt, rinawm lo, a lem.
(fawlsetaw), n., adj., adv., aw vîk, aw \ialvawm.
(fawlsifai), v.t. dik lohna tilang, a lem siam, tihder.
(fawlt), n. dik lohna, tihsualna, dikhlelhna, lei chhûnga a zên inthuah dik lohna lai. v.i. dik lo, tidik lo. v.t. a dik lohna hmu chhuak.
(fawltar), v.t. pai, aw lawi, zâm, tîm. v.i. zâm leh lâwi taka sawi.
(fawn), v.t., v.i. telephone-a bia.
(fawnawgraf), n. thingremzaithei.
(fawnawlawji), n. \awng rîk dân chhuina.
(fawnik), adj. aw ri thil.
(fawnt), n. baptisma chantîrna tui dahna chawhtawlh, baptisma chantîrna bâwm, khâwl ha chi kim.
(fawnt), nn. khâwl ha chi khat hawrawp chikim chheh khâwm.
(fawnâ), n. ram bial khat or hun khata ramsa chêngte (Mizorama fauna chu Zorama ramsa chêng zawng zawng hi an ni mai).
(fawr), adj., n. hma lam, hma. fore and aft, lawng dung lam.
(fawrarm), n. kut (kiu leh bânrek inkâr). v.t. râlthuam nena lo inpuahchah lâwk.
(fawrawrdein), v.t. ruat lâwk.
(fawrbad), pa.p. of forbid, phal lo, khap.
(fawrbawd), v.t. hrilh lâwk, \uah lâwk, vânduaina hril lâwk. foreboding, n.
(fawrbêr), v.i. tuar, dawh, insûm. v.t. insûm, phat, nghei. n. thlahtu (forebear an ti bawk).
(fawrchhiun), n. chanvoa lo awm, chan tâwka khua rêl, vanneihna, hlawhtlinna, pawisa tam tak, ro sum, hausakna.
(fawrensik), adj. thubuai rorêlna lam.
(fawrfadhar), n. pi leh pu, thlahtu.
(fawrfinggar), n. zungchal.
(fawrfit), v.t. mahni thiam lohna avânga thil chân, dahkham chântîr, chân. n. thil chân, thil chawi, tlan chhuah leh theih tûra thil dahkham.
(fawrfrant), n. a hmatâwng ber.
(fawrfut), n. fuliafa ke hma lam.
(fawrgaw), v.t. hmakhalh. forego, a spelling mawihnai zâwk, forgo en rawh.
(fawrgaw), v.t. phat, thlah, bânsan, sim, nghei. (a dik hlel zâwk forego tiin an spell zauh bawk \hîn).
(fawrgiv), v.t. ngaidam.
(fawrgraund), n. milema a thlîrtu lam hnaih zâwk hmun, milem hma lam.
(fawrhand), n. sakawr chungchuang \hutna a\anga a sakawr hma lam zawng.
(fawrhed), n. chal, chaldâr.
(fawrij), n. ran chaw. v.i. ran chaw zawng, dap vêl. v.t. rawk, suam.
(fawrin), adj. ram pâwn lam thil, ram dang thil, awzia.
(fawrj), n. pûm, thil chherna. v.t. chher, chhûng, siam chawp, phuahchawp, mi bum nâna a lem siam.
(fawrjaj), v.t. thil awmzia a chian hmaa thu or ngaihdân lo rêl thlûk.
(fawrkhlawz), v.t. telh lo, tiam lo, dâl, tlân theih hun khâr sak, tlan chhuah theih lohva siam (dahkham, etc.). foreclosure, n.
(fawrkâst), v.t. sawi lâwk, ring lâwk, hril lâwk. n. sawi lâwkna.
(fawrlawk), n. chal sam.
(fawrleg), n. ke hma lam.
(fawrman), n. hnathawkho viltu or enkawltu.
(fawrmidabl), adj. huphurhawm.
(fawrmik), adj. fanghmîr lam thil.

(fawrmiula), n. a dânhmang phuah sa, thurin chheh fel, thil siamna dawi hlo chi hrang hrang, chhiarkawp chawh dânhmang, hmangchâng, bawlhlo hming aiawhtu chhinchhiahna. [a plural chu formulas & formulae (fawrmiuli) a ni].
(fawrmêshn), n. insiamna, thil insiam, thil induang, kawng zâwng neia a ruala thil awm or thil inrem, lei chunglânga a inthuah zâwnga thil tling khâwm.
(fawrnaw), v.t. hre lâwk.
(fawrnikheit), v.i. nula/tlangvâl inngai.
(fawrnûn), chawhma lam.
(fawrran), v.t. hmakhalh, hmasa.
(fawrs), n. tha, chakna, awihawmna, tharum, thahrui, tihluihna, sipai rual. v.t. thahrui nêna bei, tilui.
(fawrsait), n. hmuh lâwkna, thlîr lâwk thiamna, remhriatna, silai tho chuan.
(fawrseik), v.t. kalsan, bansan.
(fawrseps), n. chaicheh chi khat.
(fawrshadaw), v.t. entîr lâwk, hril lâwk.
(fawrshaw), v.t. entîr lâwk, sawi lâwk.
(fawrshawr), n. tuifâwn chîm sân lai leh kâm lai inkâr vaukam.
(fawrshawrtn), v.i. en tawm, en bet.
(fawrsi), v.t. hmu lâwk, hre lâwk.
(fawrskin), n. zang hmâwr vun, lîk vun.
(fawrstawl), v.t. ngaihruat lâwk, hmakhalh, hralh lehchhawn atâna bazara mi thil zawrh tûr lo khâr sak.
(fawrsueir), v.t. chhechham meuhva bânsan, malmâk. v.i. dâwta chhechham.
(fawrsûth), adv. a dik a dik chuan, teh rêng mai.
(fawrt), n. mahni fawrna kawng, thiam lawrna thil. forte (fawrte), adj., adv. ring, ring takin.
(fawrteist), v.t., n. tem lâwk, thil lo thleng tûr lo tem lâwkna, a aite chhin, a hmahruai.
(fawrtel), v.t. sawi lâwk.
(fawrth), n., adj. a palina.
(fawrthawt), n. inrin lâwkna, inhmakhawchhuahna, thu hnu dâwnna.
(fawrtifai), v.t. thuam nghet, thlâwp nghet, kulha hung.
(fawrtitiud), n. tuarchhelna, pasal\hatna, pachanna.
(fawrtiuitas), adj. a palha awm.
(fawrtnait), n. ni 14 chhûng, chawlhkâr hnih.

(fawruard), adj. a hmasa lam, hmasa, hmasâwn pâwl, inpeih hma, pawngpawrh, ngampa lua, hawihhâwmna nei lo. v.t. thawn zêl, thawn chhâwng. adv. hma lamah (forwards an ti bawk). n. (football leh hockey khêl ilovah chuan) a hmatheh pâwl.
(fawruarn), v.t. hrilh hmasa, vau lâwk.
(fawrê), n. bei, \hâwng.
(fawset), n. zêm a\anga tui siak chhuahna dâwt.
(fawsfawras), n. thingthlavâr hlo. phosphorous, -phoric, adjs.

(fawstar), v.t. chawm, sâwr, hrin sâwra nei, fuih, chhawm. foster-child, n. fa hrawn. foster father, n. pa hrawn. (Henga hrawn hi step-child, step-father, etc. a hrawn tih nen a inang lo va. Nupui/pasal inthlâk avânga inhrawn ni lovin, fahrah leh hnuchham inkhawngaih chhawm a\anga inhrawn a ni).
(fawtaw), n. photograph kaihtawi.
(fawtaw), thu mal bula bei êng tihna.
(fawtawgrafi), n. thlalâk dân.
(fawtawjenik), adj. êng thei, thlalaka lang \ha thei.
(fawtawkhrawm), n. rawng chi hrang hrang neia thlalâk.
(fawtawmetar), n. êng tehna.
(fawtawn), n. êng zung chak tak.
(fawtawplei), n. cinema thlalâk.
(fawtawsfiar), n. ni tuamtu boruak êng.
(fawtawsinthesis), n. hlobetina êng zung a\anga bawlhlo an lo siam theihna dân. photosynthetic, adj.
(fawtawstat), n. milem leh thu ziak lâk chhâwnna thlalâk.
(faz) n. bawlhhlawh them, vaivut them, lazâm zai.
(fechh), v.t. la, va la, man. n. huang chin. fetch (fechh), n. dam lai thla hmun danga inlâr.
(fedhar), n. hmul, sava/âr hmul, sava zawng zawng khaikhâwmna hming. v.t. sava/âr hmula chei, bu chei, bu chhep. feather one's nest, mi hnuaia hnathawk chunga mahni intuak muk.
(feid), v.i. chuai, chul, mit.
(feik), v.t. a lem siam, a lem nêna bum. n. inbumna, a lem.
(feil), v.i. hlawhchham, tling lo, pam\ûl. v.t. phatsan, hlawhchhamtîr, beidawntîr. without fail, mathei lovin.
(feim), n. hmingthanna. famed, adj. hmingthang.
(fein), adj. châk, lâwm, lungawi mai. adv. châk takin, lâwm takin.
(fein), v.t. phuahchawp, tider.
(feint), adj. chiang lo, chang chang, chau, chak lo. v.i. kulcho, chau, thidang, zâm.
(feir), adj. chiang, êng, ngo, thianghlim, mit la, khaw thiang, beiseiawm, dik, hleih nei lo, \ha thawkhat, mawi tâwk tak. n. huau huau, intihlimna dâwrpui, dâwrpui ropui tak.
(feir), v.i. khawsa, hlawhtling, zinvâk. n. kal man, zin man, chuan man, ei tûr, chaw.
(feiri), n. lasi (nula leh tlangval).

(feis), n. hmai, zahtheih-lohna. v.t. chhawn, do kalh. face value, n. a hmela a lan dân anga a hlut dân chhûtna. two-faced, thu veivir hmang, lehlama awr sena lehlama dum. face-saving, zahthlâk lutuk lova thu zûk dân kawng, mualpho lutuk lova inlamlêt dân kawng. lose face, hmingchhia.
(feit), n. chanvo, chanpual, ai, vânduaina. the fates, the fatal sisters, nn. mihringte chanvo (pian dam leh thih) rêltu pathiannu pathumte.
(feith), n. rinna, sakhua. in good faith, rilru or tum \ha tak nen.
(feiz), n. thlafang danglam dân, bi, dah khât, sawn khât, hmêlhmang danglam thei.
(fekhand, fikhand), adj. rah \ha thei, chi \ha, hring tam thei.
(fekhiulent), adj. êk thlî ang, nû, bawlhhlawh.
(felaw), n. kawppui, thawhpui, khingpui, \hian, mi, mi narân, mi tlawktlaw, sikul sânga pâwl indinte zînga member, mi thiam leh fing pâwl dinte zînga member. adj. pâwlpui.
(felisiti), n. hlimna, malsâwmna, hun hlimawm, \awngkam remchâng or duhawm.
(felt, velt), n. South Africa ram phûlrai.
(feminin), adj. hmeichhe lam thil, hmeichhia ang.
(fenawminawn), n. thil mak. phenomena, pl.
(fendar), n. thuk kawngka hungna, insutna dâltu hmanrua.
(fens), n. pal, invênna, daidanna. v.t. daidang, ping, kulh nghet, vêng, hung. v.i. ngûnhnâm vai, thu pehhêl.
(feri), n. pûm hrût anga tuia inthiar kaina lawng. v.t. lawng nêna thiar kai, kar kai.
(ferias), adj. thîr lam thil, thîr pai.
(ferâwshas), adj. kawlh, râwng. ferocity, n.
(festar), v.i. chhia, \awih, hnâi la, pûn, huai sual. n. pân hnai la.
(festiv), adj. kût thil, hlimawm.
(festûn), n. lehkha chehmawi zam, khawlai cheimawi nâna hruia puan them mawi leh lehkha chehmawi zam.
(fesîshas), adj. fiamthu duh, a hun lova fiamthu rawlh hmang.
(fet akawpli), n. ngâ sa or ni sa anga ngaih theih.
(fet, feit), n. kût. v.t. ruai siam sak, hlimhlawpna nena chawimawi.
(fetaliti), n. thihna.
(fetar), n. ke kawl, thîr khaidiat, kawl. v.t. kawl buntîr, khuahkhirh.
(fevarabl), adj. nêlawm, beiseiawm, chan \ha, chan vâwng.
(fevarit), n. duhsak hlawh, duat bîk, chuam, chak zâwk tûra rin.
(fezant, feznt), n. vavu, vahrit.
(fiar), n. hlauhna, hlauhthâwnna, \ihna, thlaphânna, thil hlauh. v.t., v.i. hlau, \ih, zah, pawiti, ringhlel.
(fiars), adj. kawlh, râwng.
(fiaskhaw), n. hna tlawlh, thil rêng rênga pam\ûlna, hlawhchham mualphona.
(fibrisiti), n. khawsik.
(fibula) n. kawr âwma tlereuh kilh beh chi, ngal ruh pâwnta zâwk.
(fideliti), n. rinawmna, nupui/pasal inkâra rinawmna, nghehna, a ang chiaha lâk chhâwnna.
(fidl), n. violin \ing\ang, \ing\ang nawh rîk chi rêng rêng. v.t., v.i. fiddle, tum, khâl, ninhleipui. as fit as a fiddle, dam val, hrisêl

(figar), n. lan dân, hmêlhmang, pumrua, ruangâm, thil lem, lim, mi challang, nambar, thu dang sawina, vûr chunga ziarâng neia tlengna. v.t. hlâwm, a lem or lim siam, suangtuah, ngaihtuah. v.i. langsâr, chanvo nei. cut a fugure, challang, langsâr.
(fijet), v.i. awm hle hle thei lo, ngaih\ha lo taka che vel, awmmawh.
(fikl), adj. danglam thuai thuai, nghet lo, lepchiah, rinawm lo.
(fikshan), n. thawnthu, phuahchawp thil, dâwt thu. fictional, adj.
(fikshêshn), n. invuah nghehna, thil dang nena inbelhbawm tûra boruaka nitrogen siamna.
(fiktishas), adj. thawnthu ang, a taktak ni lo, phuahchawp.
(filain), adj. zawhte ang, zawhte thil.
(filament), n. thil zai sîn, electric khâwnvâr chhûnga thîr zai ling.
(filandar), v.i. rîm fiam, ngaizâwng der.
(filanthrawpi), n. mihringte hmangaihna, mihringte ham\hat nâna rawngbâwlna.
(filateli), n. dâk ticket hlui fawm khâwmna.
(filawlawji), n. \awng kal hmang chhuina.
(filawsawfar), n. finna ngaina mi, thil bul chhui mi, mifing.
(filharmawnik), adj. hmangaihna lam hla.
(fili), n. sakawr la, tleirâwl lepchiah.
(filial), adj. fa thil, fanu or fapa lam thil.
(filifawrm), adj. ria.
(filigri), n. lunghlu phiar derthâwng tak, thil derthâwng tak.
(filipînaw), n. Philippine mi.
(filistain), n. Philistia mi.
(filtar), n. thlawr/thlit fîmna. v.t. thlawr/thli fîm. v.i. pût, inthlawr, inthli fîm, hnâm.
(filtreit), v.t. pût, hnâm, tui thlawr fîm hnu.
(final), adj. n. hnuhnung ber, a tâwp.
(finans, fainans), n. pawisa chungthu, vântlâng sum.
(finchh, finsh), n. vate lam chi.
(fines), n. nâlna, finna, remhriatna.
(fing), n. hla lâwn (inlalâwn).
(finggar), n. kutzung\ang, zung khat bawk. v.t. zung\anga khawih/dap, khâl. have at one's finger-ends, nâl, hre bel, thiam bel. put one's finger on, dap chhuak, hre chhuak.
(finâle), n. a tâwp, hla tlipna.
(firal, ferul, feriul), n. tiang khâng.
(fishar), n. keh, kak, khi.
(fishon), n. atom lairil chhut keh.
(fisil, fisail), adj. thing ilo a ti zui zâwnga cheh keh theih.
(fisiparas), adj. keh darh chi, mahni inphel darha pung chi.
(fiskal), adj. vântlâng/ram chhiah/pawisa lam thil.

(fist), n. kût ni, ni serh, ruai, hlimhlawpna ropui. v.t. ruai siam sak. v.i. kût serh, chaw tui tak ei, inhrai, nasa taka nuam ti. movable feast, n. kût ni a kum a tina insawn chi (Easter, Good Friday, etc.). immovable feast, n. kût ni calendar-a danglam ve ngai lo (Krismas, Kum thar, etc.).
(fistikhaf), n. chûm, hnekna.
(fistiula), n. dâwt sei tak, dâwt anga ngâwt awm, dawr ngêt.
(fiu), adj. tlêm. a few, tlêm, \henkhat.
(fiu), interj. mai mai a! ho mai mai!
(fiuchhar), n., adj. hun la thleng tûr, tun hnu lam, chavo, hmabâk.
(fiud), n. chi leh chi inhalna, chi inhmelmâkna. feud (fiud), n. \ul huna an rawngbâwl sak tiama lal tênaute ram hman hawhna.
(fiuel), n. meituah, thingtuah a chaw (petrol, lungalhthei, etc.). v.t. thing tuah, mei tuah, khâwl chaw pe.
(fiugêshas), adj. tlânchhia.
(fiujitiv), adj. tlânchhia, bo awl, ral hma, vâkvai. n. mi vâkvai, tlânchhia, râltlan.
(fium), n. hu khu, hu hnâr verh, thin so, thinur chiam, thil lolam, inchhuanna, induhna. v.i. hu chhuah, khu, thinso.
(fiumigeit), v.t. thil hu urtîr or rêp, thil hua ur thianghlim, rimtui hnawih.
(fiuneral), n., adj., mitthi vuina.
(fiunerial), adj. vuina thil, nguithlâk.
(fiurawr), n. thinurna, thathona, phûrna, thil âtchilh.
(fiuri), n. nasa taka thinurna, âtna.
(fiurias), adj. thinur nasa, thin so.
(fiutail), adj. sâwt lo, sawtsawhlawt lo. futility, n.
(fiuz), n. hâlpuah hâlna dâwt.

(fiuz), v.t. titui, hem tui, hem tuia châr belhbawm, belhbawm, zawm. v.i. tui, inbelhbawm, electric fuse chah vânga khâwnvâr mit. n. electric hrui kal sual palh vên nâna suan zai tui awlsam tak an vuah.
(fiuzelij, fiuzelâzh), n. thlawhna 'taksa' thlawhna pumrua (a thla leh mei tiam lovin).
(fiuzileid), n. silai inruanna.
(fiuzl), n. awlan silai.
(fiziawlawji), n. thil nung awm dân chhuina.
(fiziawnawmi, -ziawgnawmi), n. hmêl a\anga mihring mize hriat thiamna.
(fizik), n. damdawi, damdawi lam zirna. v.t. dawmdawi pe.
(fizik), n. pianhmang, pumrua.
(fizishan), n. dâktawr.
(fizîbl), adj. tihtheih.
(flabagast), v.t. mak ti taka siam, mak tihtîr, ti hrilhai, a ngaihna tihre lo.
(flabi), adj. nem, zawi, bawr, ti liak luak.
(flad), n. tui lian, tui lêt, thil tam tak. v.t. chîm.
(flaf), n. la-zâm.
(flai), v.i. thlâwk, tlânchhia, puak thut, thla zâp. v.t. tlânsan, chaih, thlawh khûm. n. tho, thil chhîn (khuhna) atâna \helrêt puan siam, ip chhîn, puan-in kawngkhâr khuhna.
(flait), n. thlawhna, thlawh hlat lam, rahka, sava rual thlâwk, thlawhna sipai pâwla platoon khat hu. flight (flait), n. tlân chhiatna.
(flajeleit), v.t. vaw hrep.
(flakchiueit), v.i. danglam, ngai awh lo, a chânga sânga a chânga hniam. fluctuation, n.
(flaks), n. luanna, luan, thil luang lai, thil pût chhuak, thil chawh zawpna hlo.
(flaksid), adj. nêm.
(flambawiant), adj. chân buai, bei buai, lâr lutuk.
(flangk), n. sîr, pang, nâk. v.t. a sîr lam a\nga râl bei, a nâkpeka bei, a sîra awm.
(flari), n. philina, thli chhêm thut.
(flarish), v.i. \hang duah, duah, engemaw hun laia chêng (nung), intivei. v.t. chei, hriam, vilik. n. cheimawina, hriam vilikna, hla thin\hâwng.
(flash), n. thil luang thut, pangtia thisen a kual tam avânga vun sen awp awpna, hmai sen awp awp, duahna, \hathnemna, tum thut. flush (flash), n. lehkhadena flush inkhêlna.
(flastar), n. hmanhmawhna, satna, philina. v.t., v.i. phili, buai, tichiai, tisa phut phut.
(flatar), v.i. thla zâp, phili, che der der. v.t. chawk hnawk. n. nghîng dawt dawt, chiaina, philina.
(flatar), v.t. fakder, tlawn, pawihfak.
(flatiulent), adj. kawpuar, kaw tipuar chi, uangthuang.
(flauar), n. pangpâr, thil zîktluak, thil chhuanawm lai ber, vânglai. v.i. pâr, pâr chhuak, vanglai awh.
(flaundar), v.i. zei lo taka che, mumal lo/bah taka thu sawi.
(flauns), v.i. che thut. n. rîkruma chêtna.
(flaur), n. chhangphut.
(flaut), v.t. chhiatkhum, hmusit, deu.
(flaw), n. tuia vûr tlang hrawl tak lâng.
(flaw), v.i. luang, kal vêl, uai duah duah. n. thil luang, luang lai, tluang taka kal, tam tak.
(flawjistawn), n. ngaihruat thil.
(flawk), n. ran/ramsa/sava rual, rual khat, Kristian kal khâwm (beram rual ang). v.i. kal khâwm, tla khâwm, fuan khâwm.
(flawnt), v.i. thli chhêma phe, intivei taka chetla. v.t. târlang.
(flawr), n. chhuat, dawh, inchhâwnga chhâwng pakhat (second floor - chhâwng thumna, America ramah chuan chhawng hnihna). v.t. chhuata titlu, hnek thlu, tlâwm.
(flawt), v.i. lang, zuanglâm, inthazo taka kal, mumal nei lova lêngvâk. v.t. tuia lântîr, thehdarh. n. lawnglêng, pûm, nghakuai hruia tuia lâng tûra thil zâng tak thil.
(flegrant), adj. mualpho, a chhe lama thang.
(flei), v.t. lip.
(fleik), n. thuah, râng, zung (serthlum zung, etc.). v.t. zung or thuah neia siam.
(fleil), n. buh vuakna hmanrua.
(fleim), n. mei alh, rilru sona, hmangaihna.
(fleir), n. chemkalna lam, rilru hriamna.
(fleir), v.t. alh êng pup pup, thinur thut. n. êng pup pup, kah-ên.
(flej), v.t. a thlawh theih thlenga sava no khawi, sava/ar hmul vuah. v.i. hmul pu.
(flek), n. chhunhan, hang, \huangvuak, thil them.
(flem), n. khâk, nguaina.
(fli), n. uihli.
(flik), v.t. vaw kauh, vai zauh.
(flikar), v.i. zâp, phe zauh zauh, alh phe.
(flimzi), adj. pan, dawrawm, derdêp.
(flis), n. berâm hmul. v.t. berâm hmul mêt, rawk, suam.
(flminggaw), n. kânghlai chi.
(flu), n. lal\în chimni, chimni, mei khuchhuah.
(fluent), adj. \awng thei, dangnâl, nal, thiam bel.
(flâsk), n. tuithâwl, fungki,
(flêvar), n. lei leh hnâr lama thil hnathawh dân, a rim leh a thlum a alna, hmuihmer, zia, rawng. v.t. rim leh hânna pe, hmuihmer pawlh.
(flît), n. a ruala lawng/sava/thlawhna/motor car awm, indo lawng rual khat, lawng sipai pâwl. fleet (flît), adj. rang, zam\ha, kal liam leh mai chi, mual liam.
(flûid), adj. luang lai, tui, nghet lo. n. tui, thil luang thei.
(flûk), n. thîrchakai kibâr, a palaha hlawhtlinna, tihfuh palh.
(flût), phênglâwng, a dungzuia ban ilo \ial khuar.
(flûvial), adj. lui lam thil.
(frai), v.t. hriat nena kang, kang. v.i. inhem ût, n. kang. fry (frai), n. no, sangha no. small fry, mi satliah, a sakechek (plural a nei chuang lo).
(fraiabl), adj. dûr, lei dûr, phut, keh sawm thei.
(fraiar), n. hmasang Katholik puithiam chi khat.
(frait), n. hlauh thutna, thlabarna. fright, frighten, v.ts. tihlau, ti\i.
(frajail, frajil), adj. keh sam, ram, derthâwng, dawrawm. fragility, n.
(fraka), n. buai luai luaina, bengchheng taka intihbuaina, inhauh buaina.
(frakchar, fraktiar), n. keh, tliak, khi, ruh tliak. v.t., v.i. tikeh, tliak.
(frakshas), adj. buaina cho, thinram, tawhkhirh.
(frakshn), n. a them. fractional, adj.
(fraktifai), v.t. tirah, rah neihtîr. v.i. rah.
(franchhaiz, -shaiz), n. Parliament Member tâna vote pêk theihna, chanvo neih theihna.
(frangk), adj. tlang, inhawng, inzêp lo, thukhuh lo. frankness, n.
(frangk), n. French ram pawisa tuallêng.

(frangkenstain), n. thawnthua mihring râpthlâk deuh mai siamtu mifing pakhat. (thawnthua a kal dân ang chuan he thil râpthlâk siamtu Frankenstein hian a thil mak siam hi a manganpui leh si a; chuvâng chuan tehkhinnaa Frankenstein hming sawi nikhua hi chua, Hnahkhawrin mulek a hring" kan tih ang deuh hi a ni. Mi tam zâwk chuan Frankenstein hi a phûng siam zâwk hi emaw an ti \hîn)."
(frangkhaw), ram dang hming nena kawpa French tihna. (Franco-German, Franco-Russian, etc.).
(frangkinsens), n. Arab rama beraw rimtui hâl chi.
(franjibl), adj. keh sam, tliak awl.
(frant), n. hma, hma lam, chal, hmai, hmasa ber, indona hmun, politics pâwl.
(frantiar, frawntiar), n., adj. ramri.
(frantik), adj. tum sa teh, tum er teh, belebut.
(frantispis, frawntispis), n. in hmai, lehkhabu phêk hmasa bera milem chuang.
(frastreit), v.t. tihrilhai, tibeidawng, kalh thla, tibahlah, hlawhchhamtîr, tlawlhtîr. frustration, n.
(fratrisaid), n. mahni unaupa thattu, unaupa thahna.
(frau), n. German \awnga hmeichhia tihna. Frau (f aia F) tiha hman a nih chuan Pi tihna.
(fraun), n., v.i. hmai thuar, thinur hmêl lantîr.
(frawd), n. inbumna, a der, a lem.
(frawidian), adj. mihring rilru kalhmang chhût mi, Sigmund Freud (frawid)-a chungthu or thurin lam.
(frawlik), n. hlimhlawpna, tualchai hlimna. v.i. hlima zuang, thau khawh.
(frawt), adj. khat, pai, kalpui (fraught with danger - hlauhawmnaa khat, hlauhawm pai).
(frawuard), adj. tihmawh, luhlul, mi herh.
(fregrant), adj. rimtui. fragrance, n.
(frei), n. insual buai.
(freil), adj. derthâwng, ram, bawrhsawm, derdêp, dawrâwm. frailty, frailness, nn.

(freim), v.t. duang, vuah, phuah khâwm, riruat, tuahrem, phuahchawp, dâwt phuahchawp, dâwt phuahchawpa hêk, cher, a kâwm siam. n. taksa, ruangâm, ruhrêl, chheh khâwm, khâwm, cherna, puan \hui mawi lai kah parhna, belvâl kual, mawza phiarna khâwl, rilru put dân.
(freit), n. bungraw phurh, bungraw phurh man. v.t. lawnga bungraw thiar lût.
(freiz), n. \awngkauchheh, kam khat, \awnghmang. v.t. \awngkau chhep.
(frekl), v.t. a hânga kâp, \ial. n. a sen-uka vun rawng, \huangvuak, \hek, rau.
(frend), n. \hian.
(frenzi), n. nasa taka phûrna, khûr zawih zawih khawpa âtna.
(freskhaw), n. banga lem ziak.
(fribl), v.i. tinawmnah.
(frigat), indo lawng tê chi.
(frijid), adj. vâwt hmeh khawng, tui lo, phûr lo.
(frikhuent), adj. zing. v.t. tlawh zing (hetah hi chuan fri-ah hian thlûk sei a awm lo), awmchilh.
(frikshn), n. innawhna, in\hialna, innghirhnghona.
(frinj), n. hmâwr fêm, baksam tan. v.t. tlâng cheimawi, tlâng \ial.
(fripari), n. incheimawina, lau, thil leplêr, chekhnawk.
(fritar), n. thei rah kau, thil them. v.t. tikeh sawm.
(frivawlas), adj. ho, tenau.
(frâwzn), adj. vâwt hmeh khawng.

(frêmêsn), n. hmân lai chuan lungchher tihna a ni a, tunah chuan a huhova intihlim tûr leh mamawh apianga in\anpui tawn tûra a rûka pâwl dinte zînga mi tihna a ni. (Kohhran \henkhat chuan he free masonry pâwla tel ve hi an khap).
(frîbutar), n. suamhmang.
(frîk), n. râpthlak khawpa piangsual, duh dân thlâk thutna, rilru danglam thut.
(frîz), v.t., v.i. vûra khang, vûra chang vâwta hmet khawng, khawng. v.t. hmet khawng.
(frûgal), adj. inremchem, inren, tlêm, bei tham.
(frûishn), n. neitu nihna, changtlunna, hlawhtlinna, hlim taka chhawrbâwkna or neihna.
(frût), n. thei, thei rah, ei tûr bâr tûr, lukhâwng (nei), a rah.
(fuaie), n. inlengte \hut chawlhna pindan hmasa, sumhmun pindan.
(ful), adj. khat, hnianghnar, \hahnem tâwk, kim, tluan. full, v.t. puan khuiha tichhah.
(fulsam), adj. tlai/puar lutuk, khamawm, ngeiawm, tenawm, rimchhia, hmusitawm khawpa inphah hnuai.
(fulzkap), n. lehkha phêk 17x13½"-a hlai."
(funambiuleit), v.t. hruizen zawh.
(fustian), n. mawihnai lo leh hluar taka thu sawi/thu ziak.
(fut), n. ke, kephah, ke bâwr, inches 12-a sei, hla tlar sem sawm. v.t. a man tum/pe.
(fâdhar), n. pa, thlahtu, tichhuaktu, Katholik puithiam, tualchhûng upa min, Pa Pathian. v.t. fa anga enkawl, chhawm, châwm.
(fâr), adj. hla. adv. hla takah, deuhvah, tui takah, lutukin.
(fârdhing), n. English pawisa hlutna tlâwm ber nei chi, penny khat hmun lia \hena hmun khat, thil hlu lo tak.
(fârdhinggeil), n. hmeichhe pawnfen kah parh chi, fân arh.
(fârdl), n. phurrit.
(fârm), n. thlawhhma, leilet, leilet neitu in-leh-lo, ran huan. v.t. thlawhhma nei, lova siam.
(fârs), n. lemchan ho tak, thupui fûn lo.
(fârt), v.i. vawih (\awnghmang mawi lo).
(fârâgaw, faregaw), n. thil hlâwm khat hnawk nuai.
(fâsn), v.t. phuar, tinghet, kilh, cher bet.
(fâsnar), n. phuar nghehna, kilhna, bahna.

(fâst), adj. nghet, rawng da thei lo. adv. nghet takin, hnai takah. play fast and loose, rinawm lo taka khawsa, depde, lepchiah. fast (fâst), adj. nawmsipna ûm hmang, rang, chak. adv. rang takin, chak takin.
(fâwkas), n. êng zung lâk khâwmna. v.t. êng zung la khâwm (kâwlphekhâwnvâr lu ang hian). foci (fawsai), focus, pl.
(fâwksl, fâwrkâsl), n. lawng hma lama chhuat dawh, lawng kartute mutna.
(fâwl), n. sakawr no. v.i., v.t. sakawr no nei.
(fâwlen, fawln), adj. indonnaa thi, beidawnna khura tlu/tla.
(fâwm), n., v.i. phuan, phûl, thinur.
(fâwram), n. rorêlna hmun.
(fâwrdeit), v.t. a hun tak aia hmaa tarik chuantîr, backdate.
(fâwrdûm), v.t. hrem tuar tûra lo dah lâwk.
(fêbian), adj. fimkhur, hmanhmawh lo.
(fêbl), n. thawnthu fing tawi, phuahchawp thil, dâwt thu. fabled, adj. phuahchawp thil.
(fêmas), adj. hmingthang, challang.
(fêraw), n. hmasâng Aigupta lal (Faraw-a).
(fêshal), adj. hmai lam thil.
(fêtal), adj. fate thil, thihna thlen chi, thihna tûr, vanduaithlâk.
(fêtalizm), n. beidawnna, mihring khawih danglam theih loh ruat lâwk thilin mihring hi min phuar sa vek tih thurin.
(fêtn), n. sakawr tawlailîr ke pali nei.
(fêvar), n. duhsakna, duhpuina, remtihna, zahngaihna, induhna. v.t. duhsak, \an, duat.
(fîbl), adj. chau, awngrawp, chak lo.
(fîbrail, febrail, febril), adj. khawsik ang, khawsik vei.
(fîd), v.t. chaw pe, hrai, châwm. v.i. ei. n. ran chaw.
(fîf), n. indo thulha \anpui tiama thlawhhmaa lam ram hawh sak.
(fîl), v.t., v.i. dap, dek, khawih, pangti or rilrua hria, thinlunga tuar.

(fîld), n. mual, ram zâwl, leilet zâwl (leh zâwl lo pawh), lo, khêlmual, chêttlatna mual, indona hmun, indona, thil laih chhuahna hmun, thil huhâng huam phâk chin, lang thei chin, phaw hmai, lem chuanna hmun (a lem vêla hmun ruak). v.t. khêlmuala inkhêl tûrte luhtîr. keep the field, ngai chelh thei, hnungtawlh lo.
(fîllti, fîlti), n. awptu or hotu laka rinawm.
(fîmar), n. malpui ruh.
(fîmeil), n. thil nung rêng rênga a nu, hmeichhia. adj. a nu.
(fînd), n. ramhuai, Setana, mi rilru chhe lutuk, thil âtchilh mi.
(fîniks), n. hmasâng thawnthua sava mak thi hlen thei lo, entawn tlâk.
(fîral), adj. ramsa ang, khâwi ngam loh.
(fît), n. thiltih ropui tak, chakna or themthiamna or theihna thiltih.
(fîtal), adj. pum chhûnga nau chungchâng (feetus thil).
(fîtar, fîchiar), n. hmelhmang, hmaifang, zia, lan dân. v.t. târ lang.
(fîtid, fetid), adj. rimchhia.
(fîvar), n. khawsik, philina, phâwklêkna.
(fûd), n. chaw.
(fûl), n. mi chhaw/phutkhat, nuihza siamtu. v.t. bum. v.i. ho taka khawsa, khâl, ninhleipui.
(fûrâwrê), n. thil atchilh, nasa taka phûrna.
(gabardin), n. zâwngbilh tah ang deuhva tah puan.
(gabl), v.i. hriat hman mang lohva \awng, vatâwk anga kâk.
(gadflai), n. tlip.
(gadhar), v.t. fâwm khâwm, chhar, têl, ko khâwm, ring, ngaihruat. v.i. kal khâwm, tling khâwm, hnai la.
(gafar), n. putar, hnathawkho viltu.
(gafâw), v.i. nui huau huau, nui ring.
(gagl), n. vatâwk rual.
(gai), n. pawh marna hruizên, mi (\awng lêr).
(gaid), v.t. hruai, kaihruai, kawhhmuh, thunun, kilkawi. n. hruaitu, kawhhmuhtu.
(gaigar khauntar), n. atom zungzâm chhah leh chhah loh tehna khâwl.
(gail), n. vervêkna, inbumna.
(gain, jain-, jinîkhawkhrasi), n. hmeichhe rorêlna, hmeichhe lalna.
(gain, jain-, jinîkhawlawji), n. hmeichhe natna zirna.
(gaiz), n. hmêlhmang, lan dân, inthup danglam dân.
(gajawn), n. nghate chi khat, ngamthlêm awl, bum sam.
(gajet), n. khâwl or hmanraw tenau \angkai tak (vaihlo channa, herâwt, etc.).
(gal), n. tuipui sava vâr chi, rih âr. gull (gal), n. bum awlsam mi, bum hmang (\awng lêr), v.t. bum, tihder.
(galaksi), n. thlasik kawng, arsi rual, mi ropui fuan khâwm.
(galan, galawn), n. thil tuirîl tehkhawng, quarts 4 dawng (tui sêr nga dawng vêl).
(galant), adj. huai, pasal\ha, tlâwmngai, ropui, nula laka hawihhâwm, nula ngaihsak mi.

(galap pâwl), n. America rama mipui ngaihdân khawn khâwmna. (Kum 1935 khan George Gallup an tih chuan mipui ngaihdân khawn khâwmtu company a din a. Inthlanpui dâwnte hian chanchinbu a\ang tein mipui mar an lo dek lâwk \hin a, thil lo thleng tur riruang chu a hriat lâwk theih viau).
(galawp), v.i., n. a chak thei ang bera tlân, sakawr tlân, sakawr kawdawm.
(galawr), adv. hnianghnârin, tam le lu.
(galawsh), nn. pheikhawk tak chunga \helrêt pheikhawk bun thuah chi.
(galawsh), nn. pheikhawk tak chunga \helrêt pheikhawk bun thuah chi.
(galchh, galzh), n. kawrte chêp, ruam khawkrawk.
(galeri), n. ennawm enna hmun ilova mi challangte \hutna chhuar sâng, \hutna bathlâr or dawh sâng, \hutna chhawrdawh, lem ziak thiamte lemziak entîrna in, kalkawng chungkhuh nei.
(galet), n. hrawkhrui, hrawkhrâwl.
(galf), n. khawmual huala tuipui tengsâwl, tuipui tengsâwl, thil thûk tak, leilâwt, livir.
(gali), n. kawrte chêp, lei rût thûk tak.
(gali), n. lawng kar chi sei tak chhuat dawh pakhat chauh nei, indo lawng chunga lawng captain chuanna lawnglêng, lawng chhûnga chaw chhumna pindan, khâwl ha rem khâwmna thlêng.
(galik), adj. Gaul chungchâng, France ram thil.
(galimawfri), n. chawhchawrawi.
(galivant), v.i. theuleu, lêr, leplêr.
(galp), v.t. dawlh. n. dawlh zât, lem khat.
(galvanizm), n. electric tha kal lai, kâwlphe hnathawh. galvanic, adj.
(galâwuei), n. sakawr tê chi sa nghet tak, ramsa ki nei lo chi khat.
(galâwz), n. mihring khai hlumna thing dawh.
(gam), n. hahni, thil chârna, gawm, thing hnai ban, \helrêt.
(gama), n. Grik hawrawpa a pathumna.
(gamat), n. solfaa a aw hniam leh sâng inkâr, a hniam leh sâng lama aw tlin tâwk, huan (huang) theih chin tâwk.
(gambl), v.i., v.t. pawisa inchawi, pawisa inkhêl, \hum vâwr, paih ral. n. vanneih palh ringa thil tihna.
(gambl, gambal), v.i. thau khawh, zuang, lîm, hlim vânga zuang.
(gampshn, gamshawn), n. remhriatna.
(gan), n. silai. blow great guns, na taka thli tleh. great gun, mi challang tak (\awng lêr). stick to one's gun, nghet taka \anhmun khawh.
(gandar), n. vatâwk pa.
(gangbawrd), n. lawnga chuan kaina leilâwn, lawng kaina thingphêk dawh.
(gangglian), n. tihrawl kâra ngâwt.
(ganggrîn), n. pangti \awih/thi.
(ganguei), n. lawnga kailâwn, \hutthlêng tlar kâra a khawkham zâwnga veivahna.
(gani), n. kâwl la, ziza hrui/puan, buara.
(gantri), n. rêl chawlhhmuna signal pêkna, thing zem tlarna chhuar.
(garanti), n. a dikzia or \hatzia nemnghehna or tiamna, tiamkamna. v.t. tiamkam.
(garb), n. inchei dân, incheina, thuam. v.t. thuam, chei.
(garbl), v.t. a chhuanchhe zâwnga kaih sawih atâna lehkhabu a\anga thu châng thlan chhuah, la kawi, la kikawi.

(gard), v.t. vêng, hum. v.i. vêngthâwng, invênthâwn. n. râl vêngtu or enkawltu, vêngtu, invênna, ngal phaw, ngunhnam fawng kualtu, sana bunna. mount guard, santiri ding tûra kal. on guard, invêng, inrâlring. off guard, inrin loh lai.
(gard), v.t. vêt, phuar, hrêng, hual.
(gardar), n. khanchhuk, kalkhang.
(gardian), n. vengtu, nu leh pa anga enkawltu, humhalhtu. guardian angel, vêngtu angel, khua leh vâng.
(gardl), n. kâwnghrên, puithiam hruihrual hrên, vêttu, hrêngtu. v.t. vêt, chilh, hrêng.
(gargl), v.i. baw hawk hawk, luang chhuak hawk hawk, \awng bawrh bawrh. n. nasa taka thil luang chhuak/luan chhuahna.
(gargl), v.t., v.i. a \huahna tui lem lova hrawk \huah, a vânkarak zâwnga tui hmuam khak rîk. n. hrawk \huahna damdawi tui.
(garij, garâzh), n. motor dahna in, motor siamna in.
(garisn), n. kulh nghâktu sipai, kulh.
(garjitêshn), n. so sâng, fâwn so.
(garman), jermane (jarmein), adjs. a ber, inkungkaih.
(garnar), v.i. fawm khâwm, chhêk khâwm. n. buh in, chhêk in.
(garnzi), n. lawng sipai tâwnzau lum. Guernsey, n. Guernsey thliarkar bâwng chi thlah.
(garulas, gariulas), adj. \awng thei, dangnâl, kamtam, \awngcheh.
(gas\ranawmi), gastrology (-lawji), nn. intuituah thiamna, ei tûr tuihnai buatsaih dân.
(gas\rik), gastral, adjs. pumpui thil. gastritis (gas\ai\is), n. pumpui natna.
(gasias, gêsias, gêzias), adj. gas ang.
(gast), n. thli tleh thut.
(gastêshn), n. temna, a thlum a al hriatna.
(gat), n. rîl, satha, kawr or tuikâwr zîm tak. v.t. rîl khei, kâng chhe vek.
(gatar), n. tuidawn, tuihâwk luankawr, hmun \awp taka khawsakna, vêng \awp.
(gataral), adj. hrawk lam thil, hrawk ri bawrh bawrh.
(gauj, gûj), kher kuakna thîr khen. v.t. kher, ker (mitmu kher, etc.).
(gaun), n. kawrchung fual, hmeichhe kawr fual.
(gaut), n. kezungpui ruh tuah natna, ruhtuah natna. gout (gu), n. tuina.
(gavament, gavanment), n. rorêlna, inawpna, sawrkâr.
(gavan), v.t., v.i. thunun, rorêl, awp.
(gavanes) n. naupang kilkawitu or awmtu hmeichhia.
(gavenor), n. awptu.
(gavl), n. thing tuboh, inkhâwm bengchheng khap reh nâna chairman-ina dawhkân chhut rîk nana a hman thing tuboh tê.
(gavlkaind), n. pa thiha a fate'n angkhata an in hmun lo ram an insem theihna dân.
(gawbet), n. hmawm khat, thil hlawm dawlh tûr.
(gawbl), v.t. a hlâwma dawlh, dawlh.
(gawblet), n. piala lian, berhbu.
(gawd), n. tiang hmâwr zum, chawh phûrna, tuarna. v.t. tiang nena khalh, hawlh buai.
(gawd), n. tlereuh, ropui taka thil tihhona.
(gawdaun), n. kudâm.
(gawdhed), n. pathianna.
(gawdi), adj. a hnamchawm zâwnga lâr intivei leh a langsâr zâwnga inchei.
(gawgl), v.t. meng pual.
(gawing), n. kal, chêtna. goings on, chêt dân duhawm lo.
(gawitar), n. awrpuar.
(gawl), n. hmasâng France hming, Gaul rama chêng.
(gawl), n. mît khâkna, huat thuchhiatna. gall (gawl), n. belkâng, v.i. tibelkâng, nâwt pilh. gall (gawl), n. hnah bawl, hnah sawrbâwk.
(gawl), n. tiam, tum.
(gawlaiath), n. milian, Goaliatha.
(gawld), n. pawisa, hausakna, rangkachak, rawng eng.
(gawlf), n. tiangkawm nêna bi khur intlara vuak mûm vuak luha inkhêlna. golf-course, golf-link, nn. golf khêlna mual.
(gawn), pa.p. of go, kal liam tawh, bo tawh, chhan phâk loh, thi, â bawraw.
(gawnawria), n. dadu.
(gawndawla), n. Venice khawpui kawtthlêr tui kawnga hman chi lawnglêng (Venice khawpui kawtthlêr lûn zual zual hi chu tui vek a ni).
(gawnt), adj. chêr, ria, hriam, hmêl urhsûn.
(gawntlet), n. thîr kutkawr (hmân lai chuan incho entîr nân an paih thla \hin a, chona pawmtu chuan a chhar \hin). throw down the gauntlet, cho.
(gawr), v.t. pir thlêr, tai pawp/thlêr. n. thisen, thi khâr.
(gawrd, gûrd), n. ûm chi rêng rêng, bûr, ûm bûr, bûr tuithâwl (bitter gourd - changkha. sponge gourd - awmpâwng. bottle gourd - ûm).

(gawrdian), adj. khirhkhân. cut the Gordian knot, a butut zâwnga thil khirhkhân siam rem (Alexander-a khân lal Gardius-a hrui suih hnawk a phelh thei lo va, a thinurin a ngunhnamin a zai phelh a, chu mi tehkhinna chu).
(gawrgawn), n. chawmnu. adj. hmeichhia, râpthlâk, huphurhawm.
(gawrila), n. zâwng lian ber chi.
(gawrj), n. luikawr thûk, kawr thûk, kurung, hrawk. v.t. koham taka dawlh.
(gawrjas), adj. ropui, mawi, nalh.
(gawrjet), n. ir phaw, ir cheimawina.
(gawsamar), n. maimawm rîl, maimaw puan, thil pan tak.
(gawsip), n. mi kamtam, mi rêl hmang, \hian bul. v.i. tîtî, thu veivir, kamtam.
(gawst), n. thlarau, a ang riai ruai, a lem, hmuithla. give up the ghost, thi, chat thla.
(gawt), n. kêl.
(gawti), n. hmuihmul tel lova khabe hmul zum chauh zuah.
(gawz), n. puan pan tak tak (pân tuamna ang chi), thil rêng rêng pan taka tah (thîrlên sîn, etc.).
(gawzling), n. vatâwk no.
(gazel), n. sazuk tê chi pianhmang nalh tak pu.
(gazel), n. sazuk tê chi pianhmang nalh tak pu.
(gazet), n. chanchinbu, thu puanna bu.
(gazetar), n. ram chanchin chuanna bu.
(gebi), n. mi mâwl, mi chhaw.
(gei), adj. hlim, harh, ler, nawmsipna ngaina.
(geij), n. tiamna, chona entîrna. v.t. a zakhamna nêna tiam, tiamkam, inchawi.
(geij), v.t. endik, chhût, teh. n. tenna.
(geil), n. Scottish leh Irish hnam. Gaelic, n. Scotland tlâng rama chêngte \awng.
(geil), n. thlipui satliah (thli chhe tling lo deuh).

(geim), n. infiamna, intihsiakna, infiamna or inkhelhnaa tlinna zât, fiamthu, thil zawn lai or ûm lai, veh chi or pêl chi ramsa leh sava rêng rêng. adj. ramsa pêl chungthu, tlawmngaithei. v.t., v.i. pawisa khêl. make game of, nuihzabûra hmang. play the game, dik taka thil ti, fet lova ti. the game is up, in thil tum or in thil phiar rûk chu a tlawlh or thlâwn ta.
(gein), v.t. hlêp, hlâwkpui, hlawh, man, hneh, thleng. n. hlêp, hlawh.
(geinse), v.t. kalh, hnial kalh, phâ.
(geip), v.i. âng, hâm, ka ho, kaw huau, âwng huau. n. ân zau theih ang ber. the gapes, ka âng zâwnga phungzâwla tlûkna, âr hrawka rûlhût a inhnawh vanga an ân vak vakna hri.
(geit), n. kal zâwnga sûkthlêk dân.
(geit), n. kawngkhâr, kawngka, kawtchhuah, dai kawngkhâr, luhna, ennawm entute luh man.
(geitar), n. kerêk zem, ke rêk khuhna.
(geiz), v.i. thlir vawng vawng, melh, ngun taka en.
(gekhaw), n. chawke, daidep.
(geld), v.t. til rek, a nu anga siam, tichau.
(geminai), n. arsi \hiang (unau anga an chhâl).
(genital), adj. inthlahna lam thil. genitals, n. serh, zahmawh.
(gent), n. gentleman kaihtawi.
(gerimandar, jerimander), v.t. mahni politics pâwl hmakhaw thlîrna inthlanna bial siam danglam or vote thlâkna hmun ruat sawn, a bawplawk leh a ni lo zâwnga thudik kai sawi.
(ges), v.t., n. ring chhin, rin sawi, ngaihruatna, rin tihna.
(gest), n. khual, inlêng, khual thlen.
(gestikhiuleit), v.i. zaizir chiam.
(gestâpaw), n. German ram mipui enthlatu police pâwl rûk.
(getaw), n. Judo-ho awmna vêng.
(ghlîan), adj. Galili (Galilee) thil, Italy mi chhiarkawp thiam Galileo chungchâng. n. Galili mi, Kristian.
(gi), n. giu, bâwnghnute hriak (Vai \awng).
(giar), n. thawmhnaw, sakawr hlînna savun hrui, khâwl kelki. gearing, n. khâwl hnathawh hlân chhâwngtu kelki.
(gibas), adj. thlukvûm nei, a sirtuaka bial dân intia lo (thla tiave leh hleinga inkâra a tlâng bial hleih ang hian).
(gibawn), n. zâwng bân sei chi, hauhûk.
(gidi), adj. luhai, lu tihai, luhaithlâk.
(gig), n. tawlailir ke pahnih nei, lawnglêng sei tak.
(gigl), v.i. nui ri ker ker. n. chutianga nuih.
(gil), n. sangha kep, a samkhuih. gill (jil), n. thil tuiril tehkhâwng (pava khat vel dâwng).
(gilawtin), n. chehrep or kâwlper anga lu tan chhumna, vaihlo channa ang chi hmanrua rêng rêng, rorêl sei lutuk tihtawina dân. v.t. lu tan, tan chhum.
(gild), v.t. rangkachak tui luan, mit la. gilt, gilded, pa.ts.
(gilt), n. thiam lohna, tihdik lohna, sualna.
(gim-), n. thil verhna. v.t. verh tlang.
(gimar), n. berâm la.
(ginggam), n. puanchei, puanzeh.
(gini fawl), n. vavu, âr vavu chi khat.

(gini pig), n. vawk pianhmang anga piang sazu chi khat, (he thil hi mihring chunga damdawi thiam thar ilo an hman chhin hmaa enchhin nân taka an chelek avângin, mihring chungthu sawina a nih chuan) enchhin nâna hman.
(gini), n. hmânlai England rangkachak tangka shilling 21 hen.
(gitâr), n. \ing\ang, chawngpereng (a spelling hi fîmkhur tûr).
(giubanatawrial), adj. awptu thil, governor chungchâng.

(giv), v.t. pe, hlân, tichhuak, chhuah. give chase, ûm. give ear, ngaithla. give ground, tawlh, tlâwm. give in, tlâwm. give out, puang, chhuah, tlachham, ral. give over, titâwp, bansan. give up, tlâwm, bânsan. give way, tlâwm, hnungtawlh.
(gladiawlas, gladaiawlas), n. keptuam chi. gladioli, pl.
(gladietawr, -tar), n. hmasâng Rom vânglaia an hmuhnawm siamna lâmtuala mihring leh ramsa kawlh suala ei zawng mi.
(glaid), v.i. tleng, dam taka luang or tawlh, thlawhna khâwl neilova thlâwk.
(glam), adj. ngui, tûm.
(glamar, glamawr), n. thil mit la, thil or mihring nalh tak, mi zêl â thei khawpa thil/mihring nalh or cheimawi.
(glans), v.i. tleu, leu, lau, melh zawk. n, tleuna, melh zawr.
(glas), n. dârthlalang, dârthlalang no, entlang, dârthlalang no chhûnga thil chhûn (tui, zu, damdawi, etc.). glassy, glasslike, adj.
(glat), v.t. vir taka lem, lei sên loh khawpa dâwrpuia thil zuar, hrâi tlai. n. tlaina, puar luatna, hnianghnârna.
(glauar), v.t. rum taka melh.
(glav), n. kutkawr.
(glaw), v.i. êng, vâm, sâr, sen awp awp. n. sat avânga thil êng, ênna, lâwmna.
(glawb), n. thil mûm, lei mûm, lei lem mûm, khâwnvâr chimni.
(glawbiular), adj. mûm.
(glawmareit), v.t. hlâwm mûm.
(glawming), n. thim hlim, var\ian, thim thut thut.
(glaws), n. tlêtna. v.t. a pâwn titlê, mi dik lohna ngaihhnathiam. gloss (glaws), n. phêk sira or kâra thu har leh khirh sawi fiahna, hrilhfiahna. v.t. sawi fiah, thu awmzia la kawi.
(glawt), v.i. a runrâl zâwnga lâwm, a diriam zâwnga thlîr.
(gleid), n. ramhnuai hmun âwng, ngaw kâr phûl.
(gleir), n. artui pâwn vâr (a chhûngmu tuamtu).
(gleir), n. tlêtna, tlê, mit tivâi khawpa êng, mi ênkhalh thei chi. v.i. tlê, mi finkhalh, rum taka melh. glaring, adj. tlê, langsâr, mualpho.
(gleiz), v.t. dârthlalanga chei, dârthlalanga luan, titlê. v.i. tlê. n. thil tlê, dârthlalanga luan.
(glengari), n. Highlander (hailandar), lukhum (a tukkhum lama ribbon uai).
(gleshial, gleshal), adj. vûr ang.
(glesier, glashiar), n. tlâng pang a\anga zawi zawia vûr khâwn tawlh.
(gletn), n. mi vir, thil heh mi, puar lutuka thil ei mi, kaw pui pu.
(gli), n. hlimna, lâwmna, hla lâwn. gleeful, adj. hlim.
(glim), v.i., n. no taka êng, de, rei vak lova êng.
(glimar), v.i, n. de sêt sêt, thil êng vak lo, beiseina chhe tê.
(glimps), n. de zawk, thil lang zawr. v.i. êng sêt sêt. v.t. hmu zawr.
(glin), v.t. buh latu sulhnu chhui, thil darhsarh lâwr khâwm.
(glint), v.i. êng, tlê. v.t. êng chhunkhalh, ên chhâwng. n. êng sêt sêt.
(glisn), v.i. tlê, êng taka dê.
(glitar), v.i., n. êng, tlê, tlê noh noh, ropui, nasa taka chei.
(glu), n. thil chârna, gawm. v.t. châr.
(glukhaws), n. thei rah ilo a\anga taksa tâna \ha thil thlum lâk chhuah.
(glutinas), adj. ban.
(glâwkhas), adj. hring pâwl, hring-duk.
(glâwri), n. ropuina, vân ram, chawimawi. v.i. chhuang. Old Glory, America puanzâr.
(glâwrifai), v.t. chawimawi, sawi mawi.
(glîsâd), v.i. tleng thla, tlawh thla. n. tleng thlâk, lama tlengna.
(glûm), n. thim thut thut, nguina, tûmna, hlim lohna. v.i. tûm, ngui, khawnguai/dul.
(grab), v.i. hnawmhnawk hâi, v.t. lai chhuak, a bul chawpa kar. n. buhchium, thlai pangang, ngêt, lung, rûl, sûlrûl, (\awng lêrah chuan) chaw, ei tur.
(gradeshn), n. a indawta thliarna.
(gradiual), adj. a indawt(in), zawi zawi(in), a sakal(in).
(gradiueit), v.t. inang or inzâta thliar, thliar, thlang. v.i. college-a zirna hlen. B.A. leh a tlukpui zo. n. chutianga zo (pass) chu.
(graf), adj. \awng bung nghut, bung nghut.
(grafait), n. lung chi khat.
(graim), n. mang, vaivut, bawlhhlawh.
(graind), v.t. râwt, nâwt, tât.
(graindstâwn), n. lungtât, vir, thil râwtna or herna lung.
(graip), v.t. hmer, vuan, hmet sâwr, pum tinâ. n. pum nat.
(graj), v.t. ui, hreh. n. huatthu, thu vei.
(gramawfawn), n. thingremzaithei.
(grambl), v.i. phun, phunnawi, ngur, rûm.
(graminei, grêminei), n. hnim chi rêng rêng khai khâwmna hming.
(graminesias), gramineous (graminias), adjs. hnim ang.
(grampas), n. nghapui chi hrang hrang.
(grampi), adj. tau, titau, nuar, thinchhia, nelawm lo.
(gramêrian), n. \awng dik tak thiam mi.
(granari), n. buh zêm, chhêk in.
(grandiar), n. ropuina.
(grandiaws), adj. ropui tak, pui tak.
(granit), n. lung chang.
(graniul), n. mûr tê tak tê, thil them/nawi/fang. granular, granulious, adjs.
(granivawras), adj. buh fang leh thil chi ei chi.
(gransair), n. thlahtu, pu.
(grant), v.i., n., hâwk, ngûk.
(grapl), n. kawihsapir, thil bahna. v.t. man bet, chelh, v.i. inchai, chai buai, bei.
(grasneik), n. rûlpaihawl chi.
(grasuidaw), n. pasalte thangbosan hmeichhia.
(gratifai), v.t. tilâwm, titlai, duhtâwk ngahtir.
(gratitiud), n. lâwmna, lâwmna nachâng hriatna.
(gratiuitas), adj. a thlâwn, \ul lo, mahni thua tih.
(gratiuti), n. lâwmman, thilthlâwnpêk.
(grauchh), v.i., n. Same as grouse.
(graul), v.i. ngur, rûm, lungawi lova phun bul bul.
(graund), n. lei, mual, mual zâwl, buaina hmun, \anhmun, dinhmun, hun chhan, \anchhan, lem ziakna hmai.
(graundsel, graunsel), n. buar lam chi.
(graus), n. Britain leh Ireland-a sava veh chi. grouse (graus), v.i. phun, phunnawi.
(graut), n. chhangphut hraw.
(grav aksent), n. thu lam rîk uai thlâk chhinchhiahna (`), thu mal tâwpa 'ed' lam rîk hran \ûl chhinchhiahna (beloved - bilavid).
(graveling, gravling, grawvling), adj. tlu sawp, mi hmaa bawkkhup, bawkkhup.
(graviti), n. urhsûnna, lei hîpna, pawimawhna.
(gravl), n. lung tê awm khâwm, phînga lung tê.
(grawin), n. kap, \hâl.
(grawn), v.i., n. hrehawm tuara rûm, rûm.
(graws), adj. thap, timûr hraw, mualpho, thau luak, hrawmhraw, tlahawlh, zahmawh, vai hmer, a zavai. n. a vai, za-sawmli pali. great-gross, gross 12, in gross, a pumpuhlûmin.
(grawsar), n. ni tin ei tûr mamawh zuartu.
(grawtâw), n. pâk lung pâk siamchawp.
(grei), adj. paw, vut buak, \uak. Same as grey.
(greid), n. \hat lam, sân dân, awihtlân. v.t. a nihna ang anga thlei or thliar, thliar.
(greil), n. Zanriah Hnuhnunga Isua uain no hman.
(grein), n. mûr, fang, mu, thil tê tak tê, thil tlêm tê, British bûklung tê ber, timûr. v.t. thinga rawng hnawih. with a grain of salt, thu rinawm lo pawmzam dân.
(greinj), n. thingtlâng in.
(greip), n. grep rah.

(greis), n. chêt dân zei, thuam mawitu, khawngaihna, inhmehna, inngaihhnathiamna, zahngaihna, chaw ei dâwn leh ei khama \awng\aina, lal chipuite kohna hming. v.t. mawi, chei mawi. graceful, adj. nalh, zei. gracious (greshas), adj. zah ngai thei, khawngaihnaa khat.

(greit), adj. hrawl, ropui nasa. great grandfather, n. pu te pa. great great-grandfather, n. pu te pu (chutiang zelin). great grandson, n. tu te fa. great great-grandson, n. tu te tu (grandmother leh granddauhter pawh chutiang zelin). Great Bear, n. zangkhua.
(greit), v.t. nâwt, nawt pilh, hrût khawk, \hial, \hei. v.i. khawrh, chher.
(greitful, greitfl), adj. lâwm.
(greiv), v.t. ker, lem ker. grave (greiv), n. thlân. with one foot in the grave, thihna ko tlânga dâk, thi \ep. grave (greiv), adj. mûk, thutak, pawimawh, urhsûn, ngaihtuahawm tham, ngui.
(greiz), v.t. pet, tlattîr, v.i. tlâ, hnim pet.
(greneid), n. vawmpuah.
(grifin), griffon, gryphon (grifawn), n. ramsa phuahchawp, a tak sakeibaknei, muvanlai thla leh hmul nei.
(grigêrias, gregêrias), adj. awm khâwm ngaina mi, a ruala tla chi.
(grimalkin, -mawlkin), n. zawhte tar lam, zawhte nu.
(grimeis), n., v.t. \hen, hmai chuar, chhiatkhum.
(gringeij), n. Japan theite chi.
(grinij mîn \aim), n. British hun tehna.
(grisl), n. duar, duarda.
(griz), v.t. hrût, nâwl, nûl, nâwk, thawi, nâwt.
(grizl), n. rawng paw. grizzled, grizzly, adjs. paw.
(grizld), adj. paw, Same as grizzled.
(grizli) adj. râpthlâk.
(grow), v.i. \hang, chawr, \o. v.t. \hantîr, chîng (thlai, buh etc.).
(gru), pa.t. of grow.
(grusam), adj. râpthlâk, hmuh nahawm lo.
(grâf), n. a lema entîrna, thil danglam dân entîrna lem.

(grâft), n., v.t. thinga thing dang \ang bel, mihring leh ramsa pangtia vun leh ruh ilo bel or vuah. (Sisu kûng \ang tan hârah sêrthlum \ang a graft nun theih a. Hmai hliam kakah malpui ti a graft theih bawk). graft, n. ei rûkna, hlêp rûkna.
(grânt), v.t. pe, vûr, phal, dika pawm. n. pêkna, thil pêk. take for granted, ni sa anga ngai.
(grâs), n. hnim, phaitual hnim, hlobet (buh, phairuang, mau, etc. tiamin). let the grass grow under one's feet, rial khawtlai, vuaicha.
(grâshawpar), n. khau. grasshopper-minded, adj. hna chi khata bet rei thei lo.
(grâsp), v.t. chelh, vuan, man, \ham, rilrua man, hre thiam. v.i. man tuma ban, phûr taka pawm. n. hmerna, rilrua man thiamna.
(grâwp), v.i., v.t. dap vêl, ar khawthim dai.
(grâwtesk), adj. kawm ngel ngul, hmêlhmang mawi lo.
(grâwv), n. thing hmun, thei huan, thing ding tlar.
(grêhaund), n. uisathiam chi khat.
(grêtis), adv. a thlâwnin.
(grêvi), n. sa tui.

(grî), n. Grik \awng, \awng hriat loh. Greek Church, Greek Orthodox Church (Eastern Church an ti bawk), Greece, Russia, Turkey leh ram \henkhata Kristian Kohhran Katholik Kohhran laka intihrang leh Kohhran lu atana Constantinopole bishop vuantu. Greek fire, tihhuha alh thei bawlhlo.
(grîd), n. duhâmna.
(grîdi), adj. duhâm, virthial, huamhauh, pawmham, kaw pui pu.
(grîf) n. lungngaihna, lungngaih mangan. come to grief, chesual, tawhsual tâwk.
(grîn), adj. hring, \hang lai, chawr no, duah, naupang, thar, hel, tuai.
(grîs), n. thau, hriak.
(grîshan, grîshian), n. Grik mi, Grik \awng thiam, Grik \awng hmang Juda mi.
(grît), v.t. hmuak, chibai, lawmpuina thawn. greeting, n. inchibaina.
(grîv), n. thîr nghalphaw.
(grîv), v.t., v.i. tilungni lo, chhaih mangang, lungngai, sûn.
(grûel), n. buh tuirîl, buh tuihnâng, (\awng lêr) hremna hrehawm. v.t. hahthikûla siam, tihrehawm.
(grûm), n. sakawr pu, lal upa, khâwnbâwl, mo neitu. v.t. vil, chei, sakawr enkawl.
(grûp), n. rual, ho, pâwl.
(grûv), n. khuar sei, tuihâwr, rût. v.t. rîn khuar, rût.
(guanaw, huanaw), n. tuipui sava êk chheng khâwl (lei \ha atâna an hman).
(guava), n. kawlthei, kawiâm.
(gud), adj. \ha, \hahnem. goodness, n. \hatna, my goodness! karei! e khai! as good as, tluk (thawthâng). for good, hlen. make good, tiam hlen, zângna dawmna pe, puh thlu, ding chhuak.
(gustep), n. bawp tlâwn awt awta sipai kalrem.
(gâr\ar), n. mawza hrênna. Knight of the Garter, British pasal\ha sâng ber.
(gârbij), n. hnâwmhnawk, bawlhhlawh, saa a \awphnawk, hnephnawl.
(gârgantuan), adj. kaw pui pu, hrawl.
(gârlik), n. purunvâr.
(gâstli), adj. mitthi ang, râpthlâk.
(gêbl), n. liang leh tlung inkâr pâwn lam bang kil thum nei.
(gêisha), n. Japan nula lâm mi.
(gêla, gâla), n. hlimhlawpna, intihhlimna, huau huau.
(gêrish), n. tlê, lâr.
(gêzar, gaizar, gîzar), n. tlâng kâng hnathawh anga lei a\anga tui lum or so or tuihu lo irh chhuak.
(gîzad), n. thial, ar leh sava thial.
(gû, gaul), n. ruang ei hmang phûng, mi râpthlâk. ghoulish, adj. râpthlâk.
(gûrmând, gûrmaw), n. mi vir, chaw heh, mi koham.
(gûrmê), n. ei tûr tuihnai ngaina mi, mi intuituah mi, mi duhtui.
(gûs), n. vatâwk, varak lian chi, mi chhaw.
(hab), n. thil virna lai, laili, belvâl kual thehna.
(habab), n. ri nuai nuai, bengchheng.
(habeaskawrpus), n. rorêltu hmaa lung in tâng hruai tûr leh a tântîrna chhan rawn sawi tûra tâng vêngtu hnêna thupêk.
(habedashar), n. nepnawi leh tlereuh zuartu.
(habichi-ueit), v.t. tidawklak, dawklak, chîng.
(habitabl), adj. chên nâna hmantlâk, awm theih.
(habl babl), n. nghawr ri, so bawrh bawrh, tuikunluk mâwl chi.
(hachh), n. bâwm, sazupui khawina bâwm, laihna khur a\anga lungalhthei tawlh chhuahna tawlailîr.
(hachh), n. kawngka chanve a chung lam hawn theih, se kawtrawlh, chhuat âwng, chhuat âwng chhinna, bang kaw khuhna. hatch (hachh), v.t., v.i. no keu, keu, phuahchawp, ngaihtuah chhuak.
(hachhet), n. hrei tê, bahhnuk tê, hachhek.
(hadawk), n. tuifinriat sangha chi khat.
(hadl), v.i., v.t. dah hnawk, chawhchawrawi, tawm ping, dawngdah taka thawk, inbengberek, chingchivêt.
(haf), n. thingbutut neih, tûmna.
(hag), v.t. kuah, pawm bet.
(hagiawgrafa, hejiaw-), n. Thuthlung Hlui bu \henkhat khai khâwm.
(hagiawlawji, hêjiaw-), n. mithianghlimte chanchin.
(hagl), v.t. buarchuar taka zai. v.i. indawn buai, phunchiar.
(hai), adj. sâng, lutuk. a high time, a high old time, hlimhlawp hun. high time, hun thlu, \uah. on high, van sângah.
(hai), v.i. hmanhmawh.
(hai\), n. sân lam, hmun sâng, tawn sân ber. heighten, v.i. chawi sâng zual, tizualkai.
(haialin), adj. dârthlalang ang.
(haiarawglif), n. hmasâng Aigupta mite milema thu urhsûn ziak dân, milema thu ziak.
(haiarawlawji), n. hmasâng lehkhabu thianghlim, thu thianghlum ziakna.
(haiarârk), n. sakhaw hruaitu, puithiam sâng.
(haiarârkhi), n. angel rual hmun thuma \hen te leh ropuina leh thuneihna hrang hrang neia pâwl kuaa \hen sawm leh te, puithiamho sawrkârna, lalna/nihna indawt chhoh/insân hleih dân.
(haiasinth), n. keptuam chi khat, lily chi khat, lunghlu chi khat, rawng senduk.
(haibarnei\), v.i thlasik mut, thlasik chhûnga mu tûra inkhung, châwl rei, tlawngâwl.
(haibarnian), adj. Ireland thil. n. Irish mi.
(haibrid), n., adj. chi hrang inthlah pawlh, \awng hrang inchawh pawlh a\anga thu mal chher.
(haid), v.t. thup, thukrû, zêp, hliah. v.i. biru, bibo, inthup. hide-and-seek, inbihrûksiak. hide (haid), n. savun, (inhnehsawh nânah chuan) mihring vun. v.t. talhfiaka vua, hlap.
(haidra), n. hmâsâng thawnthua tuipui sakawlh lu tam tak nei, sual inbukthuah.
(haidrant), n. tui dâwt lâk pênna, kangmei thulha herh haw theih mai tûra tui dâwt vuah.
(haidras), adj. tui pui.
(haidraw), tui.
(haidrawdinamiks, -dainamiks), n. tui hnathawh dân zirna.
(haidrawfawbia), n. tui râpna, ui â sehina tui an lem theih lohna.
(haidrawlik), adj. tui khâwl lampang, tui siak thei. hydraulics, n. (singular), tui hnathawh dân leh tui khâwl siam dân zirna. hydraulic jack, tui leh têl ilo hmanga rit kar kânna tulung.
(haidrawmitar), n. tui rih leh chhah dân tehna hmanrua (bâwnghnute tak leh tak lo tehna ang chi).
(haidrawplein), n. motor lawnglêng chi khat.
(haidrawsfiar), n. tuifinriat ina a tuam chin lei chung.
(haidreit), n. tui nena inkawp (kahsamar te hi dârsen hlo teh khat leh tui teh nga inkawp a ni). v.t. tui nêna inbelhbawmtîr.
(haidrâwjen), n. boruak zâng ber, oxygen nêna inkawpa tuia chang thei boruak.
(haifen), n. thu pahnih daidanna or zawmna (-).
(haigrawmitar), n. boruak hnâwn lam tehna hmanrua.
(haijienik, haijînik), adj. hrisel, thianghlim.
(haijîn), n. hrisel dân zirna, invawn thianghlim dân.
(haik), v.t. chhuang, pu. v.i. pawnthuah aka kea zin.
(haimal, hîmal), adj. thlasik thil.
(haimen), n. inneihna pathian, inneihna, hmeichhe ui liah ngat serh khuhtu duarda or hamda (mipa an pâwl veleh a \et \hîn).
(haind), n. zukpui, sazuk nu.
(haind, -ar), adjs. hnung lam, hnukhawi. v.t. dang, dal, tibahlah.
(haipar), n. chungchuang, pian lam.
(haiparbatan), n. thu inchheh hmakhalh dân ('kan inah a lo lêng' tih aia 'a lo lêng kan inah' etc.).
(haiparbawla), n. kual.
(haiparbawrli), n. thu sawi uarna.
(haiparbawroan), adj., n. hmâr tâwpa chêng.
(haiparkhritik), hypercritical (-kal), n., adj. phunchiar lutuk.
(haipaw), hnuai, hniam.
(haipaw, hipawkhawndria), n. ngaihbel vâng maia thil \ha lo anga insawisêl hrâtna.
(haipaw-, hipawstasis), n. pawimawhna lai, Pathian pakhata Mi Pathumte nunphung \heuh, mawng nawi, thisen inhnawh khâwm.
(haipaw-, hipawtenius, -nuz), n. right-angled triangle-a right angle eptu sîr.
(haipawdarmik, hipaw-), adj. vun hnuaiah, vun chhûnga inchiuna.
(haipawthesis), n. finfiah tûr, ngaihruatna, dik anga han ngaihruat phawtna.
(hair), n. hlawh, hawh man. v.t. man chawia hawh, hlawhfa ruai, tham.
(hairling), n. chhiahhlawh rawih, tirkah hlawh nei.
(haiv), n. khawi thlâr, mihring phusakna, bawlna, hnamsai. v.t. khâwl khâwm, chhêk.
(hajji), n. Mosolman khaw thianghlim Mecca emaw, Medina emawa kal tawh.
(hakh), v.t. chêk, ek, sât sawm, ker. n. vun khi chat, rêp, kak, sakawr man neia hawh chi, mi leh ran chhawr rimtawng.
(haking khawf), n. khuh kulrût.
(hakl), n. khêl bâwr, zâng kûl, thlûkvûm.
(hakl), n. lakhuih, arpa leh ui nghâwng hmul, nghakuai chah atâna ar hmul siam. v.t. lakhuiha khuih pawt \het.
(haklberi), n. ram theihmu chi khat.
(hakni), n. man chawia hawh chi. v.t. chhawr rim, tipichil zo. (hackneyed phrase, \awngkauchheh dân hman rim tawng luattuk).
(haksaw), n. thîrzai chem.
(hakstar), n. nepnawi zuar mi.
(hal), n. kâwr, hâwng. v.t. kheh, (buh) dêng. hull (hal), n. lawng ruangâm.
(halabalu), n. bengchhenna.
(halaw), interj. e heu! chibai! nang i nia lo? See hello.
(halaw), v.t. tithianghlim, zah, serh.
(halbard), n. indona hreipui hriam tawn nei.
(hali\awsis), n. thaw rimchhia, thaw uih.
(halibat), n. nghavâng hrawl ber chi.
(halk), n. thil ritsak/hnawksak, lawng bu\u tak.
(halsiawn), n. tuifinriat vapui.
(halusineshn), n. hmuh sualna, mit vai.
(halû), n. ui fing fuihna, mi auhna. v.i., v.t. pak raw! bûla tu raw!
(ham), n., interj. mi mit lâk tuma aw thenna.
(ham), v.t., n., v.i. thûm mam mam.
(hamar), n. tuboh, silai chêng. v.t. kilh, khêng, chhû, dêng, rem ruat. hammer and sickle. Russia ram puanzâra chhinchhiahna (kut hnathawk mi entîrna).
(hamawk), n. mual pâwng.
(hamawk), n. puan khum khai, thing leh thing inkâr emawa mutna tûra puan dungthlun kai (lawng hnathawk mite mutna).
(hambag), n. inbumna, thuvuvûk, hmawmsawm thlum.
(hambargar), n. sa sah sawm hrang, sa thithun hrawl tak.
(hambl), adj. tlâwm, inngaitlâwm, mâwl. v.t. tithangtlâwm, hming hliau.
(hambl-bi), n. khawimu.
(hamdram), adj. ninawm, khamawm.

(hezi\eit), v.i. tîm, tawi, hreh, \awng bah.
(hezl), adj. buang, sen-buang.
(hi), pron. a, amah (mipa).
(hiar), adv. hetah hian. here and there, khawi'lai laiah emaw hian.

(himnal), adj.

(hiuman), adj. mihring chi, mihring ze nei. human kind, n. mihring chi.

(hiumanist), n. awm dân \ha zir mi, mihring nungchang zir mi.
(hiumaniterian), n. mi rethei hnêna thil thlâwn pêk chîng mi, Krista hian Pathianna a nei lo tih ring mi (mihring ngalngat a ni tih ringtu).
(hiumaniti), n. mihring huam, ngilneihna.
(hiumar), n. rilru put dân, rilru âwn lam, nuihzatna, fiamthu. v.t. duat, lâwm zawng tih sak.
