(hiumaras), n. bân ruh (bânpuam ruh).
(hiumas), n. thil \awih fel (dân narânin lei dûr).
(hiumein), v.t. lainatna nei, ngilnei.
(hiumid), adj. hnâwng, hnâwm.
(hiumilieit), v.t. tizak, tithangtlâwm, timualpho. humiliation, n.
(hiumiliti), n. inngaihtlâwmna.
(hiz), pron. a ta ( mipa).
(hu), pron. chu mi chu, tu.
(hudwingk), v.t. mit tuamsak, bum, tihder.
(huiiu), interj. e heu!
(huk), n. thil kawm, thang, chem kawm, favah, kawihsapir, nghakuai. v.t. kuai, thil kawma bât, âwk. v.i. kawm, kual, kawi. by hook or by crook, engti kawng pawhin.
(huping kawf), n. khuhhîp. See whooping-cough.
(hurê), interj. lâwm au ri (hip-hip hure!).
(huza, haza), interj., n., v.t., v.i. hurrah! leh hure! tia auna, lâwm au ri.
(huzâr), n. sakawr chungchuang mi sipai.
(hwain), v.i. \ap rawng rawng, chiau, kiu, pangchang taka phunnawi. n. inhnîtna.
(hwait), adj. and n. vâr, ngo, thianghlim.
(hwak), v.t., v.i. vai ri \huai. n. vuak, tum chhin, chanpual.
(hwal), n. nghapui (sangha dik tak chu a ni lo).
(hwarl), n. chak taka virna, phusakna. v.i. vir. v.t. tivir.
(hwarlwind), n. \hawngaleivir.
(hwarpûl), n. livir.
(hwawrl, hwarl), n. hnah \huam, chengkawl leh piring kâwr herh, chhîpvir.
(hwawt), pron. eng eng emaw, eng nge.
(hwawtnawt), n. lehkhabu leh nepnawi dahna bâwm, bâwm hûn.
(hwedhar), pron. and conj. nge, maw.
(hwer), adv. and conj. chutah, khawiah, naah.
(hwidhar), adv. khawii lamah nge?
(hwimpar), v.i. insût, inhnît. n. \ah feih feihna.
(hwini), v.i. (sakawr) hrâm.
(hwinstâwn), n. lung chang.
(hwiskars), n. hmuihmul, biang hmul.
(hwisper), v.t. and v.i. phun ru, phun sap, hrilh ru. n. phun rûk, sawi rûk, thuthang.
(hwitl), v.t. mêt, zai, ker, tizuzi.
(hwuail), n. hun chhûng, engemaw chhâng. conj. kârah, chhûngin, rualin, nachungin (whilst an ti bawk), v.t. khawhral.
(hwuisl), v.i. hamrîk hâm, faifûk, zaisîk, kiu. n. faifûk, hamrîk.
(hwîdl), v.t. vehthlêm, bum.
(hwîl), n. tawlailîr ke, motor khalhna fung.
(hwît), n. chhangphut buh.
(hâf), n. zahve, chanve. adj. a chanve, tluangtling lo, tling hlel. half and half, n. inzahin, inzahsem.
(hâft), n. fawng, khâng, chem fawng.
(hâkim), n. India rama Mosolman rorêltu.
(hâr\), n. sazuk pa, zukchal.
(hâr\al), n. nawrh avânga hna thawh loh, dâwr zawng zawng khâra nawrhna.
(hârakîri), n. hmân lai Japan hnam dâna tlawmngaite invih hlumna.

(hârd), adj. sak, chang, sakhat, khauh, hriatthiam har, tawh khirh, harsa, tuar har, khawngaihna tlachham, kawm, beng khawrh, lar. adv. \hahnemngai takin. hard of hearing, bengchhêt. hard water, chî eng eng emaw inchiah zawpna tui. die hard, thih hreh, hnuk fei, ngaih dân or rinna thlâk hreh mi, luhlul.
(hârdi), adj. tuarchhel, rorum, sik leh sa ngam.
(hârk), v.i. ngai teh, ngaithla teh, chu!
(hârkhn), v.i. ngun taka ngaithla, beng chhi.
(hârm), n. natna, hliam, pawi. v.t. hliam, tipawi. harmful, adj. pawi, tina thei. harmless, adj. pawi khawih thei lo, pawi sawi lo.
(hârnes), n. sakawr chung chuanna thawmhnaw, hnahchawi. v.t. thîr kawra thuam, sakawr chung chuanna thawmhnaw vuah, thununa chhawrbâwk.
(hârp), n. hmân lai \ing\ang. v.i. \ing\ang kai, ninawm khawpa thu khat chauhva chêng, sawi zing.
(hârpûn), n. nghapui khawhna fei kibâr. v.t. harpoon nêna khawh.
(hârsh), adj. chher, beng khawrh hrehawm.

(hârt), n. lung, lairil, laimu, hnuk pui, thil pawimawh ber lai, hmangaihna, thinlung, châkna, duhna, pachanna, phûrna. by heart, en lova hria, hre bel. at heart, thinglung takah. take to heart, run, ngaimawh.
(hârvest), n. buh seng hun, buh seng sa, buh leh thlai thar, a rah. v.t. seng. harvester, n. buh latu, buh lâkna khâwl.
(hâv), v.t. a zahvea sem/\hen.
(hâwl), adj. pumpuhlûm, a vai, pum, kim, hrisêl, him. n. a vai, a pum.
(hâwl), n. kua, âwng, pawp, khuarkhurum, ramsa tawmkûk, awmna dukdak lo.
(hâwld), v.t. vawng, kawl, vuan, chelh, dang, dâl, ngai, tuar khawchhuak. hold one's own, ngai awh. hold (hawld), n. lawng chhûngrila bungraw dahna.
(hâwlsam), adj. hrisêl, him, \ha.
(hâwm), n. lui laia khawmual, luikam ram \ha.
(hâwmerik), adj. hmasâng Grik hla phuah thiam Homer-a chungchâng, pasal\ha.
(hâwmâw), n. mihring chi.
(hâwn), n. lungtât.
(hâwp), v.i., v.t. beisei. n. beiseina, nghahfâk.
(hâwr) n. nawhchizuar, mihur.
(hâwr), adj. \uak.
(hâwral), adj. darkâr thil.
(hâwrd), n. hnam vâkvai, mipui rual.
(hâwrd), n., v.t., v.i. khâwl khâwm, chhêk ru, chheprelh.
(hâwrs), adj. aw chhâng, \êng.
(hâwz), n. mawza, tui siakna \helrêt or puan dâwt.
(hêdîz), n. lei hnuai khawvel, hremhmun, mitthi khua.
(hêi), interj. mi auhna.
(hêlaw), n. sar zâm, thla huala chhimbâl, mithianghlimte lem ziaka an lu huala belvâl êng, mi chawimawina thil.
(hênas), adj. sual tâwpkhâwk, nunchhiatthlâk.
(hêramskhêram), adj. lêr, thuhnu dâwn lo, let phat.
(hêrem, hârîm), n. Mosolman nupui rual dah hranna hmun.
(hêsn), v.t., v.i. tihmanhmawh, tur.
(hêvn), n. hum, chawlhna, muanglei.
(hî\), n. sa, satna, lumna, chhûn pachang, ni sensat lai, runthlâkna, hur lai, intihsiaknaa innawh têtna. v.t. tilum, tisa.
(hîbru), n. Hebrai, Juda mi, Hebrai \awng. Hebraic, Hebraical, adjs.
(hîdawnizm), n. nawmna hi kan pian chhan ber a ni tih thurin.
(hîdhn), n., adj. thingbul lung bul bia, ramhuai bia, sakhaw mumal nei lo, hnam mâwl.
(hîhaw), v.i. sabengtung hrâm.
(hîl), n. ke artui, ke pali nei ke bawr. kick one's heels, mi nghâk khawtlai. down at heel, pheikhawk ke artui thlawn, pawlawh, buarchuar. heel (hîl), v.t. nger, âwn, thle.
(hîl), v.t. tidam, v.i. dam.
(hîliam), n. hydrogen dawta boruak zâng ber [lei boruaka an hmuh chhuah hmaa ni tuamtu boruaka an hmuh a nih avânga helium (ni hming) an puttîr a ni].
(hîliaw), ni chungchâng sawina.
(hîliawgraf), n. ni êng hmanga signal thawnna dârthlalang, thlalâkna hmanga milem ker dân, ni thlalâkna.
(hîliawme\ar), n. ni tlâng hlai lam tehna hmanrua, arsi ilo angle inkâr hlat lam tehna hmanrua.
(hîliawskâwp), n. mit chhe lova ni en theihna hmanrua.
(hîliawtrâwp), n. nihawi, rawng sen duk.
(hîliks), n. bahra ngulzem anga insi deuh thlapa hrui leh thîrhrui ilo herh (spring herh ang hian).
(hîm), n. fakna hla, Pathian chawimawina hla.
(hîp), n. thil intiang, thil inchherchhuan, thil vûm, tam tak. v.t. tiang, chherchhuan, dahkhâwm, vûr, tivûm.
(hîraw), n. pasal\ha, mi chhuantawlawl, thawnthu ilova a puipa or changtupa ber.
(hîrawin), n. hmeichhe hero.
(hîth), n. phûl, phûlleng.
(hîv), v.t. harsa ti taka chawi kâng, paih, theh, tipuam, thaw hîp, inhîp. v.i. so sâng. heave ho! hei raw!
(hû\), v.i., v.t., auhsawh, nuihsawh, chhimbuk anga hrâm, motor anga tût.
(hûd), n. puan lukhum, motor khâwl chhîn, motor chhîn. v.t. khuh, khumtîr.
(hûf) n. ran leh ramsa tin kawm, tin.
(hûligan), n. mi chuang tawrawt tak, misual veivâk. hooliganism, n. khawlai mi suahsual bâwlna.
(hûm), pron. hnênah.
(hûp), n. thil val, belvâl kual, thil valh, thil mûm cherna, khâng, thil kap puarna.
(hûpû), n. chhuangtuar, vaseek.
(hûz), pron. a ta, tu ta?
(iar), n. beng, buh vui, vaimîm kâwm, bengkhawnna. give ear, lend and ear, bengkhawn, ngaithla.
(iareik), n. bengkherh.
(iarfawn), n. biakhlatna (telephone) beng vuah.
(iawlian), adj. thli lam thil, thli hnathawh.
(ichh), n. thak, uithak, châk hliah hliahna. v.i. thak, za hliah hliah, châk ngawih ngawih.
(idawl), n. milim, milem biak, mi emaw, thil emaw, pathian biak taka biak, ngaihsân zâwng.
(idawlawji), idiaw-), n. rilru kalhmang chhuina, rilru sûkthlêk dân, thurin.
(identeit), adj. ha nei lo, ha hmai bal.
(identifai), v.t. a nihna hria, a nihna lai lang, thliar hrang.
(identikal), adj. inang, thuhmun.
(identiti), n. inanna, nihna, hran bîkna, zia.
(idiawm), n. \awnghmang, \awngkauchheh, \awngnamaha..." idiomatic, -al, adj."
(idiawsi), n. âtna.
(idiawsinkhrasi), n. ze hran bîkna, danglam bîkna, khermei bîkna, pian herhna kawng.
(idiawt), n. mi â, mi chhaw, mi ang lo.
(idil, aidil), n. thil sawi mawina hla tawi, thingtlang nun mâwlna leh mawina sawina hla thu.
(idipas kawmpleks), n. naupang rilrua mahni nute ngaihzawn/ngainatna, mahni pate engtona.
(idn), n. Eden huan, paradis.
(ifekt), n. a rah, a hnu leh, a hnathawh, a dik tak. v.t. siam, thawk, awmtîr. in efect, a awmze dik tak chu. take effect, thawk \an.
(ifemineit), adj. hmeichhia ang mai, nu zui, nuthai, no, ngaihno bei. v.t, v.i. hmeichhia anga awm or siam.
(ifishant), adj. tling, tlâk, tling taka ti thei.
(igad), interj. e heu!
(igarjiteit), v.t. luak chhuak, irh chhuak.
(iglu), n. vûra sak bâwk tê, vûr in.
(ignait), v.t. hal, hliau, alh, alh êntîr. ignition, n.
(ignawrant), adj. hre lo, hriatna nei lo, mâwl. ignorance, n.
(ignias), adj. mei ang, mei thil, mei hu tuar tawh.
(ignâwbl), adj. mualphothlâk, hmusitawm, tlâwmthlâk, hniam.
(ignâwnimi), n. mualphona, hmingchhiatna.
(ignâwr), v.t. pawisa lo, ngaihsak lo, hawisan.
(ignâwrêmas), n. chinchâng hre lo, mi mâwl.
(igres), n. kal chhuahna, chhuahna, kal chhuah theihna.
(igrîjas), adj. huaikawm bâwl, râpthlâk, bawraw.
(ijakhiuleit), v.t. chik chhuak, pik chhuak, sawi thut. v.i. \awng thut, baw tla.
(ijekt), v.t. phuh chhuak, hnawt chhuak, chîk chhuak.
(ijest, ejest), v.t. hnawt chhuak, tichhuak.
(ikhawlawji), n. mihring leh thil nung rêng rêng leilung tlâkna rama zira kan pian\o dân zirna (ram luma mihring thatchhia, ram vâwta hnim hnah tla kawlh, etc.).
(ikhawnawmais), v.t. renchem.
(ikhawnawmi, îkhawnawmi), n. pawisa lam leh chhungkaw thila khawsak rêl dân, inrenchem taka pawisa hman, inrenchem thiamna, pawisa khâwlna.
(ikhlips), n. âwk lem, hliahkhuhna, thimna. v.t. hliahkhuh, tithim.
(ikhliziast), n. thu hriltu.
(ikhlîzia), n. mipui tling khâwm, Juda hnam, Kristian Kohhran.
(ikhuanimiti), n. rilru fîmna, helhhawlh lohna.
(ikhuawliti), n. intlukna. equally, adv.
(ikhueshn), n. thil zât intlukpui sawina [(4x3) = (6x2)].
(ilabawreit), v.t. a chipchiara sawi, chhût chhuak, thil tênau a\anga din, harsa taka din. v.i. chipchiar. adj. chipchiar, chipchiar taka siam.
(ilaps), v.i. her liam, pût ral.
(ilastisiti, elastisiti), n. fân theihna, ngai awh leh theihna.
(ilastreit), v.t. sawi fiah, entîrna nêna hrilhfiah, milem nêna sawi fiah.
(ilastrias), adj. challang, ropui, zahawm.
(ilawjikal), adj. awmze nei lo, mumal nei lo, dik lo.
(ileit), adj. hlawhtlin vânga phûr.
(ilejitimat), adj. dân zûl lo, sâwn, thiang lo, dân pâwn lam. n. sâwn. illegitimacy, n.
(ilekt), v.t. thlang. n. thlan, thlan chhuah, ruat.
(ilektawral), electorial (elektawrial), adjs. inthlan thil, thlangtu (tûr)-te chungchâng.
(ilektraw, eliktraw), thumal hmaa vuah a nih chuan electric lam sawina.
(ilektrawkhiut), v.t. electric thaa tihlum.
(ilektrawn), n. atom lairil (nucleus) hêltu electric them tê tak tê (negative).
(ilektrik), n., adj. kâwlphethiltihtheihna, tha tikhûr thei, awm tinuam lo, ngaihnawm loh. electrical, adj.
(iliad), n. hmasâng Grik thawnthua Troy khaw do thu sawina.
(iliberal), adj. hawiher zîm, kawm.
(ilimitabl), adj. chin nei lo.
(ilisit), adj. phal loh, khap.
(iliteret), adj., n. lehkha thiam lo, ziak leh chhiar thiam lo. illiterateness, nn.
(ilium), v.t. tiêng.
(iliuviam, ilûviam), n. lei chunglâng tling khâwm (khua reia tling khâwm).
(iliuzhan), n. a zawngtu bum kawihna.
(iliuziv), adj. hriat or hmuh thiam har, man theih loh.
(ilâstik), adj. fân thei, tîng thei, kawih thleh theih, tihdanglam theih, n. pawhfân.
(ilâwp), v.i. tlân ru, tlân dun, inru.
(ilêshn), n. \anchhan neia thil awmze chhuina.
(ilîgal), adj. dân lo ang, dânina a phal loh.
(ilû-, iliuzhn), ngaihsualna, hmuh sualna, bumna, mitvai.
(ilû-, ilûmineit), v.t. tiêng, tifing, tichiang.
(imajin), v.t. suangtuah, ngaihruat, mitthlaa hmu.
(imakhiulat), adj. bawlhhlawh kai lo, thianghlim, sual kai lo. immaculate conception, Katholik Kohhranina Mari hi Evi leh Adama sual kai lova piang a ni tih an rinna.
(imarj), v.t., v.i. hnim, zuang lût.
(imars), v.t. hnim, chiah pil, inhnima baptisma chan, thûk taka ngaihtuah, ngaihtuah mûk. immersion, n.
(imatiur, -chhiur), adj. puitling lo, \kin lo, tuai, la hel, chuam, bum.
(imatîrial), adj. tak nei lo, pawimawh lo.
(imawbail, imawbîl), adj. tawh chêt theih loh, che lo, tihchêt har.
(imawdarat), adj. chin nei lo, lutuk, hluar, chelh loh.
(imawdest), adj. mawi lo, zahmawh, chaltlai, zak thei lo. immodesty, n.
(imawliument), n. hlawh, lukhâwng.
(imawral), adj. sual, hur.
(imawrtal), adj. thi thei lo, chuai thei lo.
(imbaib), v.t., v.i. hîp lût, fâwp, zûk, dawng, rilrua la lût.
(imbesil, imbsail), adj., n. chaw, mi chhaw, phutkhat.
(imbiu), v.t. chiah, fan, rawng nghet tak hnawih, rilrua fah hneh, pai, vawng.
(imbru), v.t. thi kaitîr.
(imbrâwliaw), n. intihbuaina.
(imemâwrial), adj. hriat phâk loh, rei/hlui lutuk tawh.
(imens), adj. pui, hrawl tak, teh rual loh, nasa tak, zau tak.
(imeshieit), v.t. tichêr, tisâwng. v.i. chêr, sâwngban.
(imezharabl), adj. teh theih loh, tam tak.
(imigreit), v.i. ram danga pêm.
(imij), n. an, anpui, lim, mithlaa hmuh, thlâ, hlimthlâ, tehkhinna. v.t. tehkhin, mitthlaa hmu, hmehbel.
(iminent), adj. hnai, \êp. imminence, n.
(imisibl), adj. chawhpawlh theih loh.
(imiteit), v.t. entawn, zir, tih dân zir.
(imitigabl) adj. nêp thei lo (theih loh).
(imiun), adj. natna kai thei lo (theih loh), hrem theih loh, âwl, fihlîm. immunise, v.t. immunity, n.
(imiur), v.t. inkhârkhip, khârkhip.
(imiutabl), adj. danglam thei lo.
(impact), v.t. nghêng tlat. n. insutna, intauhna.
(impaiiti), n. sualna, thil thianghlim zahpah lohna.
(impalpabl), adj. thazâma hriat theih loh, khawiha hriat theih loh, hriat theih loh.
(impals), n. thil tihthutna, rilru let but, thatho thutna, phâwklêk thiltih.
(imparfekt), adj. fel hlel, famkim hlel.
(imparmeabl), adj. hnâm tlang thei lo, huh tlang thei lo.
(imparsawnal), adj. tu chungthu mah khawih tel lo, hmer bîk nei lo.
(imparsawneit), v.t. a lema chang, mi dang lema chang.
(imparseptibl), adj. hriat thiam theih loh, thazâma hriatna nei lo, engmah tham lo.
(imparshal), adj. hleih nei lo.
(imparshaliti), n. hleih neih lohna.
(impartababl), adj. chiai thei lo, chawh buai theih loh, phâwklêk thei lo.
(impartinent), adj. thu penhleh, chungthu kâwk lo, tênau, luhlul, chimawm, nghal.
(imparvias), adj. tâwn tlang theih loh.
(impasabl), adj. pelh theih loh, kal tlang theih loh.
(impashn), v.t. lung kuai.
(impasiv), adj. ngêng, mûk, thinlung khawih her theih loh.
(impaund), v.t. khuahkhirh, huanga khung, dân anga luah/nei.
(impawlait), adj. hawihhâwmlo, chaltlai.
(impawndarabl), adj. bûk/teh theih loh, rih chin hriat loh.
(impawrtiun), v.t. ngên, \ahawh, kar, tur hmanhmawh.
(impawstar), n. mi bum nâna mi lema changtu, mi dang anga inchhâltu.
(impawsîbl), adj. awm thei lo, ni theilo, theih loh tawp, rem hlawl lo.
(impawvarish), v.t. retheia siam, tirethei.
(impawz), v.t., v.i. tuartîr, chunga nghat, chungtlak.
(impawzishn), n. chunga nghahna, nemngheh nâna lu chunga kut nghah, phurrit, chhiah, hrem nana hna inthawhtîrna.
(impeil), v.t. dâwt, dâwt tlang, chhun hlum.
(impeir), v.t. tikiam, tinêp, tikhawlo, tina, tichau.
(impekabl), adj. sawisêl bo, thianghlim var.
(impekhiunias), adj. pawisa nei ngai lo, rethei.
(impenetrabl), adj. tâwn tlang theih loh, chhun pawh zawh loh, hriat thiam theih loh.
(imperativ), adj. thupêk nghet, loh theih loh, mâkmawh.
(imperishabl), adj. chhe thei lo, kumhlun.
(imperviabl), adj. tâwn tlang theih loh.
(impeshent), adj. nghâkhlel, tuar zo lo, dawhthei lo.
(impetas), n. thathona, fuihtu.
(impetiuas), adj. a biling a balang, che phut phut, ti thut thut, rilru let but chi. impetuosity (-tiuowsiti), impetuousness, nn.
(impias), adj. Pathian zahpah lo, sual.
(impichh), v.i. sawisêl.
(impid), v.t. tibahlah, kalh, dâl.
(impinj), v.i. nêk chêp, huang dai, khawih, tawk, delh.
(impirial), adj. lal ang, lalber thil. n. heh hnuai hmul.
(impirias), adjs. chapo, inchhuang, ngêng, thu duh.
(impiudent), adj. zakthei lo, huangtau, luhlul, \ihbai nei lo, chaltlai. impudence, n.
(impiun), v.t. sawi chhia, sawisêl, hnial kalh.
(impiuniti), n. hrem pumpelh theihna, tawrhna laka fihlîm theihna.
(impiur), adj. thianghlim lo, bawlhhlawh, zahmawh. impurity, n.
(impiut), v.t. puh, a chhe lama hmehbel, ngaihbel. imputation, n.
(implai), v.t. awmze kâwk, sawi thawi, hril.
(implakabl), adj. tlawn theih loh, rilru khawih danglam sak theih loh.
(implant), v.t. vuah, tuh, rawlh, rilrua tuh.
(implawr), v.t. ngên.
(implement), n. hnathawhna hmanrua. v.t. hlen.
(implikheit), v.t. kaihhnawih, hnamhnawih, huam tel, kâwk.
(impraimis), adv. a hmasa berin (Latin).
(impraktikabl), adj. chhawr theih loh, hman tlâk loh, tih theih loh.
(imprawbabl), adj. âwm lo, rinawm lo.
(imprawbiti), n. vertherna.
(imprawmptiu), adj., adv., n., ngaihtuah lâwk loh, tih/phuah chawp.
(imprawpar), adj. mawi lo, âwm lo, dik lo, inchawih lo.
(imprawvaiz), v.t., v.i. phuah chawp, ti chawp, fawm chawp, inbuatsaih lâwkna awm lova thu sawi or phuahchawp hla sa. improvisation, n.
(imprawvident), adj. inren lo, thuhnu dâwn lo.
(impregnabl), adj. râldeha chhut chhiat theih loh, sut chhiat theih loh, (kulh ilo) lâk theih loh.
(impregneit), v.t. raitîr, rai, zang khung, chiah, fan, rilrua fah.
(imprekheit), v.t. ânchhe lawh, \awng\aia (mi) vânduaia ngen.
(imprezâriaw, -sêriaw), n. zaipâwl company hotu.
(imprimetar), n. lehkhabu chhut phalna, phalna.
(imprizn), v.t. tântîr, khuahkhirh, hrêng.
(imprûdent), adj. fîmkhur lo, thuhnu dâwn lo, remhre lo.
(imprûv), v.t. ti\ha sauh, siam\ha. v.i. hmasâwn, \hahnem lam pan.
(impârt), v.t. pe \hen, pe, hriattîr, thu fah.
(imâm), n. Mosolman biak ina \awng\ai hruaitu upa.
(imâwleit), v.t. inthawi nâna hmang/talh, hlân.
(imâwrtel), adj. chuailopâr.

(insaisiv), adj. zai thei, ât thei, dêngkhâwng, elsên zâwng.
(insait), n. hriat tlangna, suangtuah thiamna, hmuh tlang thiamna.
(insait), v.t. tur, fuihpawrh, tithatho. incitement, n.
(insaizar), n. ha hmai.
(insalt), v.t. zahpah lo, mi beng chhun tûra thil ti, dengkhâwng taka bia, diriam, hmusit. n. inhmusitna.
(insalubrias), adj. hrisel lo.
(insanitari), adj. hrisêl lo.
(insapawrtabl), adj. tuar rual loh.
(insarekshn), n. helna. insurrectionist, n. mi hel.
(insarjent), adj. lian, so, hel. n. hotu laka hel.
(insarmauntabl), adj. hneh theih loh, ngam theih loh, hlen rual loh.
(insart), v.t. rawlh, thun, khung. n. thil rawlh/thun/belhchhah. insertion, n. rawlh luh.
(insaseptibl), adj. khawih danglam theih loh, ngêng.
(insawbraiti), n. ruihna, ruih hmanna.
(insawleit), v.t. nia pho.
(insawlent), adj. chaltlai, mi chungtlâk, tawrawt, butut. insolence, n.
(insawliubl), zawp thei lo, rêl fel theih loh.
(insawlvent), adj., n. leiba rûl thei lo, pawisa dinhmun chhia. insolvency, n.
(insawmachh), adv. chuti thleng chuan.
(insawmnia), n. muthilh theih lohna.
(insein), adj. â, â bâwrâw, âtthlâk.
(insekhiur), adj. nghet lo, râlmuang lo.
(insekt), n. rannung, nungcha.
(insektisaid), n. rannung thattu, rannung thahna hlo.
(insektivawra), n. rannung ei chi (tangkâwng, phivawk, etc.).
(insemineit), v.t. chi tuh, rai, raitîr. insemination, n.
(insendiari), n. in hâl rutu, buaina chawk punluntu. adj. kângmei lampang, buaina tizualkai chi.
(insens), v.t. tithinur. incense (insens), n. sakhaw biaknaa thil rimtui hâl chi.
(insensat), adj. tawha hriatna nei lo, rem hre lo.
(insenshent, -shient), adj. pangti chawmawlh, hriatna nei lo, nunna nei lo.
(insensibl), adj. ngaihsam, dâwngdah, hriatna nei lo, hre lo, hre thei lo, chawmawlh, khawiha hriatna nei lo. insensibility, n.
(insensitiv), adj. harhvâng lo, chhel, chawmawlh.
(insentiv), n. tithathotu. adj. chawk phûr thei.
(inseparabl), adj. kaih \hen theih loh.
(insepshn), n. \anna, bul, hawnna, \antirh.
(insesant), adj. chatlak lo, khaihlak lo, hân lo.
(inseshiabl), adj. kham thei lo, duhtâwk ngah thei lo, hrai tlai theih loh.
(insest), n. chhûngkua emaw laichîn bul hnai emaw inngaihna or inneihna (pafa, unau, etc. inngai).
(insesâwrial), adj. sava fûkna thil, fu thei.
(inshawr), adv., adj. vaukam hnaih, tuipui kam lam.
(inshrain), v.t. See enshrine.
(inshuar), v.t. chhiat tawh thulha lukhâwng nei tûra pawisa dahkham, tinghet/chiang (hetah hi chuan ensure hman a mawi zâwk). insurance, n.
(insident), adj. den, tlâk, lo awm thei, kaihhnawih. n. thil lo awm/thleng.
(insidias), adj. veh, châng ran, tihkawlawh(k) tum, bum tum.
(insinareit), v.t. hâl ral.
(insiniueit), v.t. sawi thawi, a thawia kâwk, mei neia \awng, fak derna nêna intu lût. insinuation, n. insinuative, adj.
(insinziar), adj. tlang lo, depdê.
(insipient), adj. tântîr, insiam mêk.
(insiular), adj. thliarkâr thil, tuia hual vêl, zîm, hawiher zîm.
(insiuleit), v.t. dah hrang, daidang, electric kal tlang theih lova siam.
(insiulin), n. zunthlum damdawi atâna an hman kawchhûng \hâlbe hnâng.
(insiuparable), adj. theih rual loh, zawh rual loh.
(insiviliti), n. chaltlaina, mi zahpah lohna.
(insizhn), n. zai pem, zai kak.
(inskhraib), v.t. ker, ziak, ziak lût. inscription, n.
(inskhrutabl), adj. hriat thiam theih loh, fiah theih loh, hriat thiam har.
(inspair), v.t. tithatho, chawk phûr, hâm, chhêm, thâwk khum. v.i. thaw.
(inspekt), v.t. endik. inspection, n.
(inspireshn), n. phûrna, thlarau thila thathona, thaw.
(instans), n. sawi hmâwrhmuhna, entîrna, tehkhinna, hmanhmawhna. v.t. entîr nâna hmang.
(instantenias), adj. rang, chawplehchilh, nghâl.
(instawl), v.t. bun, luahtîr, din. installation, n. bunna, khâwl bun.
(instawlment), n. tlêm tlêma pawisa ilo pûk/rulhna, a \hen \hena thawnthu ilo chhuah.
(insted), adv. aiah.
(instigeit), v.t. tur, fuihpawrh.
(instingkt), n. pianpui finna, rilru pianken, inzirtîr ngai lova thil hriat theihna (ramsa thil hriatna ang - hnute hnêk, bu chheh dân, fuan sum zawn, etc.).
(instingkt), n. tlat-ho châkna, a huhova khawsak duhna.
(institiut), v.t. din, siam, tichhuak. n. thil zirna hmun, dân, mi thiam inzawm khâwmna pâwl.
(instrakt), v.t. zirtîr, hriattîr, thu pe, tihtîr.
(instrument), n. hmanrua, hla sakna hmanrua, thuthlung ziak.
(insubawrdinat), adj. thu âwih lo, hel. insubordination, n.
(intakt), adj. pumhlûm, him pial, khawih loh, tawh danglam loh.
(intanjibl), adj. rilrua man theih loh, khawiha hriat theih loh. intangibleness, intangibility, nn.
(intarakt), v.i. inkhawih tawn, thawk tawn. interaction, n. inkhawih tawnna.
(intarapt), v.t. tikhaihlak, chawk buai, tibahlah, dâl. interruption, n.
(intarchheinj), v.t., v.i. inpe tawn, inthleng, kârthlâk. n. inthlengna, kârthlâkna. interchangeable, adj. inthleng theih.
(intardikt), v.t. dân nena khap, khap sak, phal loh sak. interdiction, n.
(intardipendens), n. inrinchhan tawnna, inrin tawnna.
(intarest), n. ham\hatna, hlâwkna, pawisaa a pung awm, pung, ngaihsakna, ngaihvenna, bengkhawnna, ngaihsak zâwng, lungkham, hmakhua. v.t. mit la, ngaihsaktîr. interesting, adj. ngaihnawm, hmuhnawm.
(intarfiar), v.t. dîpdâl, khawih buai, inrawlh. interference, n.
(intarilêshn), n. inkûngkaihna.
(intarim), n. kârlak, inkâr chhûng, chutih hun chhûng. adj. chhûngin, kârah.
(intarjekt), v.t. inrawlh, mi thusawi laia uar taka \awngkam lo rawlh thut.
(intarkhawmiun), v.i. inkâwm tlâng.
(intarkhawrs), n. inzawmna, inkawmna, indâwr tawnna, sumdâwnna. sexual intercourse, n. hmeichhia leh mipa inpâwlna.
(intarlain), v.t. rîn inkâra rawlh/ziak.
(intarlawk), v.t., v.i. hmer khâwm, kilh kawp, kalh.
(intarlawkhiushn), n. inbiakhona, inkhâwmna.
(intarlawpar), n. inrawlhtu.
(intarleis), v.t., v.i. invêt hnawk, chingchivêt, tah, phiar.
(intarlingk), v.t., v.i. inbât.
(intarliud), n. kârlak, a kâra zeh, kâr, ennawm chhuah chawlh lâwk kâra hla sak leh thil dang tih.
(intarlunar), adj. thla mang lai.
(intarmari), v.i. inneih pawlh.
(intarmedzaw, -metsaw), n. ennawm chhuah kârlaka hla sak leh thil dang tihna, rimawi hla saka hla chhe khat.
(intarmidiari), adj., n. mi kâra tla, palai, laihâwl.
(intarmidiat), adj. a laihâwl, kâra tla.
(intarmiks), v.t., v.i. chawhpawlh.
(intarminabl), adj. tâwp nei lo, chin nei lo, ninawm khawpa sei.
(intarmingl), v.t., v.i. inpawlhsawp, fin.
(intarnisain), adj. hlauhawm, thihna thil, a tu ve ve tân pawha chhiatna tûr.
(intarpawleit), v.t. lehkhabu leh mi thu ziak ilova mahni thu phuahchawp belhchhah, zep, telh, rawlh.
(intarpawz), v.t. kâra zep, rawlh, mi thu sawi laia \awngkam lo rawlh, rawlh buai. v.i. inrawlh, a laia tla, palai, chawk buai. interposal, n.
(intarpeleshn), n. inhnialna hmuna zawhna siam.
(intarpenetreit), v.t. su tlang, inhawlh tlang tawn.
(intarplei), n. inkhawih tawnna, sawhkhâwk tawnna.
(intarpret), v.t. awmze sawi fiah, \awng let, mahni ngaihdân anga thil ze hril.
(intarsekt), v.t. tan tlang, inkawkalh, tan chhum. intersection, n.
(intarseliular), adj. pangti mûr kâra mi.
(intarsept), v.i. dang chat, dâl, lambuna chhuh.
(intarspars), v.i. dah darh. interspersion, n.
(intarstelar), adj. arsi leh arsi inkâr thil.
(intarstis), n. thil awm khâwm leh dah tlar inkâr âwng, thil inkâr chêp tak.
(intarsîd), v.i. remna siam sak tum, thu lai vua, dîl sak.
(intartaidal), adj. tui chîm sân leh hniam inkâra chêng.
(intartuain), v.t., v.i. chingchivet, herh, inkherh, inzem.
(intaruiv), v.i., v.t. hrual/tah belhbawm, inpawlh, invet.
(intarval), chawlh kar, inkar, chawlh lawk.
(intarviu), n. inbe tûra inhmuhna, hna dîlnaa mahni inlanna, chanchin bua mi thusawi chhuah tuma anmahni va kawmna.
(intarvîn), v.i. a kâra tla, inrawlh. intervention, n.
(intawd), adj. kezungpui tin tlum.
(intawksikheit), v.t. tirui.
(intawlarabl), adj. tuar rual loh.
(intawneit), v.t., v.i. chham, hla hril, hla chham.
(integiument), n. vun/râng tuamtu.
(integriti), n. kimna, pumna, dikna, thianghlimna, felna.
(inteik), n. ram leilet atâna siam thar, boruak siakna dâwt, thil lâk luhna, phiar zuih.
(intelekchiual), adj. fing, finna thil, hre thiam,.n. mi fing, mi thiam.

(intelijent), adj. fing, rilru chak. intelligence, n. finna, chanchin inthawn, thlarau mi. intelligence department, sawrkâr leh sipai pâwl ilova hmêlma lam chanchin vaitu pâwl. intelligence quotient (..kuawshent), upat ang hua pianpui finna ngah dân tehkhâwng. intelligence test, thiamna leh finna endik nâna zawhna siam.
(intemparans), n. tisa nawmna kawnga insûm zawh lohna, zu heh luat tukna.
(intens), adj. nasa tak, urhsûn tak, vei tak.
(internanshiaw), n. palai, rorêlna hmuna Pope aiawh.
(interrawgeit), v.t. zâwt, dawp.
(interseshn), n. dîl sakna, remna siamna.
(intestin), (a lam dân hi fîmkhur tûr), n. rîl. intestinal (-tinal, -tainal), adj.
(intigreit), v.t. tipum.
(intijar), n. a pum, nambar them ni lo. integral (integral), adj.
(intilekt), n. hriatna, finna, chhia leh \ha hriatna, ngaihtuahna.
(intimasi), n. innêlna, inpâwlna.
(intimat), adj. lairil, chhûngril, inhnaih, innêl, mahni mi mal thil. n. thian.
(intimeit), v.t. sawi thawi, hriattîr, puang.
(intimideit), v.t. tihlau, vau, tih\haih. intimidation, n.
(intirîawr), adj., n. chhûngril zâwk, chhûng, ram chhûngril/lairil, inchhûnga ram lem. Interior, n. sawrkâra tualchhûng ngaihtuahtu pâwl.
(intiuishn), n. mahni pianpui rilrua thil awmze hmuh tlang thiamna, Chhûra ûmpui mu hriatna, ngaihtuah buai ngai lova thil hriatthiam theihna. intuitional, adj. intuitive, adj.
(intraktabl), adj. thunun zawh loh, luhlul.
(intransijent, -zijent), adj. hrethiam duh lo, inrem duh lo.
(intransitiv), adj. kawh bîk nei lo.
(intravinas), adj. thazâm chhûngah.
(intrawdius), v.t. chîng chhuak, hmelhriattîr, rawlh, vuah, thuhmahruai siam.
(intrawmit), v.t. rawlh.
(intrawspekt), v.i. chhûng lam bih. n. chhûng lam bihna, mahni rilru awm dân thlîrna.
(intrawvart), v.t. lipse (lepse), chhûng lama let. n. mahni inngaihtuah mi, mahni rilru chauhva chêng mi, mi rual pâwl lo.
(intrepid), adj. hlauhna nei lo, zâm lo, huaisen.
(intrikhat), adj. chipchiar, hnawk, chingchivêt nuk. intricacy, n.
(intrinsik), intrinsical, adjs. chhûng lam, kalpui, ziaa intuh, pawimawh.
(intruzhn), n. luh luihna, inrawlh luihna.
(intrîk), n. phiarrûkna, inngaih rûkna. v.i. inphiarru. v.t. a ngaihna tihre lo, mak tihtîr.
(intrûd), v.t., v.i. mahni inrawlh, sâwm lohva lût ve, lût lui.
(intuain), v.t. See entwine.
(invaiawlabl), adj. tihhmingchhiat loh chi, bawhchhiat loh chi.
(invaiawleit, invaiawlit), inviolated, adjs. bawhchhiat loh, tihchhiat loh, thianghlim, him.
(invait), v.t. sâwm, mi lêm.
(invaliuabl), adj. hlu lutuk.
(invalnarabl), adj. hliam theih loh.
(invars), adj., n. a letling zâwng, a lêt zâwng, a kalh zâwng.
(invawis), n. bungraw thawn kalpuitu lehkha, bungraw thawn man leh thawn zât inhrilhna lehkha.
(invawkeshn), n. \awng\aia kohna, biakna. \awng\aia koh dân.
(invawlantari), adj. tumna tel lova tih, tihpalh, tihluih, mahni thu lova tih, hreh chunga tih.
(invawliut, invawlût), adj. chhûng lama kuai lût.
(invawlv), v.t. zial, kaihhnawih, kângkai, kalpui, inhnamhnawih, inrawlh.
(invei), v.i. hau, khak, ân khum.
(inveid), v.t. rûn, chîl, suam.
(invektiv), n. inhauhna, ân hlâwkna, inân khumna. adj. ânchhhe lam, inhauhna thil.
(inventawri), n. ro sum ziah chhuahna, in-leh-lova thil awm zawng zawng ziah chhuahna.
(invert), v.t. khaikhup, letling, zangthal.
(invertebrat), adj., n. zâng ruh nei lo, ramsa zâng ruh leh lu ruh nei lo.
(investigeit), v.t. chîk, endik, en thlîthlai. investigation, n.
(inveterat), adj. chîng dawklak tawh, chawlawl, nghet.
(invidias) adj. huatthu sawi thei chi, a lutuka thleithlâk.
(invigawreit), v.t. chakna pe, tithatho, tiharh.
(invigileit), v.t., v.i. vil, exam-na vil.
(invinsibl), adj. tlawm thei lo, hneh theih loh, ngam rual loh.
(invitêshn), n. sâwmna.
(invizibl), adj. hmuh theih loh, lang lo. invisibility, n.
(invâwk), \awng\aia bia, ngên, \anpuina dîl, dawi hla chham phuala ngên, \anfung atâna ruai/hmang.
(invêriabl), adj. danglam thei lo, ngai reng.
(invêzhn), n. inrûnna.
(invîgl, invêgl), v.t. vehthlêm, ngamthlêm, bum. inveiglement, n.
(inêlienabl), adv. dah hran theih loh, lâk sawn loh chi.
(inîk), adj. danglam bîk, tlukpui nei lo, mal, fal, fawr, mak, chungchuang.
(ipsaw faktaw), chu avâng tak chuan (Latin \awng).
(iradikheit, eradikheit), v.t. nuai bo, timang. eradication, n.
(irapshn), n. puak chhuak, thil darh thut, inrûn thutna.
(irapt, erapt), v.i. puak chhuak, bawl chhuak, irh chhuak.
(irashawnal), adj. âwihawm lo, ang lo, âwm lo.
(irawd, erawd), v.t. ei chhia.
(irawzhan), n. ei chhiatna, ei or nawh ralna.
(irebawkabl), adj. koh kîr theih loh, tihdanglam theih loh, sût theih loh.
(iredieit), v.t., v.i. êng zunga kâp, êng.
(irefiutabl), adj. hnial thlâk rual loh.
(iregiular), adj. dân ang lo, rual lo, sipai ni si dân anga sipai hna zir lo.
(ireiz, ereiz, ireis), v.t. nuai bo, tichhia, thai chhia. eraser, n. nuai botu, nawh rehna.
(irekawnsailabl), adj. inrempui theih rual loh, kawm ngeih rual loh.
(irekt, erekt), v.t. din, tung ngîl, sa. adj. kawh, char, ngîl, tung.
(irelivant), adj. chiang lo, kâwk lo, awmze nei lo, hmûr lo. irrelevance, irrelevancy, nn.
(ireparabl), adj. siam \hat theih loh, thawm \hat rual loh.
(irevarent), adj. zahpah lo. irreverence, n.
(iridiusibl), adj. tihtlêm theih loh.
(iridîmabl), adj. tlan theih loh, beisei bo.
(irigeit), v.i. ram leilung tuia châwm, tui kawng nêna thlawhhma châwm.
(irikhavarabl), adj. chhar leh rual loh, dam chhuak thei lo.
(irikhleimabl), adj. chhanchuah theih loh, lak kîr theih loh, siam \hat theih loh.
(irilijas), adj. sakhaw mi lo, Pathian thu awih lo.
(irimûvabl), adj. dah sawn theih loh, tawh chêt rual loh.
(iripleisibl), adj. ngai awhtîr theih loh, tihkim leh rual loh.
(iriprawchhabl), adj. sawisêl phâk loh, sawisêl bo.
(iripresibl), adj. chelh rual loh, sûm zawh loh, tuk dawl rual loh.
(irispawnsibl), adj. pawisak nei lo, dâwn tawi.
(irispektiv), adj. pawisa lo, thliar chuang lo.
(iriteit), v.t. tiza, tithak, tithinur, tisa huai huai.
(iritrivabl), adj. chhar leh rual loh, phuhrûk rual loh.
(irivarsibl), adj. lêt theih loh, sût theih loh.
(irizawlût, -zawliut), adj. tum nghet lo, tum mumal lo, tîm.
(irizistabl), adj. chelh rual loh, nêp rual loh.
(irêdieit), v.t. tiêng, êng zunga kâp, tihlim.

(ishu, ishiu, isiu), n. thil luang chhuak, thil sem chhuah, thil pût chhuak, thlah, fa, a rah, thil siam chhuah, lehkhabu chhuah, a tâwpa a nihna, inhnialna thupui, thil ngaihtuah fel tûr. v.i. pût chhuak, luang chhuak. v.t. sem chhuak, thawn chhuak.
(ism), n. tel lohna, tel lohna chin.
(ismas, isthmas), n. tuipuia khawmual inkhawh lûta a ram rêk lai.
(istar), n. Isua Thawhleh Ni.
(italik), n., adj. hawrawp âwn chi.
(itareit), v.t. tinawn, sawi nawn. iteration, n. nawnna.
(ithar), n. See ether.
(iu), n. berâm nu.
(iu), n. fâr chi khat.
(iu), pron. i, nang, che, u.
(iuar), n. no tunga thlitna tlâng arh or dâwt hrawl tak nei.
(iubâwt), n. German tui hnuai indo lawng.
(iufawni), n. ri mawi, awka ngaihno bei.
(iufawniam), n. bass tawtawrâwt thlâwptu tenor tawtawrâwt.
(iufemizm), n. \awnghmang thiamna nêna a thukhuh zâwnga thil pawi leh runthlâk sawina, \awnghmang thiam taka thukhuhna, a elsen zâwnga thukhuh. euphemise, v.t. euphemistic, adj.
(iufâwria), euphory (-ri), nn. hlim ruihna, engthâwlna.
(iuifawrm), adj. inang, ngai reng, rual. n. thawmhnaw inang tlâng.
(iujenik), adj. eugenics thil.
(iukalele), n. \ing\ang (guiter) tê chi.
(iukharist), n. Lalpa Zanriaha chhang leh uain sakrament.
(iukheis), n. Russia lalber thupêk, thupêk, dân.
(iulawjais), v.t. fak.
(iulawji), eulogium (iulojiam), nn. fakna.
(iunait), v.t. pumkhata siam, zawm. v.i. inpumkhat, belhbawm, inzawm.
(iunak), n. tilreh.
(iunian), n. inzawmna, inpumkhatna, inremna, inneihna, pâwl.
(iunifai), v.t. pakhata siam, thuhmuna siam.
(iunikhawrn), n. thawnthua sakawr hmuia ki nei.
(iunilateral), adj. sîr khat chauh, lam khat chauh thil.
(iuniseliular), adj. timûr pakhat chauh nei.
(iunisn), n. a ruala sakna, awm rual, inremna.
(iunit), n. pakhat, hlâwm khat, pa (pa, sawm, za, etc.), pâwl pêng khat.
(iuniterian), n. Pathian pakhata mi pathum (Pa, Fapa leh Thlarau Thianghlim) awm ring lova Pa chauh hi Pathian a nih ringtu.
(iuniti), n. impumkhatna, inzawmna, inremna, pakhat.
(iunivars), adj. n. thil siam zawng zawng (lei leh van), khawvêl pum pui.

(iur), pron. i ta. yours (iurz), pron. i ta.
(iurawpian, iurapian), adj., n. Sâp ram thil leh mihring.
(iurezhan, -zhian, -shan), adj., n. Europe leh Asia (ram, hnam) inkâra mi.
(iurin), n. zun. urinal, n. zun in, zun bûr. urinate (-neit), v.i. zung.

(iutâwpian), adj. duhthusâm. n. thil theih loh sâm mi.

(jackdaw), n. choâk chi khat.

(jagarnawt), n. mihring tihchhiat tum reng thil, mihring biakna leh inthawina dawng si sakhaw mi tichhetu.

(jargan), n. riat nawk nawkna, \awng lêr, \awng mumal lo, pâwl \henkhat \awng bungraw hman hran bîk (Motor siamtu pâwl chuan a thawmhnaw chi hrang hrang hming tualleng lo tak tak an chelek ang, chu chu a jargon a ni).
(jarnal), n. nitin chanchin ziahna chanchinbu.
(jarni), n. kawngkal, zin vahna. v.i. zin.

(jasmin), n. hnim buk chi khat, pâr rimtui tak.

(javlin, javelin), n. fei zâng chi.

(jawnt, jânt), v.i., vâk vêl, zin vâk. n. zin vahna, ram fanna.

(jeneralisimaw), n. sipai hotu ber.
(jeneras), adj. thilphal, \hahnem.
(jenereit), v.t. siam, tinung, awmtîr, nunna pe, din, hring chhuak.
(jenesis), n. bul, din or insiam \anna, pian \anna. Genesis, n. Bible bu khatna.
(jeni), n. thingtlâng nula, tuai, chhimbuk nu, hmui, la kaihna khâwl.
(jeniuflekt), v.i. chibai bûk nâna \hing\hit zauh (Katholik biak ina lût leh chhuakte tih dân ang hi).

(jentail), n. Juda hnam ni ve lo tawh phawt chu, jentail.

(jeremaiad), n. lung chhiatna, thawnthu runthlâk.

(jestiar, jeschhar), n. mahni rilru lantîr nâna zaizir, inzahderna thiltih.
(jestêshn), n. no pai, nau pai. gestation period, no/nau pai chhûng/chen.
(jeti), n. lawng chuan kaina ilo atâna tuia sawngka dawn.

(jeziuit), n. kohhrana puithiam pâwl chi khat (Society of Jesus-a mi).

(jim khraw), n. Negro hnam sawina, Negro hnam hming.
(jimkhâna), n. vântlâng insawizawi zirna hmun.
(jimnêziam), n. insawizawina hmun.
(jin), [singular a nih chuan (jinne, jinni, djinni, genie)], n. hmasâng Mosolman thawnthua ramhuai, phûng.
(jin), n. Sâp zu chi khat. gin (jin), n. thang, tlâkhawlh, herâwt.
(jin), n. chia pianphung leh ze inthlah chhâwnna.
(jin, jên), n. malkalh leh bawhtah inpawlh ang deuhva tah puan.
(jinggaw), n. mahni ram leh hnam \an hlur mi.
(jinggl), n., v.t., v.i. ri tleng tleng, ri ral ral, ri chheng cheng.
(jinial), adj. nêlawm, kawm nuam, zaidam, ngilnei, khawngaih thei, hrisêl.

(jinjarli), adv. dîm têin, fimkhur takin.
(jipsam), n. chinai leh kât inpawlh lam chi (lei tih\hatna siam nâna an hman).
(jiraf), n. Africa ramsa chi khat râng rek ruk, nghâwng sei deuh mai (sa azawnga sa khân sâng ber), sa nghâwng sâng, sa ring sei.
(jist), n. a thupui ber, a lairil, a bulpui.
(jitar), v.i. helhhawlh, phâwklêk, awm ngaihna hre lo. jittery, adj.
(jizas), n. Isua, Jesus (jiziu), Isu, (Hebrai \awng chuan Yeshua, 'Jieshiua' tih ang deuhva lam rîk, 'Yehoshua' kaihtawi, 'Joshua' tihna).
(josl), v.t., v.i., n. nghawk, nghawng, nâwk, tauh che dawt.
(ju), n. Juda, mi kawm, Jewish, adj.
(jubilant), adj. lâwma au, hnehnaa lâwm, lâwm.
(jubili), n. (Juda hnam zîngah chuan) kum sawmnga bia lawmna kût ni nghah (an bawihte an chhuahin, leibate an ngaidam \hîn a ni), hlimna ni rêng rêng.
(judikachiar), n. thubuai rêl theihna, roreltu hna, rorel pâwl, rorel khâwl, rorelna hmun.
(judishas), adj. hmangchang hria, remhria, rilru fim.
(juel), n. lunghlu, incheina, thil hlu (\hi, ngun, zungbun, etc.), thil hlu rêng rêng.
(juk bawks), n. a kuaa pawisa thlâka thingremzâithei zâi tir chi.
(jul, jaul), n. electric tha chak lam tehna.
(jungket), n. phairuang fawng, hmawmsawm, hlimhlawp, ruai.

(juri), n. Juda thil, Juda ho awm hranna veng.
(just, jaust), n. hmasâng thîr leh dâr kawr hman hun laia sakawr chungchuanga fei nena pasal\ha (knights) inbeihna, fei nena insual/infiam.
(juvenesent), adj. naupang \an (leh).
(juvinail), adj. naupang.
(jâr), v.i. a bengkhawrh zâwnga ri, chher, \eng. v.t. tichher, nghawr. jar, n. hlum leh darthlalang ilova siam no tung rawng zau.
(jâwna), n. mi mawlhtu, vânduaina thlentu, lawng kehna thlentu.
(jê), n. choâk te chi, mi kamtam.
(jîawdesi), n. lei teh vêlna.
(jîawfaji), n. lei ei chînna.
(jîawgrafi), n. lei chunglâng leh a chunga thil awm zawng zawng chanchin chhuina/zirna, chutiang zirna bu chu.
(jîawlawji), n. lei chunglâng insiam dân chhuina, leilung chanchin zirna.

(jîman), n. America enthlatu police pâwl (FBI)-a thawk, thil tisual chhui rutu pâwla mi (Government man kaihtawi).
(jînas), n. chi khat, thlah khat, rual khat, pâwl khat, ho khat. genera, pl.
(jînias), n. pianpui finna sâng tak, mi fing, chem kalna zâwng, ramhuai. Finna lam sawina a nih chuan a plural chu geniuses (jîniases), ramhuai lam sawina a nih chuan genii (jîniai).
(jûdas), n. mi phatsantu.
(jûdishal), adj. rorêlna lam thil, rorêlna chungchâng, chîk taka chhui.
(jûdishari, -shiari), adj., n. roreltu leh rorêlna chungchâng, rorêltuho, rorêl dân hmang.
(jûjû), n. ramhuai biak, ai nei thil.
(jûlep), n. tui thlum, zu thlum.
(jûlian), adj. Julias Kaisara hun lai thil.
(jûniar), adj. n. naupang zâwk, tuai zâwk.
(jûnipar), n. hnim buk chi khat.
(jûpitar), n. hmasâng Rom-ho pathian lalber, ni heltu, planet zînga a hrawl ber (Hrangchhuana).

(jûridikal), adj. rorêlna lam thil, rorêltu chungthu, rorêl dân.

(jûrisdikshn), n. thu neih zau lam, thu neih phâk chin.
(jûrisprudens), n. rorel dân chhuina, dân zirna.
(jûrist), n. dân hre mi.
(jûs), n. tui, tuihnâng, hnai, tuisawr.
(jût), n. buara hrui kung, ziza kung.
(ka-, keliks), n. pangpâr hnûna a tuamtu, a kuhmûm tuamtu.

(kadavaras), adj. ruang ang mai, mi chêr, mi dawldâng.

(kafê), n. thingpui dâwr, hotel.
(kaiak), n. Eskimo hnam savun lawnglêng.
(kaib), n. chât.
(kail), sa chek vâra a tuihnâng vâr.

(kairawpawdist), n. singsihlît ilo tidamtu dâktawr.
(kait), n. mu, lehkhachaih.
(kaizar), n. German emperor (lalber).
(kaj), v.t. and v.i. chaw khawn, kutdawh, fakdera tlawn.
(kaji), adj. leplêr, awmhlei.
(kajâwl), v.t. nawr, tur, thlêm, bumna nêna thlêm thlu.

(kawi), adj. zakzum.
