(pâf), v.i. pak, phuh/thaw chhuak, thaw hlawp hlawp. v.t. pak chhuak, hâm puar, a leh a lua a fak. n. thaw, thâwk, powder hnawihna.
(pâi), n. thei chhang ur.
(pâm), n. kutphah, tûm leh meihle chi rêng rêng (ku-va, thang\ung, etc. tiamin), hnehna leh lâwmna entîr nâna tûmkau chawi. v.t. kutphaha thukru, chûl.
(pâmar), n. Ram Thianghlim tlawhtu khualzin.
(pâmist), n. kutze en thiam.
(pâr ekselâw), adj. chungnung ber, chungchuang, \ha ber.
(pâr), n. intlukna, dân pangngai, a vântlâng, a chen.
(pârdn), v.t. ngaidam. n. ngaihdamna.
(pârsl), n. hmanraw pawimawh lai, peng, them, pêng, rual, ho, thil fûn (parsal). v.t. fûn, sem darh.

(pâs), v.t., v.i. pêl, kal pêl, kal tlang, hlân chhâwng, thil danga ngaih, thi, tling, lo awm, thleng, vit, chhun, rawng, thlang lo, kal kân, khawhral. n. kal khân, phalna lehkha, inpêk chhâwnna, kut hawi, thlemna hlawhtlinna. pass the buck, mi kova mawhphurhna hlân.
(pâsnê), n. hnâr ngula bah tân chi tarmit.
(pâth), n. kalkawng, zawh lam.
(pâwk), v.t. hawlh. v.i. hnâr lên, mit lên, inrawlh, lawr. poke one's nose, mi chungchânga inrawlh.
(pâwl), n. chhim tâwp, hmâr tâwp, thîrhîpthei hmâwr, electric hrui hmâwr, thing tlâwn, thing ngul, tehna yards nga leh a chanve a sei. Pole, n. Poland hnam mi.
(pâwl), n. lu, sam, mi mal, thlangtu hming ziahna, inthlanna, thlangtu zât, vaki. v.t. ki tan, sam tan, thlang (vote pe), hlawi.
(pâwlar), adj. chhim tâwp leh hmar tâwp chungchâng.
(pâwlish), n. Poland mi, Poland \awng. polish (pawlis), v.t. nâwt tle, tuaihnûm. n. tlêtna, hnîmna, nawh tlêt, pheikhawk siai, awm dân mawi.
(pâwlâw), n. tiangkawm nêna sakawr chungchuanga inkhelhna.
(pâwshn), n. thil in, damdawi tui emaw tûr emaw ei khat.
(pê-, patent), adj. lang sa, hriat sa, vântlâng enfiah theih, \awi, hauh bîk. n. (patent) thil thiam thar hauh bîk theihna.
(pê-, patrawnij),n. duhsak tute \anpuina, mithianghlimte vên himna.
(pê-, patriawtik), n. mahni ram leh hnam tâna hmangai. patriotism, n.
(pêdrê), n. Katholik puithiam (father), sipai pâwl pastor rawih.
(pêgan), n., adj. Pathian thu awih lo, ramhuai bia.
(pêpal), adj. pope chungchâng.
(pêpasi), n. pope dinhmun, pope chanvo, pope rorêl.
(pêpist), n. pope lam \ang, diriam nâna Katholik mi sawina.
(pêr), n. pêr thei.
(pêrent), n. nu leh pa, tichhuaktu, hringtu, thlahtu.
(pêshens), n. dawhtheihna, lehkhadena mi mal intlarna.
(pêtar), n. pa.
(pêthaws), n. khawngaihthlâkna, lung kuaitu.
(pêtriark), n. chhûngkaw pa ber, hnam thlahtu, kohhran hotu ber, putar zahawm.
(pêtriawt), n. mahni ram hmangaihtu.
(pîchh), n. theitê. v.t. \hiante hêk.
(pîk), n. huatthu chhiatna, ngaihhuatna. v.t. ngêng chhun, tilungni lo, chawk tho, uanpui, chhuang.
(pîk), n. tlâng chhîp, chhîp zum, tawng sân lai ber, hâw vânglai, lukhum hma parh nei, tlai lam lukhum. v.i. \eu, ngui, rawih.
(pîkant), adj. thak, tui, hiar, mit la, rilru kuai.
(pîkawk), n. ârâwn.
(pîkiniz), Pekingese (pikingiz), nn. China ram chhuak ui hmui tawi.
(pînal), adj. hremna kalpui chi (a lam rîk dân hi fimkhur tûr).
(pînis), n. zang.
(pîp), v.i. chiap. peep (pip), v.i. bih, âwnga bih, bihthla, lang \an dêt dêt. n. bihthlâkna, en zauh, lan \anna.
(pîs), n. remna, muanna, thlamuanna.
(pîs), n. them, thân (puanthân, etc.), chhumbung, thu leh hla phuah, silai, intlarnaa sa. v.t. rem khâwm. a piece of one's mind, mi kamkhat, inkamkhatna.
(pîs), v.i. zung (zun zung).
(pît), n. thing leh hnim \awih khawro tawh, dûma thil \awih.
(pîtar), v.i. zûzi, thâmral.
(pîvish), adj. huaibâk, nuar, tûm, \eu.
(pûdl), n. ui hmul sei chi.
(pûl), n. dîl tê, thil thawh khâwm, li. v.t. thawh khâwm.
(pûl), v.t. hnûk, pawt, hîp, phawi. n. hnuh, pawh, kaih.
(rab), v.t. nâwt, tuai, hru, zût.
(rabar), n. \helrêt, nawhreh, infiamnaa thawh thum or thawh ngaa chak zâwkna.
(rabelêzian), adj. nuihza leh zahmawh rawng kai.
(rabi, -bai), n. Juda dân zirtîrtu.
(rabid), adj. da tak, thurin rûi, ui â seh.
(rabikand), adj. tisen ngah, sâr, tai.
(rabish), n. hnâwmhnawk, bawlhhlawh.
(rabit), n. sazupui, zupui, mi dawihzep.
(rabl) n. mipui sâhâwk, a sakechek.
(rabl), n. lung nawi, in rawp nawi, lung chher loh.
(rabîz, rabiiz), n. ui â hri, ui â seh vânga natna.
(rader), n. lawng leh thlawhna khalh kawina.
(radi), adj. tisen ngah, sâr, tai.
(radikal, -kal), adj. bul, zung, zung a\anga chawr. n. ram rorêl tihdanglam duh mi, zung.
(radikl), n. zung te tak tê, thil chi \iak tûra a saingho lai (a zunga chang tûr).
(radiks), n. zung, thu \o bul.
(radio) herh mil.
(raf), adj. bumboh, \i\oh, thap, buluk, nungchang mawi lo.
(raf), n. kawr nghâwng arh, nghâwng fêp parh.
(rafian), n. mi tawrawt, mi rura, mi butut.
(rafifai, reri-), v.t., v.i tipan, pan.
(rafl), n. chi\ha vawrna, \hum vâwr.
(rafl), v.t. chûl pawr, tithur, tihnawk, chawk buai. v.i. pheng.
(rafter), n. inchhun.
(rag), n. zâmpher, chhuat phah, puanthuah têlna puan.
(ragamafin), n. kawr chhia inbel mipa \awp tak.
(ragbi), n. football khêl chi khat (ball pawm âwihna).
(ragid), adj. bumboh, \i\oh, chhel, fei.
(ragtaim), n. hla vuak rang.
(rai), adj. sâwi, herh, hmai thuar, hmêl dur, \hen.
(raiawt), n. India lo nei mi.
(raiawt), n. intihbuaina, intualvuakna.
(raiawtas), adj. buai nuai nuai.
(raid), v.i., v.t. chuang, khalh.
(raidh), v.i. and v.i. herh, vial.
(raif), adj. lêng, tuallêng.
(raifl), v.t. suasam, rawk, a herh zâwnga rin. n. silai kawherh.
(raih), n. German ram inpumkhat lai. Reichstag (raihstah), n. German sawrkar rorêlna in.
(rail), v.t. tithinur, chhaih kawlh.
(raim), n. rhyme spelling chi khat, vûra dai khalh.
(rainal), adj. hûar lam thil.
(rainawseras), n. samak.
(raind), n. hâwng, pîl.
(raip), adj. hmin, \uah, puitling, \hankin. ripen, v.t., v.i. tihmin, hmin mek, hmin.
(raipêrian), adj. luikama chêng.
(rais), n. buhfai, buh.
(rait), adj. dik, ngîl, \ha, tâwk, ding lam. adv. chiah, nghâl, dik takin. n. ding, thudik, chanpual dik tak. v.t tidik, tingîl. v.i. ding ngîl. right-oh! interj. nia mawle.
(rait), n. puithu taka sakhaw rawngbâwlna, urhsûn taka serhna.
(rait), n. siamtu.
(rait), v.t. and v.i. ziak, phuah, lehkha thawn.
(raitias, raichas), adj. dik, ngîl, fel. righteousness, n. dikna, felna.
(raiv), v.t. pawtthlêr, tiphel, tikeh.
(raival), n. khingtu, elna, elpui. adj. inelna thil. v.t. el, el pha.
(raiz), v.i. tho, nung leh, so sâng, chho, lâng, kâwla chhuak, kai sâng. n. hlawh punna, sân lam panna, lo \an chhuahna.
(rak), n. chhuar, thing aichheh, mi chekhnawk.
(rakawtar), n. thawnthu sawi mi.
(rakûn), n. savawm ang deuh America ram ramsa.
(rali), v.t. ko khâwm leh, hruai khâwm. v.i. inhâwr khâwm, tha tho thar leh, \hahnem leh deuh. n. inkoh khâwmna, chatlak lova insâi tawnna.
(ram), n. kurtai a\anga siam Sâp zu, ram.
(rambl), v.i. lêngvâk, vâk vel, chiangkuang lo. n. lênvah, lênlâm.
(rambl), v.i., n. ri dur dur.
(ramifai), v.t. and v.i. \ai darh, pêng darh.
(ramij), v.t., n. zawng chiam, zawnga hai darh seuh.
(rammi), n. lehkhaden chi khat.
(ramp), n. ran leh ramsa kâwng bâwr, mei ruh bâwr, ngûm.
(rampas), n. buai hukna.
(rampl), n. chuar. v.t. tichuar.
(ramshakl), adj. rawp, rawih.

(ran), v.i. tlân, tlânchhia, pût, thawk, luang, darh, thlan tûra inpe, inphah, (puan ilo rawng) kal. v.t. tlântîr, chhun, hawlh, enkawl. n. tlân, thil inzam, dân pângngai, zunghrual, cricket khêla vawi khat tlân chhuah, âr tlatna huang.
(ranageit), n. mi vâkvai.
(randam), n. and adj. a kahpah, tawngtaw tih, a palh.
(randivu, rawn-), n. intawhna hmun atâna ruat sa, kal khâwmna hmun. v.i. hmun tiam saa intâwk.
(rang), n. leilâwn rahka.
(rang), pa.t. and pa.p. of wring, hmerh, herh, \huai, sâwr.
(ranggl), v.i. inhnial, inhau.
(rangk), n. tlar, sipai tlar, dinhmun sân lam, hmun sâng. v.t. tlar, dinhmun pe. v.i. hmun luah, thlei. adj. lutuk, sual, let tawp, hnim hnawk. ranks, sipai satliah.
(rangkar), n. huatthu chhiatna, inghirnghona, inhmelmâkna kulmût.
(rangkl), v.i tawrhhlelhawm, pûn, \hoh.
(ranl), n. lui tê, luikawr,
(ransam), n. tlanna. v.t. tlan.
(ransid), adj. rim ngher nei, tler.
(rant), n. bâwng fek, thil pisil, pârva thlah, thingbûl, zîkhlûm kung.
(rap), v.t. fûn, tuam.
(rapar), n. kawngkhâr kikna fung.
(rapawr), n. inlaichinna, lung rualna.
(rapchar), n. nuam lutuk tawrhna, hlimna tâwpkhâwk. rapturous (-charas), adj. nuam.
(rapchar, rapchiar), n. kehchhiatna, keh, thlêr, khi chat, inrem lohna.
(rapeshas), adj. suamhmang, koham, duhâm. rapacity (rapasiti), rapaciousness, nn.
(rapin), n. insuamna, inchhuh luihna.
(rapitishn), n. nawnna, tihnawn, en lova sawi.
(raprawshmaw), n. inremna, inkawmngeih lehna.
(rapsawdi), n. hlim rui \awng, lunglên hla mumal nei lo.
(rasaw), thu mal bula bei Russian tihna.
(raset), n. tualtah puan, puan hraw, rawng sen-uk.
(rash), v.i. bawh. v.t. tur hmanhmawh. n. hmanhmawhna, phairuang.
(rashian), adj. Russia thil, Russia mi.
(rashn), n. rawsawt, bi neia thil sem.
(rashnal), adj. chhia-leh-\ha hriatna nei, awmze nei, â lo, fing.
(raskal) n. mi dukdak lo, misual.
(rasl), v.i., n. phe ri siau siau. v.t. ran ru.
(rast), n., v.i. tuiêk, buh leh thlai natna. rusty, adj.
(rastik), adj. thingtlâng, mâwl.
(rat), n. tawlailir ke chîl khuar, sazuk pa, zauthauna, pelhe theih lohna dinhmun.
(rath, rawth), n. thinurna.
(rati), adj. thinur, thinawrh.
(ratifai), v.t. nemnghet, remti, pawm.
(ratl), v.i. ri chheng chheng, ri rek rek. v.t. tiri chhek chhek. n. thinrîkrek, ri chhek.
(raund), adj. mûm bial, chum, ri puam, bi kim, tam tak. adj. a kualin, kil tin a\angin. n. thawh khat, leilâwn rahka, vawi khat kual chhuah, inrawnna (inruanna). v.t. fang chhuak. v.i. mûm.
(raundl), n. thil bial.
(raut marchh), n. sipai kawng zawh.
(raut), n. tlâwm chhiatna, tlân chhiatna. v.t. \hâwng darh, mualpho taka hneh, nawr phawk.
(rauz), v.t. chawk tho. v.i. tho, harh, thinur.
(ravenas), adj. koham.
(ravij), v.t. suam, rawk, suasam. n. tihchhiatna, tlâkchhiatna, tlâkranna.
(ravish), v.t. hneh lâk, aizial, pawngsual. ravishing, adj. hmel\ha lutuk.
(ravl), v.t. tihnawk, phelh. v.i chingchivêt.
(ravîn), n. kawr tê chêp, kawr thûk.
(raw), n. sangha tui cheh hnu, sazuk tê chi, sazuk nu.
(raw), n. tlar, thuah, intihbuaina, inphêk sualna. v.t. and v.i. (lawng) kar.
(rawbast), adj. chak, hrisêl, tâwr \ha, sa nghet.
(rawchh), n. lui sangha chi khat.
(rawdawdendrawn), n. chhawkhlei chi.
(rawdi), adj. and n. bengchheng siam hmang, mi rura.
(rawdêaw), n. sakawr chung chuan leh hruizên chelek thiamna lama cowboy-ho inelna, ran khalh khâwmna.
(rawgish), adj. chimawm.
(rawial), adj. lalber chungchâng, lalber ang, lal, ropui.
(rawialty), n. lalber nihna, lalna ram, leilung chhiah, chhiah.
(rawk), n. thawnthua mura.
(rawkas), adj. aw chhâng, bengkhawrh.
(rawl), n. thil inzial, hming lamna bu, chhangthâwp, leh hawl hawlna, lei tawn, inherna. v.t. zial, khâwr, her, tivir, tilîr, tlir. v.i. lîr, her, vir, lei tawn, inzial.
(rawlar), n. tilîrtu, kawng tihmâmna, tuifâwn sei tak.
(rawlawk), n. lawng karfung vuahna.
(rawm, rawmb), rhombus (rawmbas), nn. thil kil li nei sir li inchen tlâng \halh (dân narânin a sâwi deuh \hîn).
(rawmans), n. thawnthu (thanthu) inngaihzawnna, hmangaihna thawnthu.
(rawmantik), adj. hmangaihna lam thil, hmangaihna lam âwn mi, lunglên thil.
(rawmeik), n. and adj. \hangthar Grik thil.
(rawng), n. and adj. dik lo, \ha lo, sual. v.i. pawi khawih, dik lo taka puh.
(rawst), v.t., v.i. hriak nêna kang, hem hmin. n. sa bawp hrang kan ro, sa bawp hrang.
(rawstar), n. hna inchhâwk dân tûr ziah chhuahna.
(rawstram), n. vântlâng hmaa thu sawina dawhkan.
(rawt), pa t. and pa.p. of work, thawk, ker, chei, siam.
(rawt), pa.t. of write, ziak.
(rawtand), adj. mûm.
(rawteit), v.i. her, vir. v.t. hertîr, inthlâktîr.
(rawth), adj. thinur.
(rawtn), adj. \awih, rawp, mawih.
(rawtêrian), n. Rotary pâwla mi.
(rawzari), n. Katholic-ho \awng\aina \hi.
(rawzet), n. puan them suih parh.
(re), n. êng zung, sangha chi khat.
(reawn), n. maimaw puan (silk) siam chawp.
(rebel, -bl), n. hotu laka hel. (ribel), v.i. hel.
(rebiuk), v.t. hau. n. inhauhna.
(rechh), n. hnehchhiah, riangvai, mi tlâktlai lo, mi hnaisai lo. wretched (rechhid), adj.
(redi), adj. inring, inpeih, duh, remti, awm sa. readiness, n. ready-made, adj. siam sa. ready-money (-mani), adj. pawisa awm chawp.
(rediaw), n. boruaka electric zung manna khâwl.
(redietar), n. thil lum chhuahna, thil sa ti\ai darhtu, thil sa vawng daitu, radio thawn chhuahna ngul.
(refarens), n. chungchang sawina, hriattirna, ngaihtuahtîrna, thil kawh, chinchang hriatpuina.
(referandam), n. mipui thlan atâna rawtna tlângzarh.
(refiuji), n. hum.
(refiuz), v.t. duh lo, hnar, phal lo. (refius), n. bawlhhlawh, hnawmhnê.
(refrakt), v.t. tikawi, chhun kâwi.
(regeil), v.t. ruai siamsak, thil tuihnaia hrai.
(regein), v.t. hmu kîr leh, ngai awh leh, kal kai leh.
(regiular), adj. dân ang, inang, rual, rêng rêng. n. sipai nghet. regularity, n.
(regres), n. kîr lehna. v.i. kîr leh. regression, n.
(reid), n. beih thut, bawh thut, \hawn thut, inrûnna. v.t., v.i. rammu, rûn, \hawng.
(reij), n., v.i. thin so, nasa taka thinurna, so sâng, tlânglawn, chîn lâr.
(reik), n. hnim leh lei haina thirkut, pa lepchhiah, pa hur. v.t. thirkut nena hai, ziah, hai khâwm, ngun taka zawng.
(reil), n. vawnbân pal, rêl kawng, rêl. v.i. sawisêl, dem.
(rein), n. lal rorêlna, lal chhûng. v.t. lal, awp.
(rein), n. ruah. v.t and v.i. sûr.
(rein-geij), n. ruahtui tla zât tehna.
(reinbaw), n. chhimbâl.
(reindîar), n. hmâr tâwp vûr ram sazuk.
(reinfâwl), n. ruah tla, ruahtui tla zât.
(reini), adj. khaw chhia.
(reinj), v.t. tlar, rem, ram tina kal darh. v.i. chin neia inpharh, vâk vêl, danglam, inthlâk. n. tlar, tlângdung, tin lam, hlat lam, phâk chin, chi hrang hrang, thuk lian, silai inthemthiamna hmun.
(reip), n., v.t. pâwngsual.
(reis), n. hnam, chi, thlah, intlansiakna, sakawr intlansiakna. v.t. and v.i. intlansiak (tîr). racial (rêshal, reshial), adj.
(reit), n. man, chak lam, chak dân, lawng sipaite dinhmun sân lam. v.t. kamkhat, hau, man bi chhiar, a hlut lam hisap.
(reith), n. mi dam lai thlâ hmun danga inlâr.
(reiv), v.i. nasa taka thinur, \awng buai.
(reiz), v.i. nuai reh, tisawp, titlu sawp.
(reiz), v.t. tikâng, chawi kâng, tung ding, tisâng, tipung, chîng, vulh, sawi chhuak, titâwp, khawn.
(reizin, -zan), n. grep rah rêp.
(rejeckt), v.t. hnâwl, hnial.
(rejenareit), v.t. siam thar leh, pianthartîr.
(rejimen), n. ram awpna, rorel dân, damdawi inchawhna.
(rejiment), n. sipai pâwl, ram rorêlna, v.t. khuahkhirh, rem rel.
(rejisaid), n. lal thahna, lal thattu.

(rejistar), n. thil tehna khâwl, chhinchhiahna bu, aw tlin chin (hniam leh sâng). v.t. chhinchhiah, ziak lut, kâwk, fimkhur taka enkawl zui a nih theih nâna man chuang chawia thil thawn. v.i. hming ziak lut.
(rek), n. tihchhiatna, lawng keh/chhia, kehchhia. v.t. tichhia. v.i. kehchhia.
(rekawgnais), v.t. hmel hria, hre chhuak leh, hre thiam, pawm.
(rekawgnishn), n. hriatna, pawmna.
(rekawlekt), v.t. hre chhuak leh, ruh thar leh. recollection, n. hriat chhuah lehna.
(rekawmend), v.t. fak, kuta kawltîr, sawi mawi, fuih, râwn. recommendation, n.
(rekawnawitar), v.t and v.i enthla, thlîr lâwk.
(rekawndait, rikawn-), adj. thûk, ril.
(rekawnsail), v.t. inrem leh, inkawmngeihtîr leh, hmin, pawm.
(rekawnsidar), v.t. ngaihtuah \ha leh, inlamlêt, tidanglam.
(rekhlamêshn), n. lâk kîr lehna, siam \hat lehna.
(rekhrieit), v.t and v.i. tiphûr leh, infiam, inchawk harh leh, intihlim. (rikhrieit), siam thar leh, suangtuah thar leh.
(rekhuiem), n. mitthi tâna rawngbâwlna, mitthi hla.
(rekij), n. tihchhiatna, thil kehchhia.
(rekn), v.t. chhiar, chhût, hisâp, ngaihtuah, ring, âwih. v.i. hisâp, rinchhan.
(rektam), n. tai (mawngkua).
(rektanggl), n. thil kil li nei kil intiat \heuh. rectangular, adj. chutiang kil li nei.

(widhaut), prep. pâwnah, tel lovin. adj. pâwnah.

(widhhawld), v.i. pe duh lo, hrêng, khêkkhal.

(yiawr), n. hmasâng.
(yie), adv. nia, aw.
(yiel), v.t. and v.i. bê, \ê, beleuh, khêk.

(zawrawastrianizm), n. Persia ram sakhua.

(zeni), adj., n. mi â, ho.
(zhawdâm), n. French sipai police.
(zhawur), n. chi, thu phuah kalhmang, lemziak dân chi khat.

(zibra), n. Africa ram sakawr râng.
(zil), n. thathona, \hahnemngaihna, phûrna.
(zingk), n. rangva chi khat.
(ziraw), n. bial, engmah lo, beih \an hun chiah.
(zu), n. London-a Zoological Garden (sa huan) hming kaihtawi, sa huan.
(â pas, impas), n. khirhkhân, inbiak rem theih lohna, inkalh tlatna.
(âkawr, awngkawr), interj. ti leh rawh! ti nawn rawh! (thiam taka zaite hi zai nawn leh tûra kan duh chuan 'Encore!' tiin kan au thei).
(âmawnd), n. Sâp theite chi khat.
(ârdvârk), n. fanghmîr râl / tlumpi râl.
(âtûrazh), n. \huihruai, hnungzui, chhehvêl.
(âwd), n. hminghmerh neia hla phuah.
(âwdawr), n. rim. odoriferous, odorous, adjs., rimtui. odourless, adj. rim nei lo.
(âwdiam), n. tlâng huat thil.
(âwgar), n. hring ei ramhuai. ogress (awgress), fem.
(âwgl), v.t., v.i. ngaihmelh.
(âwm), n. electric tha dâltu tehkhâwng.
(âwnas), n. mawhphurhna, phurrit.
(âwp), adj., v.t. and v.i. hla thua open tihna.
(âwpain), v.t., v.i. ngaihruat, ngaih dân sawi.
(âwpal), n. lunghlu vâr chi.
(âwpasiti), n. hmuh tlang theih lohna.
(âwpeik), adj. êng kal tlang theih loh, hmuh tlang theih loh, lang tlang thei lo.
(âwpiam), n. ruih theih hlo, kani, ganja.
(âwpiniawn), n. ngaih dân.
(âwpn), adj. inhawng, thû zêp lo, tlang, pawp, parh, arh. v.t. hawng, \an. v.t. in\an, inhawng.
(âwr), n. thîr hlo ilo pai leilung, thîr leh dâr leh rangkachak ilo pai leilung.
(âwral), adj. ka lam thil, kaa sawi, a sawia sawi (ziak ni lo).
(âwrdîl), n. infiahna hrehawm tak, hrehawm tuarna (tawrhna).
(âwrfan), n., adj. fahrah. v.t. fahraha siam.

(âwsâwbl), n. a bung hrang hrang lâk khâwm, ri mawi tumtu pâwl, a tlângpui khai khâwm.
(âwva), pl. of ovum (tui).
(âwval), adj. sava tui pianhmang anga mûm sâwl.
(âwvam), n. tui, mihring leh ramsaah chuan naute leh a notea chi insiam (hmeichhe tui). ova, pl.
(âwvar), prep., adv. kânin, chungah, chungthuah. over and above, chu bakah. over and over, nawn leh \hîn. over seas, tuipui râlah.
(âwvarbêr), v.t. chal delh. overbearing, adj. tuarhlelhawm, mi hnuaichhiah.
(âwvari), n. tui bawm, tui leh chi insiamna bawm. ovarian (awvêrian) adj.
(âwvart), adj. a langa tih, hmuh theih.
(âwveit), adj. artui anga mûm sâwl.
(âwvêshn), n. lâwma au dur durna.
(âwzâwn), n. \êk tlâk lai vêla hriat theih chi boruak hmui.
(ê), interj. eng a ni?
(ê-wan), a tha ber, a tling ber chi.
(êfis, afis), n. thlai hrik (pangang, kutdurh, etc.). aphid an ti bawk. aphides, pl.
(êgiu), n. khawsik, tlun.
(êjent), n. titu, thawktu, khawih danglamtu, sumdâwnna kawnga palai or aiawh.
(êkar), n. hmun, \în khat hmun vêla zau, yard kil li 4,840.
(êkawrn), n. mîm, thingsemîm ang chi, sasaw rah.
(êkhlâ), n. a langsâra ropui tak, challanna, fakna.
(êksarpt), n. lehkhabu a\anga thuchâng duh lai thur chhuah.
(êlian), n., adj. ram pâwn lam mi, ram dang khua leh tui, pâwn lam thil, ze danglam.
(êlias), adv. a nih loh chuan. n. hming lem, mi bum nân emawa hming lem invuah.
(êmiebl), adj. lainatawm, nêlawm. amiability, amiableness, nn. amiably, adv.
(êmîr, îmir), n. Africa khawchhak leh hmâr biala lal tenau zawng zawng an kohna. Mohammed-a thlah nia an rin zawng zawngte an kohna.
(ênail, anail), adj. pitar ang mai, tar chhia ang.
(ênas), mawngkua.
(ênshent), adj. a thil hlui, upa, hmâsang thil. anciently, adj.
(êpeks), n. a sâng lai ber, a chhîp (zum), a vâwrtâwp.
(êpiari), n. khuai khawina hmun.
(êram), n. bâl chi khat.
(êrawnik, -al), adj. Aarona chungchâng thil (Bible-a 'Arona' kan tih mai hi).
(êrian, arian), adj. India leh Persia hnam thlahtute or chi.
(êthiizm), n. Pathian awm rin lohna.
(êviari), n. sava khawina or dahna hmunpui.
(êwrient), adj. khawchhak lam thil, êng. n. khawchhak, khawchhak ram. v.t. khawchhak lam hawitîr, kawng mumal inhawitîr.
(êzhiatik, êshiatik), adj., n. Asia thil, Asia mi.
(îchh), adj. pakhat zêl, a mal mal, tin.
(îdikt), n. thu neitu thupêk.
(îdius), v.t. phawrh chhuak, lailang, hîp chhuak.
(îgar), adj. nghâkhlel, phûr, châk.
(îgl), n. mupui, muvanlai.
(îjipshan), adj., n. Aigupta thil, Aigupta mi or \awng.
(îjipt), n. Aigupta.
(îk), v.t. belhchhah, puntîr, tisei.
(îkhawnawmik, ekhawnawmik), adj. economic thil, inrenchem lam thil, chhawrbâwk dân kâwng.
(îkhual), adj. intluk, inzât, inbûk. n. tlukpui. v.t. tluk. equal to the occasion, a huna tling or tlâk, mittling.
(îkhui), tluk.
(îl), n. ngharûl.
(îlawnggeit), v.t., v.i., tisei, sei zual.
(îlûd, iliud), v.t. buma tlân chhuak, a ngaihna hre lova siam.
(îmiu), n. sava lian ber dawttu (thlâwk thei lo).
(în), even kaihtawi.
(în), n. khualbûk.
(îpawk, epawk), n. khawvêl chanchina hun pawimawh lai (Thlânrawkpa Khuangchawi, Tualte Vânglai, etc.), hun khat. epoch-making, adj. hun khawih danglam thei khawpa pawimawh (Arsi Tlâk, Mautam, etc.).
(îra), n. hun pawimawh tak a\anga hun chhiar \anna, hun pawimawh tak, hun bi. (The Christian era - Krista hun lai a\anga kum chhiar).
(îst), n. khawchhak. the East, Europe chhak lam ram. Eastern-Church, Grik Kohhran.
(ît), v.t., v.i., ei.
(îtarnal), adj. tâwp nei lo, chatuan. The Eternal, Pathian. Eternal City. Rom khawpui.
(îthar), n. vân boruak, tui hu na deuh chi khat (pangti tihhit nâna inzaina ilova an hman).
(îthiawpian), adj., n. Ethiopia thil, Ethiopia mi, Abyissinian mi.
(îtn), n. England-a sawrkâr sikul un tak awmna khua. Etonian, n. Eton sikul (college) chhuak or zirlai.
(îvl), adj., n. sual, \ha lo, thil sual. evil eye, khawhring, chhiat, mawlh. evil one, ramhuai.
(îvning), n. tlai, tlai lam, thimhlim, ni tlâk.
(îvs), n. dithlifarfêm.
(îz), n. tlawngawlna, hahdamna, awm nawmna, lungkham neih lohna. v.t. chhâwk dam, dîm têa kal.
(îzl), n. milem ziak lai târna or nghenchhan.
(îâwlith), n. \êk thi.
(ûz), n. chhâm êk, thil pût. v.i. pût, hnâm.
, n. chanchinbu chhuah dân hmang, chanchinbu chhuahtu pâwl.
-al (awbstetrik, -kal), adjs. nau chhar chungchang. obstetrician (-shan), n. nau chhar thiam. obstetrics, n. nau chhar hna.
-al (awptik, -al), adj. Khawhmuh theihna chungchâng.
-al (daiakhritik, -al), adjs. hawrawp danglamna chhinchhiahna nei (\, û, â, etc.).
-al (daialektik, -al), adjs. dialect thil, dialectics thil. dialectic, dialectics, nn. titi dân hmang, chhia leh \ha hriatna hmanga thil chhui dân.
